daśāsyasurayoranyonyakriyātiśayokteranyonyātiśayaḥ | sakalabhuvanakṣayakāritayā lokasīmātipātaḥ || ityatiśayokt‍yalaṃkāranirūpaṇam || śleṣālaṃkāranirūpaṇam | śleṣaṃ lakṣayati— śleṣo 'nekārthakathanaṃ padenaikena kathyate | padakriyākārakaiḥ syādbhinnābhinnaiḥ sa ṣaḍ‍vidhaḥ || 85 || śleṣa iti | ekena padena vibhaktyantenānekeṣāmarthānāṃ kathanaṃ yatra sa śleṣaḥ kathyate | ekarūpānvitamanekārthaṃ vacaḥ śleṣa iti lakṣaṇam | sa ca ṣaḍvidhaḥ padādibhiḥ syāt || teṣu bhinnapado yathā— ‘doṣākareṇa ‘rājamārgābhigāminā’ ghasaṃbadhnannakṣatrapathavartinā | rājñā pradoṣo māmitthamapriyaṃ kiṃ na bādhate || 226 ||’ atra ‘pradoṣo rātreḥ prathamayāmaḥ kimiti priyārahitaṃ māṃ na bādhate’ ityukteryuktimāha—itthamanubhūyamānena prakāreṇa | rājñā saṃbadhnan | kīdṛśena | doṣākareṇa nakṣatrapathavartineti | yo hi doṣāṇāmākareṇa rājamārgātigāminā ca rājñā prakṛṣṭadoṣaḥ saṃbadhyate so 'priyamavaśyaṃ‘so 'pi priyam’ ga bādhata eva; tadatra pūrvasminprākaraṇike 'rthe dvitīyo 'rtho 'prākaraṇikaḥ padabhedenopaśliṣyamāṇo bhinnapadaśleṣāpadeśamāsādayati || doṣetyādi | prakṛṣṭo doṣo dūṣaṇaṃ yasya sa durjano māṃ kiṃ na bādhate, kiṃtu bādhata eva | māṃ kīdṛśam | apriyaṃ tasya dveṣyam | kīdṛśaḥ | itthamanubhūyamānena prakāreṇa rājñā bhūpena saha saṃbadhnan yuñjan | ātmānamityadhyāhāryam | atra karmavadbhāvo na kṛtaḥ saṃbadhyamāna ityarthatvāt | rājñā kīdṛśena | doṣāṇāṃ dūṣaṇānāmākareṇa sthānena | kṣatrapathaḥ kṣatriyamārgastatra vartituṃ śīlaṃ yasya tena | paścānnakārasaṃbandhaḥ | kṣatriyadharmaśūnyenetyarthaḥ | pakṣe pradoṣo rajanīmukhaṃ māmapriyaṃ priyārahitaṃ kiṃ na bādhate kiṃtu bādhata eva | kīdṛśaḥ | rājñā candreṇetthaṃ saṃbadhyamānaḥ | kīdṛśena | doṣākareṇa rātrikareṇa | nakṣatrapathaṃ vyoma tadavasthitiśīlena ca | atra rājapadamabhinnam | śeṣapadānāṃ bhedādbhinnapadaśleṣaḥ || abhinnapado yathā— ‘asāvudayamārūḍhaḥ kāntimān raktamaṇḍalaḥ | rājā harati lokasya‘sarvasya’ ga hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ || 227 ||’ atrāyamudīyamānaścandramā lokasya hṛdayaṃ haratītyukteryuktimāha—rājānuraktamaṇḍala udayī mṛdukaraḥ kāntimāniti | yo hyevaṃbhūto rājā so 'vaśyaṃ lokasya hṛdayahārī bhavati | atrāpi ca prākaraṇike 'rthe 'prākaraṇika upaśliṣyamāṇaḥ padānāmabhedenābhinnapadaśleṣo bhavati || asāvityādi | asau rājā nṛpo mṛdubhirapīḍākaraiḥ karai rājagrāhyairlokasya hṛdayaṃ harati | kīdṛśaḥ | udayaṃ vṛddhimārūḍhaḥ prāptaḥ | kāntimān śobhāyuktaḥ | raktamanuraktaṃ maṇḍalaṃ deśo yasya saḥ | pakṣe asau rājā candraḥ karaiḥ kiraṇairmṛdubhiḥ śītalairjanasya hṛdayaṃ harati gṛhṇāti | kīdṛśaḥ | udayamudayādrimupagataḥ | kāntimān dīptiyukto raktamaṇḍalo lohitabimbaśca | ‘udayo vṛddhāvudayaparvate’ iti viśvaḥ | 'maṇḍalaṃ bimbadeśayoḥ’ iti ca | atra rājādipadānāmabhedenābhinnapadaśleṣatvam || bhinnakriyo yathā— ‘madhurā rāgavardhinyaḥ komalāḥ kokilāgiraḥ | ākarṇyante madakalāḥ śliṣyante cāsitekṣaṇāḥ || 228 ||’ atra ‘ākarṇyante, śliṣyante ca’ iti kriyāpadadvitayasya prādhānyataḥ samuccayenopāttasya ‘madhurā—’ ityādibhiḥ śliṣṭapadaiḥ ‘kokilāgiraḥ', ‘asitekṣaṇāḥ’ iti vā viśeṣyaikapadavarjaṃ paryāyataḥ saṃbandho bhavati | tadyathā—ākarṇyante | kāḥ | kokilāgiraḥ | kīdṛśyaḥ | madhurāḥ, rāgavardhinyaḥ, komalāḥ | punarapi kiṃbhūtāḥ | āsite upaveśite niścalīkṛte antaḥpramodānubhāvādīkṣaṇe yābhistāstathā | sarvo 'pi hi madhuraṃ śabdamākarṇayan niścalākṣo bhavati | śliṣyante ca | kāḥ | asitekṣaṇāḥ hariṇacakṣuṣaḥ | kiṃbhūtāḥ | madakalāḥ, kokilāgiraḥ, komalāḥ, rāgavardhinyaḥ, madhurā iti | so 'yaṃ dvayorvibhinnakriyayorbhinnārthe‘bhinnārthaikarūpāṇām’ kha ca rūpiṇāṃ padārthānāmupaśleṣo bhinnakriyaḥ śleṣa ucyate || madhurā ityādi | kokilāgira ākarṇyante, asitekṣaṇāḥ śyāmanetrāḥ priyānāśliṣyante ca | kīdṛśyaḥ | madhurāḥ śrutisukhā ramyāśca | rāgavardhinyo 'nurāgajanikā ratijanikāśca | komalā manojñā mṛdvaṅgyaśca | madakalā yauvanavasantādikṛta-madamadhurāḥ | madena madyavikāreṇa kaladhvaniyuktāśca | āsite upaveśite niścalīkṛte 'ntaḥpramodānubhavādīkṣaṇe yābhistāsāṃ madhuraṃ ravamākarṇayanniścalākṣo bhavati | pakṣe 'sitekṣaṇāḥ | kīdṛśyaḥ | kokilānāmiva giro yāsāṃ tāḥ | atra kriyābhedādbhinnakriyatvamitarapadānāmabhinnānāmevārthadvayabodhakatā || ‘abhinnakriyayoḥ’ gaabhinnakriyo yathā— ‘svabhāvamadhurāḥ snigdhāḥ śaṃsantyo rāgamulbaṇam | dṛśo dūtyaśca karṣanti kāntābhiḥ preṣitāḥ priyān || 229 ||’ atra ‘karṣanti’ ityetasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ dṛśāṃ dūtīnāṃ ca śliṣṭapadatvenāveśādayamabhinnakriyo nāma śleṣaviśeṣaḥ | prathamayorasya vā ko viśeṣa iti cet | tatraikasyaiva prākaraṇikatvam atra tu dvayorapīti | ayaṃ ca bhinnakārako 'pi bhavati || svabhāvetyādi | kāntābhiḥ preṣitā dṛśo dūtyaśca priyān vallabhān karṣanti | kīdṛśyaḥ | svabhāvena sahajena madhurā lalitāḥ | taduktaṃ matsaṃgītasarvasve—'madhurā kuñcitāntā ca sabhrūkṣepā ca sasmitā | samanmathavikārā ca dṛṣṭiḥ sā lalitā matā ||’ iti | snigdhāḥ snehavatyaḥ | ulbaṇamadhikaṃ rāgaṃ lauhityaṃ śaṃsantyaḥ | pakṣe sahajamadhurāḥ | yadvā svabhāvātpriyavādinyaḥ snigdhā ātmīyāḥ | adhikaṃ rāgaṃ madyavikārakṛtaṃ śaṃsantyaḥ | yadvā rāgamanurāgaṃ kathayantyaḥ | atra priyākarṣaṇarūpaikaiva kriyā sādhāraṇītyekakriyātvam | bhinnapadābhinnapadābhyāmasya ca ko bheda iti pṛcchati—prathamayoriti | vāśabdaścārthe | uttaram—tatreti | tayorekaikasyaiva prakaraṇāpannatvamatra tu dṛṣṭaṃ dva‍yorapi prākaraṇikatvamiti bheda ityarthaḥ | anekakartṛkatvenāyaṃ bhinnakārakodāharaṇamapītyāha—ayamiti || bhinnakārako yathā— ‘gatirveṇī ca nāgena vapurūrū ca rambhayā | oṣṭhau pāṇī pravālaiśca tasyāstulyatvamāyayuḥ || 230 || atraikasmin pakṣe dharmadharmiṇorabhedopacārānnāgagatirgṛhyate | tatra gate-rveṇyāśca nāgena hastinā ahinā ca tulyatvam, vapuṣa ūrvośca rambhayā kadalyā apsarobhiśca tulyatvam, oṣṭhayoḥ pāṇyośca pravālairvidrumairnavapallavaiśca ‘tulyatvam’ ka kha gatulyatvaṃ varṇanīyayoḥ śleṣaprabhāvāllabhyate; so 'yamanekakartṛkatvādbhinnakāraka iti śleṣo bhavati || gatirityādi | tasyā nāyikāyā gatirgamanaṃ veṇī keśaracanā ca nāgena hastinā sarpeṇa ca, tasyā vapurūrudvayaṃ ca rambhayā 'psarobhedena kadalyā ca, tasyāḥ pāṇī hastāvoṣṭhau ca pravālairvidrumaiḥ pallavaiśca sarvāṇi tulyatvamāyayuḥ | ‘nāgo hastibhujaṅgayoḥ’ iti śāśvataḥ | ‘kadalyapsaraso rambhā’ iti ca | ‘pallave vidrume cāpi pravālaḥ’ iti dharaṇiḥ | gatinānātvādāha—dharmeti | atra nānākartṛkatvādeva bhinnakārakatā || abhinnakārako yathā— ‘kṛṣṇārjunānuraktāpi dṛṣṭiḥ karṇāvalambinī | yāti viśvasanīyatvaṃ kasya te kalabhāṣiṇi || 231 ||’ atra ‘he kalabhāṣiṇi, kasya te dṛṣṭirviśvāsyā bhavati’ ityukteryuktimāha—‘kṛṣṇārjunānuraktāpi karṇāvalambinī’ iti ca | yā hi kṛṣṇārjunenānurajyate kathaṃ sā karṇapakṣapātinī bhavati, yā caivamubhayagatā tasyāṃ ko viśvasiti; sa cāyamekakartṛkatvādabhinnakāraka iti śleṣo bhavati || kṛṣṇetyādi | he kalabhāṣiṇi madhuravacane, tava dṛṣṭiḥ kasya viśvasanīyatvaṃ viśvāsaviṣayatāṃ yāti kiṃtu na kasyāpi | atra hetuḥ kṛṣṇā śyāmā, arjunā dhavalā, anuraktā prāntalohitā ca | prādeśiko 'yaṃ kramaḥ | karṇaparyantagāminī ca | pakṣe kṛṣṇe harau, arjune pārthe cānuraktānurāgavatī karṇapakṣapātinī ca yā sā viruddhobhayagatā kathaṃ viśvasanīyā bhavati | ‘valakṣo dhavalo 'rjunaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra karturekatayābhinnakārakatā || iti śleṣālaṃkāranirūpaṇam || bhāvikālaṃkāranirūpaṇam | bhāvanālakṣaṇamāha— svābhiprāyasya kathanaṃ yadi vāpyanyabhāvanā | anyāpadeśo vā yastu trividhaṃ bhāvikaṃ viduḥ || 86 || mate cāsmākamudbhedo vidyate naiva bhāvikāt | vyaktāvyaktobhayākhyābhistrividhaḥ so 'pi kathyate || 87 || svetyādi | nijāśayakathanamanyakathanamanyāpadeśaśca bhāvikam | bhāve kaverabhiprāye bhavaṃ bhāvikamityanvarthanāmatāpi | udbhedabhāvikayorabhedamāha—mata iti | so 'pi udbhedo 'pi || tatra bhāvikabhedeṣu svābhiprāyakathanaṃ yathā— ‘ṇāvajjhaï duggejjhiā diṭṭhammi jammi bhiuḍiā jattha ṇa avvāhārao ghippaï āhāsattae | vicchuhaï ahiṇiṃdae jattha ṇa so vaaṃsiā taṃ me ‘kahahu’ ka kha gakahaü māṇaaṃ jaï me icchahi ‘jīiam’ iti ghajīaam || 232 || [nābadhyate durgṛhītā dṛṣṭe yasmin bhṛkuṭikā yatra nāvyāhāro gṛhyate ābhāṣamāṇe | vikṣubhyate 'bhinindyate yatra na sa vayasyayā taṃ me kathaya mānaṃ yadi me icchasi jīvanam ||] atra ‘bhrūdbhedā’ khabhrūbhedāsaṃbhāṣaṇapriyatamāvakṣepān pratyanabhimatapratipādanarūpasyābhiprāyasya kathitatvādidaṃ svābhiprāyakathanaṃ nāma bhāvikam || ṇāvajjaï ityādi | “nābadhyate durgrāhyā dṛṣṭe yasmin bhrukuṭikā yatra na ca (cā) vyāhāro gṛhyate ābhāṣamāṇe | vikṣubhyate 'bhinīyamāne yatra na sa vayasyayā taṃ me kathaya mānaṃ yadi me icchasi jīvitam ||” iha yasmin dṛṣṭe durgrahā bhrukuṭirnābadhyate samantānna badhyate yatrābhāṣamāṇe 'vyāhāro na ca gṛhyate | yatrābhinīyamāne vayasyayā sa na kṣubhyate taṃ mānaṃ mama kathaya yadi mama jīvanamicchasi | atrānākāṅkṣitarūpasyābhiprāyasya kathanam || anyabhāvanā yathā— ‘daṃsaṇavaliaṃ daḍhakaṃ vibandhaṇaṃ dīharaṃ supariṇāham | hoi ghare sāhīṇaṃ musalaṃ dhaṇṇāṇaṃ mahilāṇam || 233 ||’ [daṃśanavalitaṃ dṛḍhakaṃ vibandhanaṃ dīrdhaṃ supariṇāham | bhavati gṛhe svādhīnaṃ musalaṃ dhanyānāṃ mahilānām ||] atra mẹdhrabhāvanayā musalarūpasyoktatvādidamanyabhāvanābhidhānaṃ bhāvikam || daṃsaṇetyādi | “daṃśanena valitaṃ dṛḍhakaṃ vibandhanaṃ dīrghaṃ supariṇāham | bhavati gṛhe svādhīnaṃ musalaṃ dhanyānāṃ mahilānām ||” ihottamastrīṇāṃ gṛhe īdṛśaṃ musalaṃ svāyattaṃ bhavati | kīdṛśam | daṃśane dhānyādimardane valitaṃ lagnam | dṛḍhakaṃ dṛḍham | svārthe kan | vigatabandhanaṃ dīrghaṃ supariṇāhamatisthūlaṃ ca | mẹdhrapakṣe daṃśane bhagamardane valitaṃ saṃnaddhaṃ dṛḍhaṃ vigatabandhanaṃ dīrghamatisthūlaṃ ca | atra mẹdhrābhiprāyeṇa musalokteranyabhāvanā || anyāpadeśo yathā— ‘āsāiamaṇṇāeṇa jettiaṃ‘jittiam’ ga gha tettiaṃ cia vihiṇam | oramasu vasaha eṇhiṃ rakkhijjaï gahavaïcchettam || 234 ||’ [āsvāditamajñātena yāvattāvadeva vrīhīṇām | uparama vṛṣabhedānīṃ rakṣyate gṛhapatikṣetram ||] atra parakṣetrasya ghasmaravṛṣanivāraṇāpadeśena cirātparijñāta ‘vāryate’ ka khaupapatirnivāryate, tadidamanyāpadeśākhyaṃ bhāvikam || āsāia ityādi | “āsvāditamajñātena yāvattāvataiva bandhaya dhṛtim | uparamasva vṛṣabhātra rakṣayitvā gṛhapatikṣetram ||” iha he vṛṣabha, gṛhapatikṣetraṃ rakṣayitvā tvamuparamasva krīḍaya | ajñātena tvayā yāvadevāsvāditaṃ tāvataiva dhṛtiṃ bandhaya | atra vṛṣabhanivāraṇavyājenopapatinivāraṇamanyāpadeśaḥ || udbhedeṣu vyakto yathā— ‘maṃtesi mahumahapaṇaaṃ saṃdāṇesi tiasesapāavaraaṇam | ojasu ‘suddha’ iti pāṭhaḥ.muddhasuhāvaṃ saṃbhāvesu suraṇāha jāavaloam‘jā ava’ kha ga || 235 ||’ [manuṣe madhumathapraṇayaṃ saṃdānayasi tridaśeśapādaparatnam | apajahi mugdhasvabhāvaṃ saṃbhāvaya suranātha yādavalokam ||] atra māyāvino mahendrasyābhiprāyaḥ satyakena vyaktamevodbhinna iti vyakto 'yamudbhedaḥ || mantesītyādi | “manuṣe madhumathapraṇayaṃ saṃdānayasi tridaśeśa pādaparatnam | apajahi mugdhasvabhāvaṃ saṃbhāvaya suranātha yādavalokam ||” iha he suranātha indra, yadi madhumathasya kṛṣṇasya praṇayaṃ prītiṃ manuṣe svīkaroṣi | deve pādaparatnaṃ pārijātavṛkṣaṃ saṃdadāne sati mugdhaṃ svabhāvaṃ maugdhyamapajahi tyaja | yādavalokaṃ saṃbhāvaya prīṇaya | atrendrābhiprāyaḥ satyakena tatsārathinā vyaktaḥ prakāśitaḥ || avyakto yathā— ‘niḥśeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanataṭaṃ nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharo netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ | mithyāvādini dūti bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame‘pīḍāgamā’ ka. kha. vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam || 236 ||’ atra ‘vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam’ ityākṣepavatā ‘prakṛtodāharaṇena’ ka khaprākaraṇikodāharaṇena yadyapi dūtyā duśceṣṭitaṃ nirbhinnaṃ tathāpi na pūrvavavdyaktamityavyakto 'yamudbhedaḥ || niḥśeṣetyādi | he dūti, itaḥ sthānāttvaṃ vāpīṃ puṣkariṇīṃ snātuṃ gatāsi | tasyādhamasyāntikaṃ na gatāsi | he mithyāvādini, he suhṛjjanasyājñātaduḥkhāgame | snānacihnānyāha—stanataṭaṃ niḥśeṣacyutacandanamaśeṣakṣaritacandanamasti | tavādharo 'pi tyaktalauhityaḥ | tava netre 'tyarthamañjanaśūnye | tathā taveyaṃ tanvī kṛśā tanuḥ śarīraṃ pulakitā romāñcavatī ca | atra snānasaṃbhogayostulyacihnasyopadarśanena prakaraṇapariprāptaṃ dūtīduśceṣṭitamudbhinnam, na ca prāgvavdyaktatā || ubhayarūpo yathā— ‘amlānotpalakomale sakhi dṛśau nīlāñjanenāñcite karpūracchuraṇācca gaṇḍaphalake saṃvellitaḥ‘na punastasyādhamasyāntikam’ ka kha pāṇḍimā | śvāsāḥ santu ca kandukabhramibhuvaḥ kiṃtu prabhāvāhinā- maṅgānāṃ kraśimānamutkaṭamamuṃ ko nāma notprekṣate || 237 ||’ atra ‘dṛśormlānatā, gaṇḍayoḥ pāṇḍuratvam, śvāsānāṃ dairdhyam’ ityutkaṇṭhācihnanihnavāya yo 'yamavinayavatyā nīlāñjanādiprayogastasya ‘tattvābhyupagame 'pi’ ka khatathābhyupagame 'pi ‘aṅgānāṃ kraśimānamutkaṭamamuṃ ko nāma notprekṣate’ iti yo 'yaṃ sakhīvyāhārastena tadabhiprāya udbhinno 'nudbhinnaśca bhavatītyubhayarūpo 'yamudbhedaḥ | te 'mī trayo 'pyudbhedā bhāvikānna bhidyante || amlānetyādi | kiṃtu he sakhi, tavāṅgānāmamumudbhaṭaṃ kraśimānaṃ kṛśatvaṃ ko na nāmotprekṣate kiṃtūnnayata eva | yadyapi tava dṛśāvamlāne mlānihīne utpanne iva komale manojñe staḥ | kīdṛśe | nīlakajjalenāñcite | yataḥ karpūrasya churaṇāt saṃbandhāt pāṇḍimā pāṇḍuratvaṃ gaṇḍaphalake saṃvellitaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ | śvāsāśca kandukakrīḍanārthaṃ yā bhramirbhramaṇaṃ tatprabhavāḥ santu | aṅgānāṃ kīdṛśānām | prabhāvāhināṃ prabhāṃ dīptiṃ vọdhuṃ dhartuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣām | sahajaramyāṇāmityarthaḥ | avinayavatyā asatyāḥ | atrāvinayavatyā āśayaḥ kiṃcivdyaktīkṛtaḥ | kiṃciccāvyaktīkṛta ityubhayarūpatā || iti bhāvikālaṃkāranirūpaṇam || saṃsṛṣṭyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam | saṃsṛṣṭilakṣaṇamāha— saṃsṛṣṭiriti vijñeyā nānālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ‘sarvālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ’ ka kha | sā tu vyaktā tathāvyaktā vyaktāvyakteti ca tridhā || 88 || tilataṇḍulavavdyaktā chāyādarśavadeva ca | avyaktā kṣīrajalavatpāṃsupānīyavacca‘pāṃśupānīyavacca sā’ pāṭhaḥ sā || 89 || vyaktāvyaktā ca saṃsṛṣṭirnarasiṃhavadiṣyate | citravarṇavadanyasminnānālaṃkārasaṃkare || 90 || saṃsṛṣṭiriti | nānālaṃkārāṇāṃ saṃkaro 'pi......saṃsṛṣṭiḥ | chāyeti | pratibimbadarpaṇavadityarthaḥ | kṣīraṃ dugdham | pāṃsurdhūliḥ | citreti | citralikhitavarṇikāvadityarthaḥ || vyaktā tilataṇḍulavadyathā— ‘pinaṣṭīva taraṅgāgrairudaghiḥ phenacandanam | tadādāya karairindurlimpatīva digaṅganāḥ || 238 ||’ atrotprekṣādva‍yam, rūpakadva‍yaṃ ca tilataṇḍulavatsaṃkīryate || pinaṣṭītyādi | samudrastaraṅgāgraiḥ phenacandanaṃ pinaṣṭīva | induḥ karaistadādāya digaṅganā limpatīva | atrevaśabdābhyāmutprekṣādva‍yam | phena eva candanam, diśa evāṅganā iti rūpakadva‍yam | tadidaṃ miśritaṃ tilataṇḍulavat | yathā tilānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ ca mitho nirapekṣāṇāmeva saṃkīrṇatā tathātrāpi || vyaktaiva chāyādarśavadyathā— ‘nirmalendu nabho reje vikacābjaṃ babhau saraḥ | paraṃ paryaśrunayanau mamlaturbhrātarāvubhau || 239 ||’ atrādarśe‘atrādarśacchāyeva’ kha chāyeva hetvalaṃkāre rāmalakṣmaṇamukhayorindupadmaupamyena sadṛśāsadṛśavyatireko dṛśyate || nirmaletyādi | vivṛto 'yaṃ vyatirekālaṃkāre | atra pūrvārdhena hetvalaṃkāre darśite tadādhāraka eva sadṛśāsadṛśayorvyatirekaḥ | sa ca darpaṇe pratibimba ivādhārādheyabhāvena vyavasthāpitaḥ || avyaktā kṣīrajalavadyathā— ‘kṣīrakṣālitacandreva nīlīdhautāmbareva ca | ṭaṅkollikhitasūryeva vasantaśrīradṛśyata || 240 ||’ atropamotprekṣe kṣīranīravanmiśre saṃsṛṣṭe na vyajyete || kṣīretyādi | vasantaśrīrvasantaśobhā 'dṛśyata janaiḥ | kīdṛśī | kṣīreṇa dugdhena kṣālitaścandro yasyāṃ sā | nīlīdravyena dhautaṃ kṣālitamambaramākāśaṃ yasyāṃ sā | ṭaṅkena pāṣāṇadāraṇenollikhita utkhaṇḍitaḥ sūryo yasyāṃ sā | ‘ṭaṅkaḥ pāṣāṇadāraṇaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atropamotprekṣayormitho milanādavyaktatā | ubhayavyañjakasya tulyakakṣatayā pravṛtteridaṃ boddhavyam || avyaktaiva pāṃsūdakavadyathā— ‘kṛṣṇārjunānuraktāpi dṛṣṭiḥ karṇāvalambinī | yāti viśvasanīyatvaṃ kasya te kalabhāṣiṇi || 241 ||’ atra pāṃsūdakayoriva mṛtpiṇḍe‘mṛtpiṇḍaśleṣavirodhayoḥ’ gha śleṣavirodhayoravyaktayoreva vyājastutāvaṅgabhāvo 'vagamyate || kṛṣṇetyādi | vivṛto 'yaṃ bhāvikālaṃkāre | atra yathā mṛttikāpiṇḍe dhūlijalayormitho milanādavyaktatā tathā śleṣavirodhayorvyājastutiprasaṅgataḥ saṃkara || vyaktāvyaktā narasiṃhavadyathā— ‘rajobhisturagotkīrṇairgajaiśca ghanasaṃnibhaiḥ | bhuvastalamiva vyoma kurvanvyomeva bhūtalam || 242 ||’ atra narasiṃhajātāviva siṃhanaraśarīrabhāgayoḥ parivṛttyalaṃkārahetūpamayoraṅgabhāvo vyaktāvyaktarūpaḥ parisphurannupalabhyate || rajobhirityādi | sa kīdṛśaḥ | hayakhurakṣuṇṇai rajobhirmeghatulyairhastibhiśca gaganaṃ bhūtalamiva, bhūtalaṃ gaganatalamiva kurvan | atra yathā narasiṃhajātau siṃhanarāṅgabhāgayorvyaktāvyaktarūpaṃ sphuraṇaṃ tathā parivṛttyalaṃkāre hetūpamayoraṅgabhāvo vyaktāvyaktarūpaḥ || vyaktāvyaktaiva citravarṇavadyathā— ‘‘mayūrārāvamukharā’ gamayūrārāvamukharāṃ prāvṛṣaṃ sataḍillatām | mahāṭavīmivollaṅghya toyāni mumucurghanāḥ || 243 ||’ atra paṭāvayavasthānāṃ nīlādīnāmiva paṭāvayavyāśrite citravarṇe śleṣarūpakopamārthaśleṣāṇāṃ padapadārthāśrayāṇāṃ śaradvarṇanavākyāśrayiṇi samādhyalaṃkāre vyaktāvyaktarūpo 'ṅgaṅgibhāvaḥ pratīyate || mayūretyādi | meghā jalāni tyajanti sma | mahāṭavīṃ mahāraṇyamiva prāvṛṣaṃ varṣā ullaṅghya | kīdṛśīm | mayūraśabdamukharāṃ, saha taḍiteva latayā vartate tām | atrāvayavāśritanīlādīnāmavayavyāśrite citravarṇe yathāṅgaṅ‍gibhāvastathā śleṣādīnāṃ samādhyalaṃkāre vyaktāvyaktarūpo 'ṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ pratīyata iti || caturviṃśatirityetāḥ krameṇobhayasaṃśrayāḥ | kāvyālaṃkṛtayaḥ proktā yathāvadupamādayaḥ || 91 || iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇe ubhayālaṃkāravivecano nāma caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ || caturviṃśatiriti | ityanena prakāreṇa caturviṃśatiretā upamādayaḥ kāvyālaṃkṛtaya uktā ityanvayaḥ | ajahalliṅgatātra || ubhayeti | śabdārthāśritā ityarthaḥ || ratnaṃ ratnadharo 'janiṣṭa guṇināmādyo 'navadyaḥ satāṃ sā śuddhā damayantikāpi suṣuve naiyāyikaṃ yaṃ sutam | tasya śrīśajagaddharasya kaviturvāṇīgaṇā(lā)laṃkṛte- ṣṭīkāyāmubhayaprakāśanaparicchedaścaturtho gataḥ || iti mahāmahopādhyāyadharmādhikaraṇikaśrījagaddharaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇavivaraṇe caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ || pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ | raso 'bhimāno 'haṃkāraḥ śṛṅgāra iti gīyate | yo 'rthastasyānvayātkāvyaṃ kamanīyatvamaśnute || 1 || viśiṣṭādṛṣṭajanmāyaṃ janmināmantarātmasu | ātmasamyagguṇodbhūtereko hetuḥ prakāśate || 2 || śṛṅgārī cetkaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasamayaṃ jagat | sa eva cedaśṛṅgārī nīrasaṃ sarvameva tat || 3 || paśyati strīti vākye hi na rasaḥ pratibhāsate | vilokayati kānteti vyaktameva pratīyate || 4 || kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ tvaṃ na kāmayase katham | iti grāmyo 'yamarthātmā vairasyāyaiva kalpate || 5 || kāmaṃ kandarpacāṇḍālo mayi vāmākṣi nirdayaḥ | tvayi nirmatsaro diṣṭyetyagrāmyo 'rtho rasāvahaḥ || 6 || navo 'rthaḥ sūktiragrāmyā śravyo bandhaḥ sphuṭā śrṛtiḥ | alaukikārthā‘alaukikārthayuktiśca’ ka kha yuktiśca rasamāhartumīśate || 7 || vakroktiśca rasoktiśca svabhāvoktiśca vāṅmayam | sarvāsu‘sarvānugrāhiṇīm’ ka grāhiṇīṃ tāsu rasoktiṃ pratijānate || 8 || atha caturviśatirasoktīrāhabhāvo janmānubandho 'tha‘arthaniṣpanti’ ka kha niṣpattiḥ puṣṭisaṃkarau | hrāsābhāsau śamaḥ śeṣo viśeṣaḥ ‘paripoṣavān’ ka khapariśeṣavān || 9 || vipralambho 'tha saṃbhogastacceṣṭāstatparīṣṭayaḥparīkṣāḥ | niruktayaḥ prakīrṇāni premāṇaḥ premapuṣṭayaḥ || 10 || nāyikānāyakaguṇāḥ pākādyāḥ premabhaktayaḥ | nānālaṃkārasaṃsṛṣṭeḥ prakārāśca rasoktayaḥ || 11 || caturviṃśatirityuktā rasānvayavibhūtayaḥ | svarūpamāsāṃrasoktīnām yo veda sa kāvyaṃ kartumarhati || 12 || ālambanavibhāvebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ samunmiṣan | raso ratyādirūpeṇa bhāva ityābhidhīyate || 13 || ratirhāsaśca śokaśca krodhotsāhau bhayaṃ tathā | jugupsā vismayaścāṣṭau sthāyibhāvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 14 || stambhastanūruhodbhedo‘tanuruhodbheda’ ga gha gadgadaḥ svedavepathū | vaivarṇyamaśrupralaya‘aśrupralayāvityaṣṭau’ ka kha ityaṣṭau sāttvikāḥ ‘matāḥ’ ka khasmṛtāḥ || 15 || smṛtirvitarka ‘vitarkaścotkaṇṭhā’ ka khautkaṇṭhā cintā capalatā matiḥ | garvaḥ sneho dhṛtirvrīḍāvahitthaṃ mūḍhatā madaḥ || 16 || harṣāmarṣāvasūyerṣyā viṣādo dainyamugratā | trāsaḥ śaṅkā gado glānirunmādaḥ saṃbhramaḥ śramaḥ || 17 || nirvedo jāḍyamālasyaṃ nidrā suptaṃ prabuddhatā | iti bhāvāstrayastriṃśadvijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || 18 || ciraṃ citte 'vatiṣṭhante saṃbadhyante 'nubandhibhiḥ | rasatvaṃ pratipadyante ‘pravṛddhā’ ka khaprabuddhāḥ sthāyino 'tra te || 19 || rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ sattvamihocyate | nirvṛttaye 'sya tadyogātprabhavantīti sāttvikāḥ || 20 || viśeṣeṇābhitaḥ kāye sthāyinaṃ cārayanti ye | anubhāvādihetūṃstānvadanti vyabhicāriṇaḥ || 21 || janitvā ye na jāyante te 'thavā vyabhicāriṇaḥ | smṛtyādayo hi premādau bhavanti na bhavanti ca || 22 || ratau saṃcāriṇaḥ sarvān garvasnehau ‘garvasnehairdhṛtiṃ’ khadhṛtiṃ matim | sthāsnūnevoddhatapreyaḥśāntodātteṣu jānate || 23 || saṃskārapāṭavādibhyo 'nubhāvaṃ vā nijāśraye | saṃcāriṇaṃ vā janayan sāttvikaṃ vā sa jāyate || 24 || uddīpanavibhāvebhyaḥ smṛtihetau paṭīyasi | anubandho 'nubhāvāderanubandho 'sya‘anubandhaḥ sa’ kha kathyate || 25 || vibhāvasyānubhāvasya sāttvikavyabhicāriṇoḥ | saṃyoge rasasyatasya niṣpattimātraṃ ‘niṣpattiriṣyate’ khaniṣpattirucyate || 26 || viṣayāśrayasaṃskāraguṇaprakṛtipāṭavaiḥ | dīpanātiśayaiścāsya prakarṣaḥ puṣṭirucyate || 27 || tulyakālabalotpattihetau bhāvāntarodaye | saṃsargastasya yastena saṃkaraḥ sa nigadyate || 28 || rasāntaratiraskārādanyadrāgācca tasya yaḥ | bhavatyapacayo vṛddhestaddhrāsaṃ taṃ pracakṣate || 29 || hīnapātreṣu tiryakṣu nāyakapratiyogiṣu | gauṇeṣveva padārtheṣu tamābhāsaṃ vijānate‘pracakṣate’ gha || 30 || balavatsūpajāteṣu pratikūleṣu hetuṣu | sarvātmanā samucchedaḥ praśamastasya varṇyate || 31 || āśrayātprakṛtervāpi ‘saṃsārasthairyato 'pi vā’ ghasaṃskārasthairyato 'pi vā | yo 'syātyantamanucchedaḥ‘mavicchedaḥ’ ka kha sa śeṣa iti śabdyate || 32 || śṛṅgārādyā rasā ye ca ye ca śāntoddhatādayaḥ | ye ca ratyādibhedāstānviśeṣānasya manvate || 33 || vibhāvaścānubhāvaśca saṃcārī ‘vāśrayaśca’ khacāśrayaśca yaḥ | ye ca līlādayo yūnāṃ pariśeṣaḥ‘paripoṣaḥ’ ka kha sa kīrtyate || 34 || āśrayo yasya ratyādiḥ premāderupajāyate | viṣayo yatra yoṣādau so 'syaratyādeḥ janmādhigacchati || 35 || ālambanavibhāvaḥ sa jñānakāraṇamucyate | tenādarādirūpeṇa saṃskārastasya jāyate || 36 || ‘anyataḥ’ ka khaādṛtaḥ paṭurabhyasta āśrayāderguṇena saḥ | tatprabodhāya mālyartucandanendūdayādayaḥ || 37 || uddīpanavibhāvāste sa taiḥ smarati vāñchati | dveṣṭi prayatate 'vaiti manyate vakti ceṣṭate || 38 || te 'nubhāvāstadā ye syuḥ svedaromodgamādayaḥ | harṣāmarṣādayo ye ca jñeyāḥ saṃcāriṇo 'tra te || 39 || smṛtīcchāyatnajanmāno manovākvāyasaṃśrayāḥ | vilāsā ye varastrīṇāṃ jñeyā līlādayastu te || 40 || līlā vilāso vicchittirvibhramaḥ kilakiñcitam | moṭṭāyitaṃ kuṭṭamitaṃ vivvoko lalitaṃ tathā || 41 || vihṛtaṃ krīḍitaṃ keliriti strīṇāṃ svabhāvajāḥ | helāhāvādayaścānye jñeyāḥ strīpuṃsayorapi || 42 || upasaṃkhyānameteṣāmanubhāveṣu manvate | paścādbhāvānubhūtibhyāṃ smaraṇādyanubhāvavat || 43 || smṛtyādayo 'nubhāvāśca bhāvāḥ saṃcāriṇaśca ye | nāṭyeṣu‘nāgreṣu’ (?) ka , ‘nāṭye 'nukrimāṇāḥ’ kha kriyamāṇāste naṭairabhinayāḥ smṛtāḥ || 44 || bhāvo yadā ratirnāma prakarṣamadhigacchati | nādhigacchati cābhīṣṭaṃ vipralambhastadocyate || 45 || pūrvānurāgo mānaśca pravāsaḥ karuṇaśca saḥ | puruṣastrīprakāṇḍeṣu catuḥkāṇḍaḥ prakāśate || 46 || ‘prāgasaṃketayoryūnoḥ’ khaprāgasaṃgatayoryūnorabhilāṣaḥ pravartate | saṃkalparamaṇīyo 'nurāgaḥ sa prācya ucyate || 47 || aheriva gatiḥ premṇaḥ svabhāvakuṭileti saḥ | ahetormeti‘ahetorneti metyukte’ ka netyukterhetorvā ‘sa na ucyate’ kamāna ucyate || 48 || deśāntarādibhiryūnorvyavadhānaṃ cirāya yat | nave 'nurāge praụdhe vā pravāsaḥ so 'bhidhīyate || 49 || lokāntaragate yūni vallabhe vallabhā yadā | bhṛśaṃ duḥkhāyate dīnā‘dīnaḥ’ ka karuṇaḥ sa tadocyate || 50 || ratireveṣṭasaṃprāptau puṣṭaḥ saṃbhoga ucyate | so 'pi pūrvānurāgāderānantaryāccaturvidhaḥ || 51 || na vinā vipralambhena saṃbhogaḥ puṣṭimaśnute | kaṣāyite hi vastrādau bhūyānrāgo 'nuṣajyate || 52 || strīpuṃsayorvipralambhe ‘vaicintyākalpakādayaḥ’ gavaicittyākalpanādayaḥ | ceṣṭāviśeṣāḥ saṃbhoge cumbanāliṅganādayaḥ || 53 || vipralambhe 'bhiyogādyaiḥ saṃbhoge sādhvasādibhiḥ | mithaḥparīkṣā yāḥ‘parīkṣā yā premṇo’ gha premṇo nirdiṣṭāstāḥ parīṣṭayaḥ || 54 || vipralambhādiśabdānāṃ lokasiddheṣu vastuṣu | prakṛtyādivibhāgena viniveśā niruktayaḥ || 55 || saṃśrṛtya vipralambhārthāngṛdhivañcyoḥ pralambhane | ityādijñāpakājjñeyaḥ prapūrvo vañcane labhiḥ || 56 || ādānaṃ ca pratiśrutya visaṃvādanameva ca | kālasya haraṇaṃ cāhuḥ pratyādānaṃ ca vañcanam || 57 || pūrvānurāgapūrveṣu vipralambheṣu tatkramāt | viśeṣadyotakeneha vyupasargeṇa sūcyate || 58 || pratiśravo hi pūrvānurāge‘pūrvānurāgavakrekṣitādibhiḥ’ ka vakrekṣitādibhiḥ | abhīṣṭāliṅganādīnāmadānaṃ‘mādānaṃ’ ka kha hrībhayādibhiḥ || 59 || māne nivāraṇaṃ teṣāṃabhīṣṭāliṅganādīnām visaṃvādanamucyate | ayathāvatpradānaṃ vā vyalīkasmaraṇādibhiḥ || 60 || pravāse kālaharaṇaṃ vyaktameṣāṃ pratīyate | proṣyāgateṣvihaitāni kāntāḥ kānteṣu yuñjate || 61 || pratyādānaṃ punasteṣāṃ karuṇe‘kāruṇe’ ga ko na manyate | svayaṃ dattāni hi vidhistāni tatrāpakarṣati || 62 || ‘pralabhetyatra’ ghapralambhetyatra yadi vā vañcanāmātravācini | vinā viśabdenasamāse caturāścaturo 'rthānniyuñjate‘nprayuñjate’ kha || 63 || vividhaśca viruddhaśca vyāviddhaśca krameṇa saḥ | viniṣiddhaśca pūrvānurāgādiṣupūrvānurāgapravāsakaruṇākhyeṣu viṣajyate || 64 || pūrvānurāge vividhaṃ vañcanaṃ vrīḍitādibhiḥ | māne viruddhaṃ tatprāhuḥ punarīrṣyāyitādibhiḥ || 65 || vyāviddhaṃ dīrghakālatvātpravāse tatpratīyatevañcanam | viniṣiddhaṃ tu karuṇe‘karuṇaḥ’ kha , ‘kiraṇe’ ga karuṇatvena gīyate || 66 || rāgo 'nu saha paścādvānurūpo 'nugato 'pi vā | yūnorapūrvaḥ pūrvānurāgaśabdena śabdyate || 67 || rājate rañcatervāpi rāgaḥ ‘karuṇabhāvayoḥ’ khakaraṇabhāvayoḥ | ‘ghañāpi karaṇe bhāve’ gha, ‘ghañānyakārake bhāve’ kaghañānyatkārake bhāve nalopena niyamyate || 68 || mānyate preyasā yena yaṃ priyatvena manyate | manute vā mimīte vā premamānaḥ sa kathyate || 69 || mahābhāṣyakṛtaḥ ko 'sāvanumāna iti smṛteḥ | lyuḍanto 'pi na puṃliṅgo mānaśavdaḥ praduṣyati || 70 || yatrāṅganā yuvānaśca vasate na vasanti ca | sa pravāsaḥ praśabdena pratīpārthena kathyate || 71 || ‘cintotkaṇṭhādibhiśceto’ ka khacitotkaṇṭhādibhiśceto bhṛśaṃ vāsayatīha yaḥ | pravāsayati vā yūnaḥ sa pravāso nirucyate || 72 || prapūrvako vasirjñeyaḥ kāritāntaḥpramāpaṇeantaḥpramāpaṇamābhyantaro vadhaḥ | tūṣṇīṃ pravāsayedenamiti vṛddhānuśāsanāt || 73 || abhūtotpādanāyāṃ kṛñ dṛṣṭaḥ kuru ghaṭaṃ yathā | dṛṣṭaścoccāraṇe cauraṃkāramākrośatītivat || 74 || dṛṣṭo 'vasthāpane 'śmānamitaḥ kuru yathocyate | abhyañjane 'pi ca yathā me pādau sarpiṣābhyañjayetyarthaḥpādau me‘pādau me kuru sarpiṣā’ ka kha ‘kurute sāhasaṃ manaḥ’ ka khasarpiṣā kuru || 75 || mūrcchāvilāpau kurute kurute sāhase manaḥ | karoti ‘karoti duḥkhaṃ cittena’ ka khacittaṃ duḥkhena yo 'sau karuṇa ucyate || 76 || bhujiḥ pālanakauṭilyābhyavahārānubhūtiṣu | bhunakti bhugno bhūṅkte 'nnaṃ bhūṅkte sukhamitīṣyate || 77 || samīcīnārthasaṃpūrvāttato ghañ‌pratyaye sati | bhāve vā kārake vāpi rūpaṃ saṃbhoga iṣyate || 78 || sa ‘sa pāvanārthaḥ’ kapālanārthaḥ pūrvānurāgānantara ucyate | utpannā hi ratistāsminnānukūlyena pālyate || 79 || sa mānānantaraṃ prāptaḥ kauṭilyārthaṃ vigāhate | svato 'pi kuṭilaṃ prema kiṃ nu‘kimu mānānvaye sati’ ka mānānvaye sati || 80 || pravāsānantare tasyābhyavahārārthateṣyate | tatra hyupoṣitairannamiva nirviśyate ratiḥ || 81 || karuṇānantaragato 'nubhāvārthaḥ‘ 'nubhāvārthaḥ sa kathyate’ ka kha sa kathyate | ‘viśrambhavadbhiḥ’ ka kha gavistrambhavadbhirasminhi ‘mukhamevānubhūyate’ ghasukhamevānubhūyate || 82 || yadi vā bhoga ityasya saṃprayogārthavācinaḥ | samāsamā samupasargeṇa samāse ‘caturāścaturo 'rthān pracakṣate’ ka khacatvāro viśeṣāstamupāsatetaṃ saṃbhogam || 83 || sa saṃkṣipto 'tha‘saṃkṣipto 'rthasaṃkīrṇa’ ka saṃkīrṇaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ samyagṛddhimān | anantaropadiṣṭeṣu saṃbhogeṣūpapadyate || 84 || nave hi saṅgame prāyo yuvānaḥ sādhvasādibhiḥ | saṃkṣiptāneva ratyarthamupacārānprayuñjate || 85 || mānasyānantare teṣāṃ vyalīkasmaraṇādibhiḥ | roṣaśeṣānusaṃdhānātsaṃkaraḥ kena vāryate || 86 || saṃpūrṇaḥ pūrṇakāmānāṃ kāmināṃ proṣyasaṃgame | utkaṇṭhitānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhamupabhogaḥ pravartate || 87 || pratyāgate 'pi yatraiṣā ratipuṣṭiḥ priye jane‘prayojane’ ka | sā kimāvarṇyate yūnāṃ tatraiva mṛtajīvite || 88 || pūrvānurāgaḥ‘pūrvānurāgapūrvāṇāṃ’ ka kha pūrvāṇāṃ vyutpattibhirudāhṛtaḥ | anantarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tatsamāse niruktayaḥ || 89 || vṛttistatrājahatsvārthā jahatsvārthāpi vartatām | pradhānamanupaskṛtya na tadartho nivartate || 90 || prathamānantare vṛtterajahatsvārthateṣyate | nātyantamajahatsvārthāṃ tāṃ mānānantare viduḥ || 91 || pravāsānantare tvīṣadajahatsvārthateṣyate | karuṇārthasya gandho 'pi nāstyeva tadanantare || 92 || aṣṭamīcandrakaḥprakīrṇakeṣu spṛhayantīvratamaṣṭamīcandrakaḥ. sa hi caitracaturthīto 'ṣṭamacaturthyāmupādīyamānaḥ kāminībhirarcyate yasyāṃ yavastrastareṣvabalā lolanti sā kundacaturthīkundacaturthī vasantāvatāradivasaḥ suvasantakaḥsuvasantakaḥ | yasyāṃ striyo dolāmārohanti sā āndolanacaturthīāndolanacaturthyekaśālmalīekameva sukusumanirbharaśālmalivṛkṣamāśritya sunimīlitakādibhiḥ khelatāṃ krīḍā ekaśālmalī madanotsavaḥtrayodaśyāṃ kāmadevapūjā madanotsavaḥ || 93 || gandhodakapūrṇavaṃśanāḍīśrṛṅgādibhiryūnāṃ priyajanābhiṣekakardamena krīḍā udakakṣveḍikāudakakṣveḍikāśoyatrottamastriyaḥ padābhighātenāśokaṃ vikāśya tatkusumamavataṃsayanti sā aśokottaṃsikākottaṃsikā yatrāṅganābhiścūtamañjaryo 'vacityānaṅgāya bālarāgatvenaiva dāyaṃdāyamavataṃsyante sā cūtabhañjikā, ‘bhūtabhañjikā’ ghacūtabhañjikā | puṣpāvacāyikāṃyatra yuvatyo madirāgaṇḍūṣadohadena bakulaṃ vikāśya tatpuṣpāṇyavacinvanti sā puṣpāvacāyikā cūtalatikāyatra kaste priyatama iti pṛcchadbhiḥ palāśādinavalatābhiḥ priyo jano hanyate sā cūtalatikā bhūtamātṛkāpañcātmanānunayantī bhūtamātṛkā || 94 || kadambayuddhānivarṣāsu kadambanīpahāridrakādikusumaiḥ praharaṇabhūtairdvidhā balaṃ vibhajya kāminīnāṃ krīḍā kadambayuddhāni, kādambayuddhānītyapi pāṭhaḥ navapatrikāprathamavarṣaṇaprarūḍhanavatṛṇāṅkurāsu sthalīṣu śādvalamabhyarcya bhuktapītānāṃ kṛtrimavivāhādikrīḍā navapatrikā abhinavabisāṅkurodbhedābhirāmasaraḥ samāśritya kāmimithunānāṃ krīḍā bisakhādikābisakhādikā | śakrotsavadivasaḥ śakrārcāśakrārcā kaumudīāśvine paurṇamāsī kaumudī dīpotsavo yakṣarātriḥyakṣarātrirabhyūṣakhādikāśamīdhānyānāmārdrāṇāmevāgnipakvānāmabhyavahāro 'bhyūṣakhādikā’ ‘abhyuṣakhādikā’ ityapi pāṭhaḥ || 95 || prathamata evekṣubhakṣaṇaṃ navekṣubhakṣikānavekṣubhakṣikā toyakrīḍāgrīṣmādau jalāśayāvagāhanaṃ toyakrīḍā nāthādidarśanaṃ prekṣāprekṣādidarśanam | āliṅganādiglahā durodarādikrīḍā dyūtānidyūtāni rāgoddīpanāya mādhvīkādisevā madhupānam | vātsyāyanīye kāmaśāstre krīḍādvaividhyaṃ samasyā deśyāśceti medāt | tāsu kāścidvihāya sarvā api naitābhyaḥ pṛthak tatrollikhitāṣṭīkākartrā vyākhyātā ityatrāpi tadvyākhyānaṃ samuddhṛtya vilikhāmaḥ—‘samasyāḥ krīḍā āha—yakṣarātriḥ, kaumudījāgaraḥ, suvasantakaḥ | yakṣarātririti sukharātriḥ | yakṣāṇāṃ tatra saṃnidhānāt | tatra prāyaśo lokasya dyūtakrīḍā | kaumudījāgara iti | āśvayujyāṃ hi paurṇamāsyāṃ kaumudyā jyotstrāyāḥ prakarṣeṇa pravṛtteḥ | tatra dolādyūtaprāyāḥ krīḍāḥ | suvasantaka iti | suvasanto madanotsavaḥ | tatra nṛtyagītavādyaprāyāḥ krīḍāḥ | etā māhimānyaḥ krīḍāḥ || deśyā āha —sahakārabhañjikā, abhyūṣakhādikā, bisakhādikā, navapatrikā, udakakṣveḍikā, pāñcālānuvānam, ekaśālmalī, kadambayuddhāni, tāstāśca māhimānyo deśyāśca krīḍā janebhyo viśiṣṭamācareyuḥ | iti saṃbhūyakrīḍāḥ | sahakārabhañjiketi | sahakāraphalānāṃ bhañjanaṃ yatra krīḍāyām | abhyūṣa़khādikā phalānāṃ viṭapasthānāmagnau ploṣitānāṃ khādanaṃ yatra | bisakhādikā bisānāṃ mṛṇālānāṃ khādanaṃ yatra | saraḥsamīpavāsināmityete dve kvacitkaciddṛśyete | navaṃpatrikā prathamavarṣaṇena prarūḍhanavapatrāsu vanasthalīṣu yā krīḍā sā prāyeṇāṭavīsamīpavāsināmāṭavikānāṃ ca | udakakṣveḍiketi | ‘vaṃśanāḍī smṛtā kṣveḍā siṃhanādaśca kathyate’ iti | udakapūrṇā kṣveḍā yasyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ sā madhyadeśyānām | yasyāḥ śrṛṅgakrīḍeti prasiddhiḥ | pāñcālānuyānam | bhinnālāpaceṣṭitaiḥ pāñcālakrīḍā yathā mithilāyām | ekaśālmalī ekameva mahāntaṃ kusumanirbharaṃ śālmalīvṛkṣamāśritya tatratyakusumābharaṇānāṃ krīḍā | yathā vaidarbhāṇām | yavacaturthī vaiśākhaśuklacaturthyā śrāvaṇaśuklatṛtīyāyāṃ hindolakrīḍā | madanotsavo madanapratikṛtipūjanam | damanabhañjikā parasparaṃ sugandhapuṣpaviśeṣāvataṃsanam | holākā ... ... .... | aśokottaṃsikā aśokapuṣpaiḥ śirobhūvaṇaracanā | puṣpāvacāyikā puṣpakrīḍā | cūtalatikā cūtapallavāvataṃsanam | ikṣumañjikā ikṣukhaṇḍamaṇḍanam | kadambayuddhāni kadambakusumaiḥ praharaṇabhūtaidvidhāṃ balaṃ vibhajya yuddhāni | kadambagrahaṇaṃ kusumasukumārapraharaṇasūcanārtham | yaṣṭīṣṭakādiyuddhāni tu na kāryāṇi | yathā pauṇḍrāṇāṃ yuddhaṃ kvacitkaciddṛśyate | tāstāśceti | yā yā loke pravṛttipūrvāḥ | māhimānya iti mahimā mahattvaṃ tadvidyate yāsāmiti | ‘saṃjñāyā manmāmyām 5|2|137’ iti nipratyayaḥ | sarvadeśavyāpinya ityarthaḥ | deśe bhavā deśyāḥ | prādeśinya ityarthaḥ | janebhyo viśiṣṭamiti ghaṭādayo nāgarakāṇāmiti | samasyāstu sādhāraṇāḥ | tatra janā nāgarakāśca krīḍanti | tasmāttebhyo viśiṣṭamācareyuḥ nāgaratvadyotanārtham | saṃbhūyakrīḍā iti | āsu nāgarakāṇāṃ dravyamupahārya saṃbhūyakrīḍanāt | kandarpacūḍāmaṇikartā vīrabhadro 'pi—‘kuryācca yakṣarātriṃ sukharātriḥ sā ca kathyate loke | aikyaṃ kojāgarayā kaumudyāstatra nirdiṣṭam || suvasantako 'tra śāstre bhavati vasantasya vāsaraḥ prathamaḥ | bisakhādikā sarasyāṃ bisabhuktiḥ kīrtitā lokaiḥ || madanārthitāmrakusumairavataṃse cāmrabhañjikā proktā | abhyūṣakhādikaivaṃ jñātavyā granthataḥ parataḥ || anyonyaṃ jalasekaḥ pānīyakṣvaiḍikeritā vibudhaiḥ | kṛtrimavivāhalīlā kathitā navapatrikā ta़jjñaiḥ || kṛtrimaputrakalīlā syādanuyānaṃ tathā tu pāñcālyāḥ | śālmalyāmadhiruhya krīḍaikā śālmalī kathitā || yuddhaṃ kadambamukulaiḥ pravibhajya balaṃ parasparaṃ yatra | syāttatkadambayuddhaṃ kuryādanyāstathā līlāḥ ||’ iti jayamaṅgalākarturanuvyācaṣṭe |madhupānaṃ ca prakīrṇānīti jānate || 96 || nityo naimittikaścānyaḥ‘naimittikaścānyo’ ka gha sāmānyo 'nyo viśeṣavān | pracchanno 'nyaḥ prakāśo 'nyaḥ kṛtrimākṛtrimāvubhau || 97 || sahajāhāryanāmānau parau yauvanajo 'paraḥ | ‘vistrambhajaśca’ ka khavistrambhajaśca premāṇo dvādaśaite maharddhayaḥ || 98 || cakṣuḥprītirmanaḥsaṅgaḥ saṃkalpotpattisaṃtatiḥ | pralāpo jāgaraḥ kārśyamaratirviṣayāntare || 99 || lajjāvisarjanaṃ vyādhirunmādo mūrcchanaṃ muhuḥ | maraṇaṃ ceti vijñeyāḥ krameṇa premapuṣṭayaḥ || 100 || ‘nāyakaḥ prati pūrvā 'yamupapūrvo 'nunāyakaḥ’ ka khanāyakaḥ pratipūrvo 'sāvupapūrvo 'nunāyakaḥ | nāyikā pratipurvāsāvupapūrvānunāyikā || 101 || nāyikānāyakābhāsāvubhayābhāsa ityapi | tiryakṣu ca tadābhāsa‘tiryakṣu ca tadābhāsā’ ka kha iti dvādaśa nāyakāḥ || 102 || teṣu sarvaguṇopetaḥ kathāvyāpī ca nāyakaḥ | anyāyavāṃstaducchedya uddhataḥ pratināyakaḥ || 103 || tataḥ kaiścidguṇairhīnaḥ pūjyaścaivopanāyakaḥ | samo nyūno 'pi vā tasya kanīyānanunāyakaḥ || 104 || syātkathāvyāpinī sarvaguṇayuktā ca nāyikā | heturīrṣyāyitādīnāṃ sapatnī pratināyikā || 105 || tataḥ kaiścidguṇairhīnā pūjyā caivopanāyikā | samā nyūnāpi vā kiṃcitkanīyasyanunāyikā || 106 || tadābhāsāstathaiva syurbhedāścaiṣāṃ‘bhedāsteṣāṃ’ ka kha guṇādibhiḥ | nāyakastatra guṇata uttamo madhyamo 'dhamaḥ || 107 || ‘prākṛtaḥ’ khaprakṛteḥ sāttvikaḥ sa syādrājasastāmasastathā | sādhāraṇo 'nanyajātiḥ‘ananyajāniḥ’ kha sa vijñeyaḥ parigrahāt || 108 || uddhato lalitaḥ śānta udātto dhairyavṛttitaḥ | śaṭho dhṛṣṭo 'nukūlaśca dakṣiṇaśca pravṛttitaḥ || 109 || guṇato nāyikāpi syāduttamā madhyamādhamā | mugdhā madhyā pragalbhā ca vayasā kauśalena vā‘ca’ ka kha || 110 || dhīrādhīrā ca dhairyeṇa svānyadīyāparigrahāt | ụ̄dhānụ̄dhopayamanātkramājjyeṣṭhā kanīyasī || 111 || mānarddheruddhatodāttā śāntā ca lalitā ca sā | sāmānyā ca punarbhūśca svairiṇī ceti vṛttitaḥ || 112 || ājīvatastu gaṇikā rūpājīvā vilāsinī | avasthāto 'parāścāṣṭau vijñeyāḥ khaṇḍitādayaḥ || 113 || ‘nidrākūṇita’ ka khanidrākulitatāmrākṣo nārīnakhavibhūṣitaḥ | prātareti priyo yasyāḥ ‘kutaścitkhaṇḍiteti sā’ ka, ‘kuttaścitkhaṇḍitā tusā’ khakutaścitseha khaṇḍitā || 114 || cāṭukāramapi prāṇanāthaṃ kopādapāsya yā | paścāttāpamavāpnoti kalahāntaritā tu sā || 115 || dutīmaharahaḥ preṣya kṛtvā saṃketakaṃ kvacit | yasyā na militaḥ preyānvipralabdheti tāṃ viduḥ || 116 || sā tu vāsakasajjā syātsajjite vāsaveśmani | priyamāstīrṇaparyaṅkā‘paryaṅke’ ka kha bhūṣitā yā pratīkṣate || 117 || svādhīnapatikā sā tu yasyāḥ pārśvaṃ na muñcati | priyaścitraratakrīḍāsukhāsvādanalolupaḥ || 118 || puṣpeṣupīḍitā kāntaṃ yāti yā sābhisārikā | priyo deśāntare yasyāḥ sā tu proṣitabhartṛkā || 119 || yasyāḥ samucte 'pyahni pravāsī naiti vallabhaḥ | virahotkaṇṭhitā sā tu uttamādayo vilāsinyantāścaturviṃśatiḥ, khaṇḍitādavo virahoktaṇṭhitāścāṣṭāviti dvātriṃśatdvātriṃśaditi nāyikāḥ || 120 || hīnapātrāṇi śeṣāṇi pīṭhamardo vidūṣakaḥ | viṭaceṭau patākāśca sakhyaścaiṣāṃ parigrahaḥ || 121 || mahākulīnataudārye mahābhāgyaṃ kṛtajñatā | rūpayauvanavaidagdhya‘śīlasaubhāgyasaṃmadaḥ’ kaśīlasaubhāgyasaṃpadaḥ || 122 || manitodāravākyatvamadaridrāadaridretyanurāgitāyā viśeṣaṇam, tena sthirānurāgitetyarthaḥnurāgitā | dvādaśeti guṇānāhurnāyakeṣvābhigāmikān‘nārikerābhrapākādyā’ kha, ‘nārikelābhrapākādyāḥ’ gha || 123 || ‘premasaṃparkabhaktayaḥ’ ka khamṛdvīkānālikerāmrapākādyāḥ pākabhaktayaḥ | nīlīkusumbhamañjiṣṭhārāgādyā rāgabhaktayaḥ || 124 || antarvyājabahirvyājanirvyājā vyājabhaktayaḥ | dharmārthakāmodarkāśca ‘rasālaṃkārasaṃkarāt’ kapremasūdarkabhaktayaḥ || 125 || vākyavacca prabandheṣu rasālaṃkārasaṃkarān | niveśayantyanaucityaparīhāreṇa sūrayaḥ || 126 || caturvṛttyaṅgasaṃpannaṃ‘caturvṛttyaṅkasaṃpannaṃ’ ka kha caturodāttanāyakam | caturvargaphalaṃ ko na prabandhaṃ bāndhavīyati || 127 || mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho 'vamarśaśca manīṣibhiḥ | smṛtānirvahaṇaṃ ceti prabandhe pañca saṃdhayaḥ || 128 || avistṛtamasaṃkṣiptaṃ śravyavṛttaṃ ‘susandhi ca’ ka sugandhi ca | bhinnasargāntavṛttaṃ ca kāvyaṃ loko 'bhinandati || 129 || puropavanarāṣṭrādimudrāśramavarṇanaiḥ | deśasaṃpatprabandhasya rasotkarṣāya kalpate || 130 || ‘ṛturātriṃ’ ka kha ṛturātriṃ‘divārkendūdayāstamayavarṇanaiḥ’ ka khadivārkendūdayāstamayakīrtanaiḥ | kālaḥ kāvyeṣu saṃpanno rasapuṣṭiṃ niyacchati || 131 || rājakanyākumārastrīsenāsenāṅgabhaṅgibhiḥ | ‘pātrāṇāṃ varṇanātkāvye’ ka khapātrāṇāṃ varṇanaṃ kāvye rasastroto 'dhitiṣṭhati || 132 || udyānasalilakrīḍāmadhupānaratotsavāḥ | vipralambhā vivāhāśca ceṣṭāḥ kāvye rasāvahāḥ || 133 || mantradūtaprayāṇājināyakābhyudayādibhiḥ | puṣṭiḥ puruṣakārasya rasaṃ kāvyeṣu varṣati || 134 || nāvarṇanaṃ nagaryāderdoṣāya viduṣāṃ matam | yadi śailarturātryādervarṇanenaiva ‘puṣyati’ khatuṣyati || 135 || guṇataḥ prāgupanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām | nirākaraṇamityeṣa mārgaḥ prakṛtisundaraḥ || 136 || ‘baṃśavṛttaśruttādīni’ ka khavaṃśavīryaśrutādīni varṇayitvā riporapi | tajjayānnāyakotkarṣakathanaṃ ca dhinoti naḥ || 137 || athaiṣāṃ lakṣaṇodāharaṇāni— ‘tatra’ ka kha nāstitatra, manonukūleṣvartheṣu sukhasaṃvedanaṃ ratiḥ | ‘āsaṃprayogaviṣayā’ ka khaasaṃprayogaviṣayā saiva prītirnigadyate || 138 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya bhāvo yathā— ‘harastu kiṃcitpa‘pariluptadhairyaḥ’ kharivṛttadhairyaścandroyārambha ivāmburāśiḥ | umāmukhe bimbaphalādharoṣṭhe byāpārayāmāsa vilocanāni || 1 ||’ atra bimboṣṭhatvādibhirmanonukūle pārvatīmukhe vilocanavyāpārānumito maheśvarasyābhilāṣaviśeṣaḥ ‘sāttviko’ ka khasāttvikāderanu‘ratyutpādāt’ katpādātsukhānubhavasyotpattimātramanumāpayati || tadrūpeṇaiva sāttvikotpattau janma yathā— ‘‘āsīdvaraḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ’ iti mallināthoṭṭaṅkitaḥ pāṭhaḥabhūdvaraḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ khinnāṅguliḥ saṃvavṛte kumārī | ‘vṛttistayoḥ pāṇisamāgamena samaṃ vibhakteva manobhavasya’ mudritapāṭhaḥtasmindvaye tatkṣaṇamātmavṛttiḥ samaṃ vibhakteva manobhavena || 2 ||’ atra svedaromodbhedayoḥ‘svedaromodgamayoḥ’ kha sāttvikayorutpādādrasasya ratirūpeṇāvirbhāvo 'vagamyate | janmaiva ‘janmaiva sattvādyutpattau yathā’ khasaṃcāryutpattau yathā— ‘atra ca 'tayorupāntapratisāritāni’, ‘tayorapāṅgapraticālicāni’, ‘tayorapāṅgaprativāritāni’ ityevaṃvidhā aneke pāṭhāḥtayorapāṅgapravicāritāni kiṃcivdyaatrāpi ‘kriyāsamāpattinivartitāni’, ‘kriyāsamāpattivivartitāni’, ‘kriyāsamāpattiṣu kātarāṇi’, ‘tayoḥ samāpattiṣu kātarāṇi kiṃcivdyavasthāpitasaṃhṛtāni’ ityevaṃvidhā aneke pāṭhāḥvasthāpitasaṃhṛtāni | hrīyantraṇāmānaśire manojñāmanyonyalolāni vilocanāni || 3 ||’ atra hrīḥ saṃcāribhāvo jāyamāno rasasya janma jñāpayati | ‘tadevānubhavotpattau’ ka, ‘tadevānubhayotpattau’ khatadevānubhāvotpattau yathā— ‘tataḥ sunandāvacanāvasāne lajjāṃ ‘tanūkṛtya’ mudritapāṭhaḥmṛdūkṛtya narendrakanyā | dṛṣṭyā prasādāmalayā kumāraṃ pratyagrahītsaṃvaraṇasrajeva || 4 ||’ atra dṛṣṭilakṣaṇaḥ śarīrārambho 'nubhāvo‘śarīrārambhe 'nubhāvo bhavan’ ka kha, ‘śarīrānubhāvo bhavan’ ga bhavan rasāvirbhāvaṃ lakṣayati | anubhāvāderanekasyaikasya vā punarutpattiranubandhaḥ | so 'nekasya yathā— ‘vivṛṇvatī śailasutāpi bhāvamaṅgaiḥ ‘sphuradvālakadambakalpaiḥ’ kha mudritakumārekvacidbālakadambakalpaiḥ | sācīkṛtā cārutareṇa tasthau mukhena paryastavilocanena || 5 ||’ atra devyāḥ ‘śive’ ghasmarārau pūrvamutpannā ratiḥ sābhilāṣatadavalokana‘tadavalokanena’ ka khaviviktavasantādibhiruddīpyamānā romāñcāvahitthalakṣaṇābhyāṃ sāttvikavyabhicāribhyāmanubadhyate || ekasyaiva punaḥ ‘punaḥpunarutpattiryathā’ khapunaryathā— ‘yāntyā muhurvalitakaṃdharamānanaṃ ta- dāvṛttavṛntaśatapattranibhaṃ vahantyā | digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ || 6 ||’ atra mālatyā mādhavaviṣaye pūrvamutpannā ratirvasantāvatāra‘vasantāvatārataḥ saṃnidhiviśeṣa’ ghatatsaṃnidhiviśeṣapradarśanādibhiruddīpyamānā punaḥ punarutpannena valitagrīvakaṭākṣavikṣepalakṣaṇena śarīrārambhānubhāvenānubadhyate | atraiva‘atra ca’ gha pustake pāṭhāntaram mādhavasya mālatīviṣaye tadaharevotpannā ratistairevoddīpanairuddīpyamānā harṣadhṛtismṛtimativyādhyādibhiḥ saṃcāribhāvairvāgārambheṇa cānubhāvenānubadhyate || ratirūpeṇaiva rasaniṣpattiryathā— ‘taṃ vīkṣya vepathumatī sarasāṅgyaṣṭi- rnikṣepa‘nikṣepaṇāya’ ka kha mudrite eva padamuddhṛtamarpayantī‘muddhṛtamudvahantī’ kumārasaṃbhavasya mudritapāṭhaḥ | mārgācalavyatikarākuliteva sindhuḥ śailādhirājatanayā na yayau na tasthau || 7 ||’ atra janmāntarānubhavasaṃskārātpratikūle 'pi śūlini ‘śivāyāḥ’ ghaśailātmajāyāḥ sarvakālamevāvicchinnā ratiści‘ciraṃ viyuktasya’ ka kharaviyuktasya duścareṇāpi tapasā prārthanīya-saṃgamasya tasyākasmikadarśanenoddīpyamānā sadyaḥsamupajāyamānasāttvikasvedastambhavepathūpalakṣitairharṣa‘harṣadhatismṛtyāvega-’ ka khasmṛtyāvegasādhvasādibhirvyabhicāribhāvaiḥ‘vyabhicāribhirbhāvaiḥ’ ka kha ‘vikṣepalakṣaṇena’ ka khapadanikṣepalakṣaṇena ca śarīrānubhāvena saṃsṛjyate | so 'yaṃ vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyoge‘saṃyogaiḥ’ ka kha ratirūpeṇa raso niṣpadyate | ratirūpeṇaiva ‘ratipuṣṭiḥ’ karasapuṣṭiryathā— ‘pīnaśroṇi gabhīranābhi nibhṛtaṃ madhye bhṛśoccastanaṃ pāyādvaḥ parirabdhamabdhiduhituḥ kāntena kāntaṃ vapuḥ | svāvāsānupaghātanirvṛtamanāstatkālamīladdṛśe yasmai so 'cyutanābhipadmavasatirvedhāḥ śivaṃ dhyāyati || 8 ||’ atra sarvadaiva śrīvatsalakṣmaṇo lakṣmīviṣaye mahākulīnataudāryasthirānurāgitārūpayauvanavaidagdhyaśīlasaubhāgyamahābhāgyādibhiḥ samutpannā ratistadavayavaviśeṣakāmanīyakavibhāvanenoddīpanavibhāvātiśayenoddīpyamānāṃ brahmaṇaḥ samakṣamapyāliṅganalakṣaṇena śarīrārambhānubhāvenānumīyamānāṃ lajjāpraṇāśalakṣaṇāṃ premapuṣṭeraṣṭamīmavasthāmadhyāste | atra cānuktā api sāttvikā vyabhicāriṇo 'nye 'pi cānubhāvaviśeṣāḥ pratīyante | śriyo 'pi ca samagrātmaguṇasaṃpadāśraye śrīvatsalakṣmaṇi tathābhūtā tadabhyadhikā vā‘ca’ gha ratiḥ pravṛddhapremapriyatamāliṅganalakṣaṇenoddīpanavibhāvevoddīpyamānā nayananimīlanānumeyāṃ samastasāttvikānubhāvavyabhicārihetuṃ premapuṣṭeruttamā‘ruttarā’ khamavasthāmāśrayati | so 'yaṃ viṣayasaundaryādāśrayaprakṛteḥ saṃskārapāṭavāduddīpanātiśayācca parāṃ koṭimāvahan rasaḥ puṣṭa ityucyate | atraiva brahmaṇaḥ śriyaṃ prati manoharā mameyaṃ sṛṣṭiriti, ratnākarasyeyamātmajeti, candrā-mṛtādīnāmiyaṃ sodaryeti, viṣṇoriyaṃ priyatameti, kāmasyeyaṃ jananītyādibhya ālambanebhyaḥ samutpannā prītiḥ svāvāsānupaghātinā śarīrasaṃniveśena dṛṅmimīlanajanitayā ca tadupaghātaśaṅkayoddīpyamānā tatkṣaṇopajāyamānatayā āvegasmṛtivitarkonmādamohacintādibhirvyabhicāribhāvaistadanumeyaiśca stambhavepathuprabhṛtisāttvikaiḥ śivānudhyānalakṣaṇena budhdyārambhānubhāvena saṃsṛjyamānā paraṃ prakarṣamārohantī‘mārohatīti’ ka kha pratīyate || ratau bhayādisaṃkaro yathā— ‘rāhoścandrakalāmivānanacarīṃ daivātsamāsādya me dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayādācchindataḥ preyasīm | ātaṅkādvikalaṃ drutaṃ karuṇayā vikṣobhitaṃ vismayāt krodhena jvalitaṃ mudā vikasitaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ vartatām || 9 ||’ atra mādhavasya mālatyāṃ pūrvamutpannā ratistadavasthā‘tadavasthāvalokanādibhiḥ’ ga ghalokanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānā bhayaśokavismayakrodhaharṣairapi rasāntaraiḥ pṛthakpṛthagvibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogānniṣpadyamānaiḥ saṃkīryamāṇā manovāgbuddhi‘śārīrānubhāvaiḥ’ ghaśarīrārambhānubhāvairbhayādyanurūpaiśca sāttvikavyabhicāribhiḥ saṃparke paraṃ prakarṣamārohantī pratīyate | tatra cetaso vaikalyādiparibhāvanaṃ manaārambhaḥ, vākyoccāraṇaṃ vāgārambhaḥ, rāhoriva dasyoścandrakalāmiva preyasīmityādi budhdyārambhaḥ, ‘ācchidyata’ ghaācchindata ityādi śarīrārambhaḥ, bhayādīnāṃ ca pañcānāmapi yathākramaṃ rāhoriti, candrakalāmivānanacarīmiti, daivātsamāsādya me iti, dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayāditi, ācchindataḥ preyasīmityālambanavibhāvāstatsvarūpaparibhāvanānyuddīpanavibhāvāḥ, vikalam, drutam, vikṣobhitam, ‘calitam’ kajvalitam, vikasitaṃ ceta‘vikasitaṃ ca ta’ gha, ‘vikasitamityanubhāvāḥ’ ka ityanubhāvāḥ, ātaṅkakaruṇāvismayakrodhamudanurūpāśca kampāśrustambhavaivarṇyaromāñcādayaḥ sāttvikāḥ, mohaviṣādavita‘viṣādodakoṃgratā’ ka , ‘viṣādāmarṣogratā’ kharkogratādhṛtyādayo vyabhicāriṇaścānumīyamānā niṣpattihetavo bhavanti | so 'yaṃ tulyakālabalotpattikāraṇānāṃ bhayādiniṣpattīnāṃ ratau saṃsargaḥ saṃkara ityucyate || ratirūpeṇa rasaprakarṣasya hrāso yathā— ‘kopo yatra ‘bhṛkuṭiracanā’ ghabhrukuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ yatrānyonya‘yatrānyonyaṃ’ kasmitamanunayo dṛṣṭipātaḥ prasādaḥ | tasya premṇastadidamadhunā vaiśasaṃ paśya jātaṃ tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi na ca me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ || 10 ||’ atra yoṣiti roṣākhyarasāntaratiraskārātpuruṣe ‘cānurāgā-’ kha , ‘cānyarāgā’ ghacānyarāgādratiprakarṣasya ‘hāso 'vagamyo’ ka khahrāso 'vasīyate | ratirūpeṇa hīnapātreṣu rasābhāso yathā— ‘vikkiṇaï māhamāsambhi ‘pāmaro pāraṇaṃ vi illeṇa’ ka, ‘pāmaro pāraḍiṃ vaïlleṇa’ kha, ‘pāmaro pāiḍiṃ vaïlleṇa’ mudritagāthāsa॰pāmaro pāraḍiṃ vaïlleṇa | ‘ṇiddhūmamummure sāmalīṣa thaṇama ṇiacchanto’ ka , ‘ṇiddhamamummura ccia sāmalīe thaṇo paḍicchanto’ iti mudritagāthāsa॰, ‘vidu samummure sāmalīe thaṇa ṇiacchanto’ khadiṭṭhiṃ samummure sāmalīa thaṇae ṇiacchanto || 11 ||’ [vikrīṇīte māghamāse pāmaraḥprāvarakaṃ balīvardena | dṛṣṭiṃ samurmure śyāmalyāḥ stanake niyacchan ||] tiryakṣu yathā— ‘‘paapāḍiaṃ’ ka ‘pāapaḍia’ khapāaḍiaṃ sohaggaṃ taṃbāe ‘usaha goṭṭhamajjhammi’ ka ‘vasahagoṭhṭhamajjhammi’ khauaha goṭṭhamajjhammi | duṭṭhavasahassa siṃge acchiuḍaṃ kaṇḍuantīe || 12 ||’ [prakaṭitaṃ saubhāgyaṃ gavā paśyata goṣṭhamadhye | duṣṭavṛṣabhasya śṛṅge 'kṣipuṭaṃ kaṇḍūyamānayā ||] nāyakapratiyogiṣu yathā— ‘pulaaṃ ‘jaṇeti’ ka ‘jaṇati’ khajaṇenti dahakaṃdharassa rāhavasarā sarīrammi | jaṇaasuāphaṃsama‘phaaṃsa’ ka ‘phaṃsa pahaggha’ khahagghavia ‘karaalāṭhṭhavimukkā’ kakaraalāaṭṭhiavimukkā || 13 ||’ [pulakaṃ janayanti daśakaṃdharasya rāghavaśarāḥ śarīre | janakasutāsparśamahārghā iva karatalākṛṣṭavimuktāḥ ||] gauṇeṣu yathā— ‘uvvahaï ‘navatiṇaṃkura’ ka khanavataṇaṃkuraromañcapasāhiāiṃ‘pasāhiāi’ ka kha aṃgāiṃ | ‘pāusalacchīe’ ka kha pāusalacchīa paoharehiṃ paḍivelliovijjho‘viṃjho’ kha || 14 ||’ [udvahati navatṛṇāṅkuraromāñcaprasādhitānyaṅgāni | prāvṛṭlakṣmyāḥ payodharābhyāṃ pratiprerito vindhyaḥ ||] ‘ete catvāro 'pi’ ka, ‘ta ete 'pi catvāro’ kataṃ ete catvāro 'pi rasābhāsā ucyante || ratāveva lajjāroṣarūparasāntarayoḥ praśamo yathā— ‘dṛṣṭe locanavanmanāṅyukulitaṃ pārśvasthitevakrava -nnyagbhūtaṃ bahirāsitaṃ pulakavatsparśaṃ samātanvati | nīvībandhavadāgataṃ śithilatāmābhāṣamāṇe tato mānenāpagataṃ hriyeva sudṛśaḥ pādaspṛśi preyasi || 15 ||’ atra balavabhdyāṃ priyapremānunayābhyāṃ hrīroṣayorupaśamaḥ kriyate || ratāveva roṣarūparasasya śeṣo yathā— ‘eṣyatyutsukamāgate ‘vivalitaṃ’ ka khavicalitaṃ saṃbhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ saṃśliṣyatyaruṇaṃ gṛhītavasane kopāñcitabhrūlatam | māninyāścaraṇānativyatikare bāṣpāmbupūrṇaṃ‘bāṣpāmbupūrṇekṣaṇaṃ’ ka 'bāṣpāmbupūrṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ’ kha kṣaṇāccakṣurjātamaho prapañcacaturaṃ jātāgasi preyasi || 16 ||’ atra kasyāścidbalavatā premṇonmūlitasyāpi mānasya ‘śeṣe 'nuvartate’ kaśeṣo 'nuvartate | ta ete ‘bhāvā daśāpi’ kabhāvādayo daśāpi rasaprakārā hāsādiṣvapi ‘prāyaśo’ khaprāyo dṛśyante | granthagauravabhayātkva‘nna kvacidudāhriyante’ kha citkvacidudāhriyante || tatra ‘nyaṅgaḥ krīḍādibhiḥ’ ka, ‘vyaṅgakrīḍādibhiḥ’ kha, sollavaco nyaṅgavācyamnyaṅgavrīḍādibhiścetovikāro hāsa ucyate | tadrūpeṇa rasasya bhāvo yathā— ‘kanakakalaśasvacche rādhāpayodharamaṇḍale navajaladharaśyāmāmātmadyutiṃ pratibimbitām | asitasicayaprāntabhrāntyā muhurmuhurutkṣipan jayati janitavrīḍāhāsaḥ priyāhasito hariḥ || 17 ||’ atra ‘rādhayā vyaṅgitasya’ kharādhāyā harinyaṅgād, harestu vrīḍāto hāsasya sattāmātraṃ pratīyate || śokaścittasya vaidhuryamabhīṣṭavirahādibhiḥ || 139 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā— ‘hṛdayānnāpayāto 'si dikṣu sarvāsu ‘vīkṣyate’ ghadṛśyase | vatsa rāma gato 'sīti saṃtāpādanumīyase || 18 ||’ atra daśasthasya rāmaviyogādutpannastadguṇasmaraṇādibhiruddīpitaścintāsaṃtāpādirvāgārambheṇa cānuṣajyamānaḥ śokarūpeṇa raso niṣpadyate || pratikūleṣu taikṣṇyasya prabodhaḥ krodha ucyate | tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā— ‘mayyevamasma‘matsaraṇa’ kharaṇadāruṇacittavṛttau vṛtaṃ rahaḥ praṇayamapratipadyamāne‘pratipādyamāne’ ka | bhedādbhuvoḥ kuṭilayoratilohitākṣya bhagnaṃ śarāsanamivātiruṣā smarasya || 19 ||’ atra yadyapi ‘vibhāvānubhāvasaṃcārisaṃyoga’ ka khavibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogalakṣaṇāyā rasaniṣpatteḥ 'adhikamatiruṣātilohitākṣyā’ iti prakarṣanimittamatiśabdopādānaṃ vidyate, tathāpyuttamanāyikāśrayaḥ priyaviṣaye na roṣaḥ prakarṣamāsādayati || kāryārambheṣu saṃrambhaḥ stheyānutsāha iṣyate || 140 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā— ‘mūrdhnā jāmbavato 'bhivādya caraṇāvāpṛcchya senāpatī- nāśvāsyāśrumukhānmuhuḥ priyasakhīnpreṣyānsamādiśya ca | ārambhaṃ jagṛhe mahendraśikharādambhonidherlaṅghane raṃhasvī raghunāthapādarajasāmuccaiḥ smaranmārutiḥ || 20 ||’ atrābhivādanapraśnāśvāsanasamādeśanādriśikharārohaṇeṣṭadevatā‘devasmaraṇānāṃ’ ghasmaraṇānāṃ pūrvaraṅgaparyavasāyitvenānuddīpanavibhāvatvādanutsāhānubhāvatvācca nāyamanubandho niṣpattiḥ prakarṣo vā bhavati || bhayaṃ cittasya vaiklavyaṃ raudrādijanitaṃ viduḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā— ‘mantrānmṛtyujito japadbhirasakṛdhdyāyadbhiriṣṭānsurān śuṣyattālubhirākulākulapadairnirvāgbhirutkampibhiḥ | adhvanyairiha jīviteśamahiṣavyādhūmradhūmāvilā laṅghyante karimāṃsaghasmara‘raṇātkauleyakāḥ’ ka , ‘ruṇatkauleyakāḥ’ ga gharaṇatkauleyakāḥ pallayaḥ || 21 ||’ atra yadyapi pallīnāmālambanatvam, ‘na tadiśeṣaṇayoḥ’ khatadviśeṣaṇayoruddīpanatvam, mantrajapāderanubhāvatvam, tāluśoṣādīnāṃ vyabhicāritvamiti vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogo 'sti, tathāpi mantrajapeṣṭadevatānudhyānayorlaṅghanopāyaparatvānna bhayarūpeṇa ‘rasaniṣpattiḥ’ karasasya niṣpattiḥ | adhvanyānāṃ hi tanniṣpattāvalpasattvatayā stambhamohamūrcchāmaraṇādibhirupāyaprayogo na ghaṭate || jugupsā garhaṇārthānāṃ doṣasaṃdarśanādibhiḥ || 141 || tadrūpeṇa rasasyānugamo yathā— ‘‘re hasta’ ka khahe hasta dakṣiṇa mṛtasya śiśordvijasya jīvātave visṛja śūdramunau kṛpāṇam | rāmasya gātramasi nirbharagarbhakhinnasītā- pravāsanapaṭoḥ karuṇā kutaste || 22 ||’ atra yadyapi dvijaśiśorjīvanāya munirapi śūdro vadhya iti na rāmasyātmakarmanindā tathāpyanapakāriṇaṃ‘pyanayakāriṇaṃ’ kha jighāṃsato ‘ghṛṇā pravarttata iti sītāparityāga’ ka khaghṛṇānuvartata eva | sītā-parityāgaviṣayatvenaivātra jugupsānugamo grahītavyaḥ | ‘śambūkaviṣaye’ kaśambukaviṣaye punarasyā janmamātrameveti || vismayaścittavistāraḥ padārthātiśayādibhiḥ | tadrūpeṇa ‘rasasya janma yathā’ ka kharasaniṣpattiryathā— ‘kṛṣṇenāmba gatena ‘rantumadhunā’ ka kharantumasakṛnmṛdbhakṣitā svecchayā satyaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ka evamāha ‘muśalī’ ka khamusalī mithyāmba paśyānanam | vyādehīti ‘vidārite tu vadane’ ka khavikāsite ca vadane dṛṣṭa‍vā samastaṃ jaga- nmātā yasya jagāma vismayapadaṃ pāyātsa vaḥ keśavaḥ || 23 ||’ atra śiśormuṃkhe jagaddarśanamālambanavibhāvaḥ, tatsāmagryaśaiśavādyā‘śaiśavādyālokana’ ka khalocanamuddīpanavibhāvaḥ, vismayavaśaṃ jagāmetyanenānupāttā api sarve saṃcā‘sarve saṃcāriṇo’ ityasya sthāne ‘kevalaṃ saṃcāriṇaḥ’ ka khariṇo 'nubhāvāśca gṛhyante || stambhaśceṣṭāpratīghāto bhayarāgāmayādibhiḥ || 142 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya puṣṭiryathā— ‘taṃ tāṇa‘taṃ tāṇaṃ’ kha haacchāaṃ ṇiccalaloaṇasihaṃ paütthapaāvaṃ | ālekkhapaīvāṇiva ṇiaaṃ paaïcaḍulattaṇaṃ pi vialiaṃ || 24 ||’ [tatteṣāṃ hatacchāyaṃ niścalalocanaśikhaṃ proṣitapratāpam | ālekhyapradīpānāmiva nijakaṃ prakṛticaṭulatvamapi vigalitam ||] ayaṃ ca puṣṭo 'pi sāttvikatvāt sadaivānyānuyāyīti nānubhāvādibhiranubadhyate || harṣādbhutabhayādibhyo romāñco romavikriyā | tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā— ‘karimari aālagajjirajalaāsaṇipaüṇapaḍirao eso | païṇo dhaṇuravakaṃkhiṇi romaṃcaṃ kiṃ muhā vahasi || 25 ||’ [bandi akālagarjanajaladāśanipatanapratirava eṣaḥ | patyurdhanūravākāṅkṣaṇaśīle romāñca kiṃ mudhā vahasi ||] asyāpi sāttvikatvādanyānubandhādayo na jāyante | madapramadapīḍādervaisvaryaṃ gadgadaṃ viduḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā— ‘pipipriya sasasvayaṃ mumumukhāsavaṃ dehi me tatatyaja dududrutaṃ bhabhabhabhājanaṃ kāñcanam | iti skhalitajalpitaṃ madavaśātkuraṅgīdṛśaḥ prage hasitahetave sahacarībhiradhyeyata || 26 ||’ ‘ayamapi’ ka khaatrāpi sāttvikatvānniṣpanno nānyairanubadhyate || vaprurjalodgamaḥ khedo ratigharmaśramādibhiḥ || 143 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā— ‘himavyapāyādviśadādharāṇāmā‘pāṇḍarībhūta’ khapāṇḍurībhūtamukhacchavīnām | khedodgamaḥ kiṃpuruṣāṅganānāṃ cakre padaṃ ‘pattraviśeṣakeṣu’ ka khacitraviśeṣakeṣu || 27 ||’ atrāpi pūrvavadanyānuṣaṅgo na bhavati || rāgaroṣabhayādibhyaḥ kampo gātrasya vepathuḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā— ‘mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti | anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanamīdṛśānāṃ vairī na cedbhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ || 28 ||’ ayamapi prāgvadevānyairnānugamyate‘nānyairanugamyate’ ka kha | viṣādamadaroṣādervarṇānyatvaṃ vivarṇatā || 144 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā— ‘sahi ‘sahi sāhasaṃ teṇa’ kasāhasu teṇa samaṃ ahaṃ pi kiṃ ṇiggaā ‘pahaammi’ khapahāammi | aṇṇacia dīsaï jeṇa dappaṇe kāvi sā sumuho || 29 ||’ [sakhi sādhaya tena samamahamapi kiṃ nirgatā prabhāte | anyaiva dṛśyate yena darpaṇe kāpi sā sumukhī ||] ayamapi nānyairanubadhyate || aśru netrodgataṃ vāri duḥkhaśokapraharṣajam | tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā— ‘utpakṣmaṇornayanayoruparuddhavṛtti bāṣsaṃ kuru sthiratayā śithilānubandham | asminnalakṣitanatonnatabhūmibhāge mārge padāni khalu te viṣamībhavanti || 30 ||’ atra bāṣpaśavdena locanāśrayamaśrūcyate na kaṇṭhādyāśrayo duḥkhāveśaḥ | yathā—‘vilalāpa sa bāppagadgadam', ‘ ‘muhurlagnaḥ kaṇṭhe’ ka khamuhurmagnaḥ kaṇṭhe taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭīm’ ityādi‘iti’ kha || pralayastīvraduḥkhāderindriyāstamayo mataḥ || 145 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā— ‘tīvrābhiṣaṅgaprabhaveṇa vṛttiṃ mohena saṃstambhayatendriyāṇām | ajñātabhartṛvyasanā muhūrtaṃ kṛtopakāreva ratirbabhūva || 31 ||’ atra mohaśabdena mūrcchocyate, na vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇo mohaḥ || smṛtiḥ pūrvānubhūtārthaviṣayaṃ jñānamucyate || 146 || tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā— ‘itaḥ pratyādeśātsvajanamanugantuṃ vyavasitā sthitā tiṣṭhetyuccairvadati guruśiṣye gurusame | punardṛṣṭiṃ ‘bāṣpaprakara’ ka khabāṣpaprasarakaluṣāmarpitavatī mayi krūre yattatsaviṣamiva śalyaṃ dahati mām || 32 ||’ atra saviśeṣā smṛtiricchayā vāgārambheṇa cānubadhyate | ‘tiṣṭhetyādayaḥ’ khaniṣpattyādayaḥ punarasyā ratyādiniṣpattiṣveva draṣṭavyāḥ | ‘ratyādayo hi smṛtimūlatatprakaṣāpakarṣāvanuvartante’ ka kharatyādayo 'smṛtimūlatvāttatprakarṣāpakarṣāvanuvartante || ūho vitarka ityuktaḥ padārtheṣu yathāmati | tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā— ‘citte niveśya parikalpitasattvayogā‘sattvayogāt’ ka kha- n‍rūpoccayena ‘vidhinā vihitā kṛtāṅgī’ pāṭhaḥghaṭitā manasā kṛtā nu | strīratnasṛṣṭiraparā pratibhāti sā me dhāturvibhutvamanucintya vapuśca tasyāḥ || 33 ||’ so 'yamasatyaḥ satyo vā smṛtijñānacintanādidvāreṇa nirṇayānto niṣpanna ityucyate || utkaṇṭheṣṭānavāptau yo 'bhilāṣaḥ syāttadāptaye || 147 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattihrāsau yathā— ‘yāsyatyadya śakuntaleti hṛdayaṃ saṃspṛṣṭamutkaṇṭha‍yā ‘bāṣpastambhitakaṇṭhavṛttivacanam’ khakaṇṭhaḥ stambhitabāṣpavṛttikaluṣaścintājaḍaṃ darśanam | vaiklavyaṃ mama tāvadīdṛśamidaṃ snehādaraṇyaukasaḥ pīḍyante gṛhiṇaḥ kathaṃ nu‘na’ kha tanayāviśleṣaduḥkhairnavaiḥ || 34 ||’ atra vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogāt prītirivotkaṇṭhāpi tadanuṣaṅgiṇī niṣpannā uttarārdhapratipādyena ‘tathāvidhenaiva’ khaniṣedhenaiva vismayādinābhibhūyamānā hrāsa ityucyate | prakarṣaścāsyā mamāraṇyaukasa ityanena nivāryate || prayatnapūrvikārtheṣu smṛtiścinteti ‘kathyate’ ka khacocyate || 148 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā— ‘cintāṇiadaïasamāgamammi kaamaṇṇuāiṃ‘maṇṇuāi’ kha mariūṇa | suṇṇaṃ kalahāantī ‘sahīhi’ khasahīhiṁ ruṇṇā ṇa‘nāvahasiā’ gha o hasiā || 35 ||’ [cintānītadayitasamāgame kṛtamanyukāni smṛtvā | śūnyaṃ kalahāyamānā sakhībhī ruditā na vā hasitā ||] atra sakhīrodanena śūnyakalahaḥ, śūnyakalahena sākṣātkāraḥ, sākṣātkāreṇa cintā, cintayā tu mūlabhūtā ratiḥ prakṛṣyate || ātmaprakāśanaparā ceṣṭā capalatocyate || 149 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā— ‘kaścitkarābhyāmupagūḍhanālamālolapattrābhihatadvirepham | rajobhirantaḥpariveṣabandhi līlāravindaṃ bhramayāṃcakāra || 36 ||’ ‘atra līlāravindabhramaṇaceṣṭayā’ ka khaatra kaścillīlāravindabhramaṇaceṣṭayā ‘kaścidindumatyai’ ka khaindumatyai tiṣṭhate || śāstroktārthānusaṃdhānādarthanirdhāraṇaṃ matiḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā— ‘asaṃśayaṃ kṣattraparigrahakṣamā yadāryamasyāmabhilāṣi me manaḥ | satāṃ hi saṃdehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ || 37 ||’ atra pūrvārdhoktārthanirdhāraṇarūpā matiruttarārdhenānubadhyate || garvo 'nyeṣāma‘abhijñānam’ ghavajñānamātmasaṃbhāvanādibhiḥ || 150 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya puṣṭiryathā— ‘dhṛtāyudho yāvadahaṃ tāvadanyaiḥ kimāyudhaiḥ | yadvā na siddhamastreṇa mama tatkena setsyati || 38 ||’ atra karṇasyātmasaṃbhāvanayāśvatthā‘avajñānam’ ka kha manyavajñā prakṛṣyate || aheturanivartī‘anivartyāṃ ca’ ka kha ca snehaścittārdratā matā | tadrūpeṇa ‘rasaniṣpattiryathā’ gharasasya niṣpattiryathā— ‘anena kasyāpi kulāṅkureṇa spṛṣṭasya gātreṣu sukhaṃ mamaitat | kāṃ nirvṛtiṃ cetasi tasya kuryā- dyasyāyama‘yasyāyamaṅkātkṛtinaḥ prarūḍhaḥ’ṅgātkṛtinaḥ prarūḍhaḥ || 39 ||’ atra duṣyantasya sattvadamanaḥ śakuntalātanayaḥsattvadamanadarśanādutpannastadaṅgasparśasukhādibhiruddīpitaḥ spṛhāmativitarkavāgārambhaiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ sneho niṣpadyate || abhīṣṭārthasya saṃprāptau spṛhāparyāptatā dhṛtiḥ | tadrūpeṇa ‘rasaniṣpattiryathā’ gharasasya prakarṣo yathā— ‘nīto vikramabāhurātmasamatāṃ prāpteyamurvītale sāraṃ sāgarikā samāgaramahīprāptyekahetuḥ priyā | devī prītimupāgatā ca bhaginīlābhājjitāḥ ‘kośalāḥ’ khakosalāḥ kiṃ nāsti tvayi satyamātyavṛṣabhe ‘yasmai’ ratnāvalyā mudrite pāṭhaḥyasminkaromi spṛhām || 40 ||’ atra vatsarājasya sarvātmanā manorathasiddhayo dhṛteḥ prakarṣamāvahanti || cetonimīlanaṃ vrīḍā‘nvaṅga’ khanyaṅgarāgastavādibhiḥ || 151 || tadrūpeṇa ‘rasaṃprakarṣāt’ ka kharasasya prakarṣe krodha‘kopaśokābhyāṃ’ kha śokābhyāṃ saṃkaro yathā— ‘akṣudrārikṛtābhimanyunidha‘nidhanātsaṃkrāntaṃtīvrakudhaḥ’ ka kha naprodbhūtatīvrakrudhaḥ pārthasyākṛtaśātravapratikṛterantaḥśucā muhyataḥ | kīrṇā bāṣpakaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍājaḍā dṛṣṭayo hā vatseti giraḥ sphuranti na punarniryānti kaṇṭhādbahiḥ || 41 ||’ atrārjunasyānyāyenābhimanyuvadhādudbhūtau dīptāveva krodhaśokā‘akṛtavipratīkārotthayā’ ghavudbhūtavipratīkārotthayā tathāvidhayaiva vrīḍayā saṃkīryete | tathāhi krodhaśokayoranubhāvabhūtā dṛṣṭayo vācaśca vrīḍājaḍā‘vrīḍā iti viśeṣaṇāni’ gha iti viśeṣaṇāni saṃbadhyante || avahitthaṃ tu lajjāderharṣādyākāragopanam || 152 || tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā— ‘evaṃvādini devarṣau pārśve pituradhomukhī | līlākamalapattrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī || 42 ||’ atra— ‘praṇamya śitikaṇṭhāya vibudhāstadanantaram | caraṇau rañjayantvasyāścūḍāmaṇimarīcibhiḥ || 43 ||’ ‘ityādidevarṣivākyādudbhūtaḥ’ dha, ‘ityādermunivākyādudbhūtaḥ’ ka khaityāderdevarṣivākyādudbhūtaḥ‘udbhūtapraharṣākāro’ kha praharṣākāro gurusaṃnidhau lajjitayā līlākamalapatragaṇanavyājena‘gaṇanena’ ka kha gauryā gopyate || sukhaduḥkhādijanito mohaścittasya mūḍhatā | tadrūpeṇa ‘rasasya niṣpattiḥ’ kharasaniṣpattiryathā— ‘kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanā- dvāso viślathamekhalāguṇadhṛtaṃ kiṃcinnitambe sthitam | etāvatsakhi vedmi kevalamahaṃ tasyāṅgasaṅge punaḥ ‘ko 'sau kāsmi rataṃ nu kiṃ kathamiti’ ka khako 'yaṃ kā vayamatra kiṃ nu surataṃ svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ 44’ atra sthāyinī ratirmohaniṣpattyā prakṛṣyate || saṃmohānandasaṃbhedo madirādikṛto madaḥ || 153 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā— ‘ghūrṇamānanayanaṃ skhalatkathaṃ khedabindumadakāraṇasmitam | ānanena na tu tāvadīśvaraścakṣuṣā ciramumāmukhaṃ papau || 45 ||’ atra nayanaghūrṇanākāraṇasmitādayaḥ saṃmohānandasaṃbhedā‘saṃbhedā udbhavanto’ khadudbhavanto madaṃ niṣpādayanti | manaḥprasādo harṣaḥ syādiṣṭāvāptistavādibhiḥ | tadrūpeṇa ‘rasaniṣpattiryathā’ gharasasya prakarṣo yathā— ‘jātasya te piturapīndrajito nihantu- rvatsasya vatsa kati nāma dinānyamūni | tasyāpyapatyamadhitiṣṭhati ‘vīradharmam’ ghavīradharme diṣṭyā gataṃ daśarathasya kulaṃ pratiṣṭhām || 46 ||’ atra ‘daśarathasya suhṛdaḥ’ ghadaśarathasuhṛdaḥ sumanttrasāratheḥ ‘prabhukulapratiṣṭhā’ khaprabhukulasya pratiṣṭhāmāśaṃsatastatsūnumindrajito hantāraṃ paśyato manorathāvāptyā harṣo niṣpannastadapatye 'pi vīradharmamācariṣṇau prakṛṣṭo diṣṭyetyavyayena sūcyate || krodhaḥ ‘kṛtāpakāreghu’ ghakṛtāparādheṣu sthiro 'marṣatvamaśnute || 154 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā— ‘lākṣāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśaiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca naḥ ‘prakṛtya’ ghaprahṛtya | ākṛṣṭapāṇḍavavadhūparidhānakeśāḥ svasthā bhavanti mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ || 47 ||’ atra ‘bhīmasya’ ghabhīmasenasya dhārtarāṣṭreṣu svasthā iti nāmno 'pya‘pyasahamānāt’ ghasahanāt lākṣāgṛhādyapakārajanmāmarṣaḥ ‘prakṛṣyate’ ghapratīyate || asūyānyaguṇarddhīnāmauddhatyādasahiṣṇutā | tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā— ‘vandyāste na vicāraṇīyacaritāstiṣṭhantu huṃ vartate sundastrīnidhane 'pyakhaṇḍayaśaso loke mahānto hi te | yāni trīṇi ‘trīṇyakutomukhāni’ ka, ‘trīṇyakutobhayāni’ ka ṭippaṇyām, ‘trīṇi kutosukhāni’ khakutomukhānyapi padānyāsankharāyodhane yadvā kauśalamindrasūnudamane‘indrasūnudalane’ ga gha tatrāpyabhijño janaḥ || 48 ||’ atra yadyapi solluṇṭhadoṣakīrtanādibhirjugupsā niṣyadyate tathāpi na tayā svaniṣpattiheturasūyā saṃkīryate || īrṣāmāhuḥ samāneṣu mānadānādyamarṣaṇam‘mānadānādyamarṣaṇāt’ ga || 155 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā— ‘huṃ‘hum’ gha nāsti ṇillajja samosara taṃ ccia‘via’ kha aṇuṇesu jāi de eaṃ | ‘pāagga’ kha pāaggaṃguṭṭhālattaeṇa tilaaṃ viṇimmaviaṃ || 49 ||’ [huṃ nirlajja samapasara tāmevānunaya yasyāsta etat | pādāgrāṅguṣṭhālaktakena tilakaṃ vinirmitam ||] atra kasyāścit preyasi sapatnīṃ prasādayituṃ gate tanmānamamṛṣyamāṇāyāḥ samutpannerṣyā priyānunayādibhirbhṛśāyamānatayā niṣpannālaktakatilakānumeyaistatpādapatanādibhiruddīptā huṃkārākṣepabhartsanapratibhedāvinābhūtairbhrūbhaṅgatāḍanāṅgakṣepavepathusvedagadgadādibhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānā prakṛṣyate || viṣādaścetaso glānirupāyābhāvanāśayoḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā— ‘vyarthaṃ yatra kapīndrasakhyamapi me kleśaḥ‘vīrya harīṇāṃ vṛthā’ ka kha kapīnāṃ vṛthā prajñāṃ jāmbavato 'pi yatra na gatiḥ putrasya vāyorapi | mārgaṃ yatra na viśvakarmatanayaḥ kartuṃ nalo 'pi kṣamaḥ saumitrerapi pattriṇāmaviṣayastatra priyā kvāpi me || 50 ||’ atra sītāsamāgamaviṣaye rāmasya dṛṣṭāvadānasugrīvasakhyāderupāyasyābhāvādviṣādaḥ prakṛṣyate || sattvatyāgādanutkarṣo vākyāderdainyamucyate || 156 || tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā— ‘asmānsādhu vicintya saṃyamadhanānuccaiḥ kulaṃ cātmana- stvayyasyāḥ kathamapyabāndhavakṛtāṃ bhāvapravṛttiṃ ca tām | sāmānyapratipattipūrvakamiyaṃ dāreṣu dṛśyā tvayā bhāgyādhīnamataḥ paraṃ na khalu tadvācyaṃ vadhūbandhubhiḥ || 51 ||’ atra snehaprabhavaṃ pādatrayoktamarthitādainyaṃ turīṃyapādopakṣiptayācñādainyāntareṇānubadhyate || vidurvāgdaṇḍapāruṣyamugratāmapakāriṣu | tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā— ‘praṇayisakhīsalīlaparihāsarasādhigatai- rlalitaśirīṣapuṣpahananairapi tāmyati yat | vapuṣi vadhāya tatra tava śastramupakṣipataḥ patatu śirasyakāṇḍayamadaṇḍa ivaiṣa bhujaḥ || 52 ||’ atra mādhavasya prakṛṣṭāpakāriṇyaghoraghaṇṭe viṣaye prakṛṣṭameva vākpāruṣyaṃ daṇḍapāruṣyaṃ ca jāyate || trāsaścittacamatkāra ākasmikabhayādibhiḥ || 157 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā— ‘parisphuranmīnavighaṭṭito ravaḥ surāṅganāsrāsaviloladṛṣṭayaḥ | upāyayuḥ kampitapāṇipallavāḥ sakhījanasyāpi vilokanīyatām 53’ atra loladṛṣṭitā karābadhūnanaṃ ca strīṇāṃ svabhāvabhīrutvavilāsitvābhyāmapi bhavatīti trāsāvirbhāve 'pyasamarthamiti nānubangho bhavati || aniṣṭābhyāgamotprekṣāṃ śaṅkāmācakṣate budhāḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā— ‘sahasā mā sāhijjaü piāgamo tīa virahakisiāe | accaṃtapahariseṇa vi jā a muā sā muā ccea || 54 ||’ [sahasā mā sādhyatāṃ priyāgamastayā virahakṛśayā | atyantapraharṣeṇāpi yā ca mṛtā sā mṛtaiva ||] atra virahiṇyāḥ kārśyātiśayamudvīkṣamāṇāyāḥ kasyāścidvayasyāyāḥ snehātiśayāt 'prema paśyati bhayānyapade 'pī'ti priyāgamapraharṣātiśayabhāve 'pyasahiṣṇutayā tanmaraṇaśaṅkā prakṛṣyate || virahādermanastāpaḥ ‘śarīrāntakado gadaḥ’ khaśarīrātaṅkado gadaḥ || 158 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā— ‘sthitamurasi viśālaṃ padminīpattrametat kathayati na tathāntarmanmathotthāmavasthām | atiśayaparitāpaglāpitābhyāṃ yathāsyāḥ stanayugapariṇāhaṃ maṇḍalābhyāṃ bravīti || 55 ||’ atra sāgarikāyāḥ stananihitasarojinīdalaglāpanena vapuḥsaṃtāpo niṣpadyate || balasyāpacayo glānirādhivyādhiprakarṣabhūḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā— ‘kisalayamiva mugdhaṃ ‘vandanādvipralūnam’ ghabanghanādvipralūnaṃ hṛdayakusumaśoṣī dāruṇo dīrghaśokaḥ | glapayati paripāṇḍukṣāmamasyāḥ śarīraṃ śaradija iva gharmaḥ ketakīgarbhapattram || 56 ||’ atra prakṛṣṭaśokānubandhinī glānirvaivarṇyakṣāmatābhyāmanubadhyate || utkaṇṭhāharṣaśokāderunmādaścittaviplavaḥ || 159 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā— ‘‘kvākāryaṃ śaśa lakṣmaṇaḥ’ vikramorvasīye | ‘kvākāryaṃ kva kalākarasya’ ca kha, ‘kva kalādharasya’ ca khakvākāryaṃ kva kalādharasya ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāmupaśāntaye śrutamaho kope 'pi śāntaṃ mukham | kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyo rekhaiva‘lekhaiva’ gha sānyādṛśī cetaḥ svāsthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati 57’ atra virahiṇaḥ purūravasa utkaṇṭhādibhiḥ premaprakarṣādasatpralāparūpa unmādo niṣpadyate || ādarātiśayāccetasyāvegaḥ saṃbhramo mataḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasya saṃkaro yathā— ‘alamalamatimātraṃ sāhasenāmunā te tvaritamapi vimuñca tvaṃ latāpāśamenam | calitamiva niroddhuṃ jīvitaṃ jīviteśe kṣaṇamiha mama kaṇṭhe bāhupāśaṃ nidhehi || 58 ||’ atra ratijanmā saṃbhramātiśayo ratijanmanaiva matiprakarṣeṇa saṃkīryate || manaḥśarīrayoḥ khedaḥ kriyātiśayataḥ śramaḥ || 160 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya saṃkaro yathā— ‘skhalayati vacanaṃ te saṃśrayatyaṅgamaṅgaṃ janayati mukhacandrodbhāsinaḥ khedabindūn | mukulayati ca netre sarvathā subhru khedastvayi vilasati tulyaṃ ‘mādhavālokanena’ ghavallabhālokanena || 59 ||’ atra mālatyāḥ puṣpāvacayajanmā śramaḥ, mādhavāvalokanajā ca ratiḥ, svedagadgadāṅgasādanayanamukulaistulyadharmiṇau mithaḥ saṃkīryete || cittasya khedo nirvedastattvajñānodayādibhiḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasya śeṣo yathā— ‘jarāmaraṇadaurgatyavyādhayastāvadāsatām | manye janmaiva dhīrāṇāṃ bhūyobhūyasttrapākaram || 60 ||’ atra mokṣāyotsahamānasya kasyacinnirvedāvadamo gamyate || kriyāsvapāṭavaṃ jāḍyaṃ cintotkaṇṭhābhayādibhiḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasya‘rasaniṣpattiḥ’ gha niṣpattiryathā— ‘śithilaśithilaṃ nyasya svairaṃ dhanuḥśikhare śiro nayanasalilaiḥ kurvanmaurvīlatāmaparāmiva | ahaha vikalaḥ śrutvā śrutvā ghanastanitadhvaniṃ kimapi kimapi dhyāyannāryo na yāti na tiṣṭhati || 61 ||’ atra virahiṇo rāmasya kriyāsvapāṭavaṃ niṣpādyate || kriyāvidveṣa ālasyaṃ sukhasaṃvinmadādibhiḥ || 161 || tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā— ‘ghariṇighaṇatthaṇa‘pekkhaṇa’ dhapellaṇasuhelli‘ṇipaḍiassa’ ka khapaḍiassa honta‘honti’ ka khapahiassa | ‘avasaduṇaṃgara’ kha avasaüṇaṅgāraavāraviṭṭhidiahā‘diasā suhāventi’ ka kha suhāventi || 62 ||’ [gṛhiṇīghanastanapreraṇasukhakelipatitasya bhaviṣyatpathikasya | apaśakunāṅgārakavāraviṣṭidivasāḥ sukhayanti ||] atra ratisukhānubhavājjigamiṣorapyagacchata ālasyaṃ niṣpadyate || nidrā vyāpāravaimukhyamindriyāṇāṃ śramādibhiḥ | tadrūpeṇa ‘rasānubandho’ gharasasyānubandho yathā— ‘ṇiddālasapari‘ghuṇṇirataṃ’ kha, ‘ghummirataṃ ga, ‘ghummirata’ ghaghummirataṃsavalantaddha‘saṃvalataddhā’ katāraāloā | kāmassa vi duvvisahā diṭṭhiṇivāā sasimuhīe || 63 ||’ [nidrāla‘ghūrṇanāsracalanādibhiḥ’ ka, ‘ghūrṇanatryasracalanādibhiḥ’ khasaparighūrṇanaśīlatiryagvaladardhatārakālokāḥ | kāmasyāpi durviṣahā dṛṣṭinipātāḥ śaśimukhyāḥ ||] atra ratiśramajāgarādijanitanidrālasā‘nidrālasadṛṣṭinipātāḥ’ ka kha dṛṣṭinipātāstā‘bāhyendriyanimīlanam’ ka kharakāghūrṇanatryasravalanādibhiranubadhyante || nidrādijanitaṃ suptamindriyādinimīlanam || 162 || tadrūpeṇa ‘rasasya’ ga rasaprakarṣo yathā— ‘osuaï diṇṇa‘paḍivakkhe aṇaṃ’ khapaḍivakkhaveaṇaṃ pasịdhilehiṁ aṅgehiṁ | ṇivvattiasuraarasāṇubaṃdhasuhaṇibbharaṃ‘nibbharaṃ’ ka soṇhā || 64 ||’ [avasvapiti dattapratipakṣavedanaṃ praśithilairaṅgaiḥ | nirvartitasuratarasānubandhasukhanirbharaṃ snuṣā ||] atra nirbharapadenaiva prakarṣaḥ pratipādyate || nidrāpagamahetubhyaḥ prabodhaścetanāgamaḥ | tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā— ‘pratyagronmeṣajihmā kṣaṇamanabhimukhī ratnadīṃpaprabhāṇāmātmavyāpāragurvī janitajalalavājṛmbhaṇaiḥ sāṅgabhaṅgaiḥ | ‘nāgāṅgaṃ’ ka khanāgāṅkaṃ moktumicchoḥ śayanamuruphaṇācakravālopadhānaṃ nidrācchedābhitāmrā‘nidrācchedātitāmrā’ ka kha ciramavatu harerdṛṣṭirākekarā vaḥ || 65 ||’ atra dṛṣṭeḥ pratyagronmeṣajihmatādibhiḥ prabodho nādyāpi niṣpadyata iti pratīyate || uktā bhāvādibhedena te 'mī ratyādayo rasāḥ | athaiteṣveva keṣāṃcidviśeṣānabhidadhmahe || 163 || tatra śṛṅgāravīrakaruṇaraudrādbhutabhayānakāḥ | bībhatsahāsyapreyāṃsaḥ śāntadāntoddhatā rasāḥ || 164 || ratirnisargasaṃsargaupamyādhyātmābhiyogajā | saṃprayogābhimānotthā viṣayotthā ca kathyate || 165 || prītirapyevameva syānna tvasyāṃ sāṃprayogikī | ‘abhyāsikī’ ka, ‘anyāsikī’ khaābhyāsikī tu tatsthāne tadudāhṛtayo yathā || 166 || ‘mṛteti pretya saṃgantuṃ yayā me maraṇaṃ matam | saivāvantī mayā labghā kathamatraiva janmani || 66 ||’ atra sthāyino vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiriti ratireva śṛṅgārarūpeṇa niṣpadyate | atrāvantyā vāsavadattāyā ālambanavibhāvabhūtāyāḥ sakāśādutpanno vatseśvarasya ratisthāyibhāvaḥ, tasyāḥ punarjīvanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāno mṛtetyādinā vāgārambhānubhāvenānumīyamānairharṣadhṛtiprabhṛtibhiḥ sukhātmakairvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ karuṇānantaraḥ saṃbhogaḥ śṛṅgārākhyāṃ labhate || ‘ajitvā sārṇavāmurvīmaniṣṭa‍vā vividhairmakhaiḥ | adattvā cārthamarthibhyo bhaveyaṃ pārthivaḥ katham || 67 ||’ atra vasudhāvijayāderālambanavibhāvādutpannaḥ sthāyyutsāhabhāvaḥ sthairyadhairyādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaiḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumīyamāneṣu smṛtimativitarkādiṣu niṣpanno vīrarasasaṃjñayā vyavahriyate || ‘yasyāḥ kusumaśayyāpi komalāṅgyā rujākarī | sādhiśete kathaṃ devī hutāśanavatīṃ citām || 68 ||’ atra cālambanavibhāvabhūtadevīmaraṇādutpannaḥ śokaḥ sthāyibhāvaścitāniveśanahutāśanāṅgajvālādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāno vāgārambhānumeyairnirvedaglānivaivarṇyādibhirvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ karuṇa iti jñāyate || ‘nigṛhya keśeṣvākṛṣṭā kṛṣṇā yena mamāgrataḥ | so 'yaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ pāpo lavdhaḥ kiṃ jīvati kṣaṇam || 69 ||’ atra duḥśāsanālambanavibhāvāya krudhyato bhīmasenasya pūrvamutpannaḥ krodhaḥ sthāyibhāvastadavāpteḥ smaryamāṇasamakṣakṛtadraupadīnigrahakeśakarṣaṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumīyamāneṣvasūyāvegavepathuśramādiṣu duḥkhātmakeṣu vyabhicāriṣu ‘niṣpādyamāno’ khanippadyamāno raudra iti niṣpadyate || ‘aṃśukāni pravālāni puṣpaṃ hārādibhūṣaṇam | phalaṃ madhūni harmyāṇi śākhā nandanaśākhinām || 70 ||’ atra śākhināṃ pravālapuṣpaphalaśākhāsaṃpannaṃ nijaṃ rūpaṃ nandanaśākhināṃ punaḥ pravālādisthāne‘pravālādisthāneṃśukahāra’ ka khaṣvaṃśukahāramadhumandirāṇi tadetadāścaryam | ataścaitebhya ālambanavibhāvebhyaḥ kasyaciddevabhūyaṃgatasya samutpanno vismayaḥ‘vismayasthāyibhāvaḥ’ ka kha sthāyibhāvastadīyāvayavadarśanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumeyeṣu harṣaromodgamakhedagadgadādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu niṣpadyamāno 'dbhuta ityucyate || ‘idaṃ maghonaḥ kuliśaṃ dhārāsaṃnihitānalam | smaraṇaṃ yasya daityastrīgarbhapātāya kalpate || 71 ||’ atra mahendrakuliśāddhārāsaṃnihitānalādālamba‘saṃnihitānalālambana’ khanavibhāvātsmaryamāṇādapi daityastrīṇāmutpanno ‘bhayasthāyibhāvaḥ’ ka khabhayasthāyibhāvastadvidīrṇadānavamaraṇasmaraṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ ‘sagarbhapātādibhiḥ’ dhasvagarbhapātādibhiranubhāvādibhistadanumitaiśca svedastambhavepathuprabhṛtibhirvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyamāno bhayānakarasarūpeṇa niṣpannaḥ kenacidākhyāyamāno 'pi bhayānaka ityākhyāyate || ‘pāyaṃ pāyaṃ tavārīṇāṃ śoṇitaṃ ‘karasampuṭaiḥ’ ka khapāṇisaṃpuṭaiḥ | kauṇapāḥ saha nṛtyanti kabandhairanttrabhūṣaṇāḥ || 72 ||’ atrālambanavibhāvabhūtebhyaḥ kauṇapebhyaḥ kasyaci‘ripuvijayāśaṃsinaḥ’ khadripujayaśaṃsinaḥ puṃsa utpanno jugupsāsthāyibhāvaḥ śiraśchedavigaladrudhiraghārāparipluta‘pravartita’ khapraṇartitakabandhakauṇapānttrabhūṣaṇaśoṇitapānādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu ‘vyabhicārādiṣu’ kavāgārambhānumeyeṣu bhayāveśaśaṅkāvahitthādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu niṣpanno bībhatsa iti nigadyate || ‘idamamlānamānāyā lagnaṃ stanataṭe tava | chādyatāmuttarīyeṇa navaṃ nakhapadaṃ sakhi || 73 ||’ atra kācit sakhīṃ pūrvaṃ bhartari ‘pragṛhītamānāṃ’ ka khagṛhītamānāṃ tenaiva nakha‘padāṅkitastanām’ khapadāṅkitastanīmālambanavibhāvabhūtāmupalabhamānāyāḥ kasyāścitsakhyā utpanno hāsaḥ sthāyibhāvastadīyamānaparigrahasmaraṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumiteṣu śaṅkāvahitthagadgadādivyabhicāriṣu ‘niṣpādyamāno’ kaniṣpadyamāno hāsyaśabdenābhidhīyate || ‘yadeva rocate mahyaṃ tadeva kurute priyā | iti vetti na ‘jānāmi’ khajānāti ‘yatpriyaṃ tatkaroti sā’ ka khatatpriyaṃ yatkaroti sā || 74 ||’ atra vatsalaprakṛterdhīratayā lalitanāyakasya ‘priyānubhāva’ ka khapriyālambanavibhāvādutpannaḥ ‘snehasthāyibhāvo’ ka snehasthāyibhāvo viṣayasaukumāryātmaprakṛtyādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samupajāyamānairmoha‘mohamatidhṛtismṛti’ ka khadhṛtismṛtyādibhirvyabhicāribhāvairanubhāvaiśca‘praśaṃsādibhiḥ’ ityadhikaḥ pāṭhaḥ ka kha saṃsṛjyamāno niṣpannaḥ preyāniti pratīyate || ratiprītyorapi cāyameva mūlaprakṛtiriṣyate | yaditthamāhuḥ— ‘ahetuḥ pakṣapāto yastasya nāsti pratikriyā | sa hi snehātmakastanturantarmarmāṇi sīvyati || 75 || sarvāḥ saṃpattayastasya saṃtuṣṭaṃ yasya mānasam | upānadgṛḍhapādasya nanu ‘carmāvṛtaiva’ ka khacarmāstṛtaiva bhūḥ || 76 ||’ atra kasyacidupaśāntaprakṛterdhīraśā‘dhīrapraśānta’ ka khantanāyakasya yathopanatamanonukūladārādisaṃpatterālambanavibhāvabhūtāyāḥ samutpanno dhṛtisthāyibhāvo vastutattvālocanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samupajāyamāna‘smṛtimatyāsatyā’ ka 'smṛtimatyādibhiḥ’ khasmṛtyādibhirvyabhi-cāribhāvairvāgārambhādibhiranuṣajyamāno niṣpannaḥ śānta ityabhigīyate‘iti gīyate’ ka kha || anye punarasya śamaṃ prakṛtimāmananti sa tu dhṛtereva viśeṣo bhavati || ‘sādhāraṇyānnirātaṅkaḥ kanyāmanyo 'pi yācate | kiṃ punarjagatāṃ jetā prapautraḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ || 77 ||’ atra rāmasyodāttaprakṛternisargata eva tattvābhiniveśinī matirnākṛtyaviṣaye pravartate, na ca pravṛttopāramati, sā ca sīteyaṃ mama svīkārayogyetyevaṃrūpeṇa ‘pravṛttoparamati’ ka khapravṛttā rāvaṇaprārthanālakṣmaṇaprotsāhanābhyāmuddīpyamānā samupajāyamānacintāvitarkavrīḍāvahitthasmṛtyādibhiḥ kālocitottarānumīyamānaiśca vivekacāturyaudāryadhairyādibhiḥ ‘saṃsṛjyamāna udāttarasarūpeṇa’ kasaṃsṛjyamānodāttarasarūpeṇa niṣpadyate || ‘apakartāhamasmīti mā te manasi bhūdbhayam | vimukheṣu na me khaṅgaḥ prahartuṃ jātu vāñchati || 78 ||’ atra mayāsyāpakāraḥ kṛta iti ‘yatte cetasi bhayam’ khayaccetasi bhayaṃ tanmābhūt ‘na mama khaṅgaḥ parāṅyukheṣu kadācidapi prahartumutsahata’ ka kha gaparāṅyukheṣu me khaṅgaḥ kadācidapi na prahartumutsahate’ iti sarvadaiva rụ̄dho 'haṃkāraḥ pratīyate | so 'yaṃ garvaprakṛtiruddhato nāma rasaḥ | kecit punaḥ— ‘āsthāmālambya nīteṣu vaśaṃ kṣudreṣvarātiṣu | vyaktimāyāti mahatāṃ māhātmyamanukampayā || 79 ||’ ityevamūrjakhītyudāttapakṣe nikṣipantaḥ pūrvoktameva garvaprakarṣodāharaṇaṃ dhṛtāyudho yāvadahamityādyuddhataniṣpattau varṇayanti || rativiśeṣeṣu naisargikī yathā— ‘iyaṃ mahendraprabhṛtīnadhiśriyaścaturdigīśānavamanya‘avamatya māninī’ ka kha māninī | arūpahāryaṃ madanasya nigrahātpinākapāṇiṃ patimāptumicchati || 80 ||’ atra janmāntaravāsanayā nisargata iyaṃ bhavati || sāṃsargikī yathā— ‘bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ ye tatkṣīrasrutisurabhayo dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ | āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ pūrvaspṛṣṭaṃ‘pūrvaṃ spṛṣṭam’ ka kha yadi kila bhavedaṅgamebhistaveti || 81 ||’ atra śaityasaurabhādibhirvirahija‘virahiṇa udvejanīyā’ ka khanodvejanīyā api vāyavaḥ priyatamāṅgasaṃsargasaṃbhāvanayā ‘samāliṅgyanta iti saṃsargādiyaṃ ratibhavati’ ka khasamāśliṣyanta iti saṃsargata iyaṃ bhavati || aupamānikī yathā— ‘api janakasutāyāstacca taccānurūpaṃ sphuṭamiha śiśuyugme naipuṇonneyamasti | nanu punariva tanme gocarībhūtamakṣṇo- rabhinavaśatapattraśrīmadāsyaṃ‘śatapattragrīva’ ka priyāyāḥ || 82 ||’ seyaṃ sītāviṣayiṇī ratistadupamānadarśanena rāmaṃ ‘ramayate’ ka kharamayati || ādhyātmikī yathā— ‘kāmaṃ‘kāmaṃ pratyādiṣṭam’ ka pratyādiṣṭāṃ smarāmi na parigrahaṃ munestanayām | balavattu dūyamānaṃ pratyāyayatīva me cetaḥ || 83 ||’ atra seyaṃ durvāsasaḥ śāpādvismṛtavivāhādivṛttāntasya duṣyantasya śakuntalāyāṃ ratiradhyātmaṃ bhavati || ābhiyogikī yathā— ‘alasavalitamugdhasnigghaniṣpandamandairadhikavikasadantarvismayasmeratārai; | hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ‘hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ me’ ka me pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kāṭākṣairapahṛtamapaviddhaṃ pītamunmūlitaṃ ca || 84 ||’ seyamanurāgātiśayasūcakamālatīkaṭākṣābhiyoge mādhavasya ‘ratirevotpadyate’ ka kharatiratīvotpadyate || sāṃprayogikī yathā— ‘unnamayya sakacagrahamāsyaṃ cumbati priyatame haṭhavṛttyā | huṃhuṁ muñca mamameti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānadhanāyāḥ || 85 ||’ atra tarjanārtha—mokṣārtha—vāraṇārthānāṃ mandaṃ mandaṃ prayogānmānavatyāḥ saṃprayoge ratyutpattiḥ pratīyate || ābhimānikī yathā— ‘iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayo- rasāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi ‘bahulaḥ’ khabahalaścandanarasaḥ | ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo‘śiśirasamṛṇo’ gha mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo yadi paramasahyastu virahaḥ || 86 ||’ atra ruciviśeṣo 'bhimānastata evaṃprāyā ratayo bhavanti || ‘vaiṣayikī śabdeṣu yathā’ kavaiṣayikīṣu śabde yathā— ‘vilāsamasṛṇollasanmusalaloladoṣkandalīparasparapariskhaladvalayaniḥkhanodbandhurāḥ | lasanti kalahuṃkṛtiprasabha‘kampitoraḥsthalī’ khakampitoraḥsthala‘luṭadgamakasaṃkulāḥ’ khatruṭadgamakasaṃkulāḥ ‘kalamakaṇḍanī’ ghakalamakaṇḍanīgītayaḥ || 87 ||’ sparśe yathā— ‘badhnannaṅgeṣu romāñcaṃ kurvanmanasi nirvṛtim | netre nimīlayanneṣa priyāsparśaḥ pravartate || 88 ||’ rūpe yathā— ‘tā rāghavaṃ dṛṣṭibhirāpibantyo nāryo na jagmurviṣayāntarāṇi | tathā hi śeṣendriyavṛttirāsāṃ sarvātmanā cakṣuriva praṃviṣṭā 89’ rase yathā— ‘kasya no kurute ‘tanvi’ ka khamugdhe pipāsākulitaṃ manaḥ | ayaṃ te vidrumacchāyo marumārga ivādharaḥ || 90 ||’ ‘gandho yathā’ kha gandhe yathā— ‘randhaṇakammaṇiuṇie mā jūrasu‘mā ūra su’ ka, ‘mā surasu’ kha rattapāḍalasuandham | muhamāruaṃ pianto dhūmāi sihī ṇa pajjalaï || 91 ||’ [randhanakarmanipuṇike mā ‘mā khidyasva’ iti gha-pustake cchāyākradhyasva raktapāṭalasugandham | mukhamārutaṃ piban dhūmāyate śikhī na prajvalati ||] prītiviśeṣeṣu naisargikī yathā— ‘ālakṣya dantamukulāna‘nimittasārān’ ka, ‘nimittahāsaiḥ’ khanimittahāsā- navyaktavarṇaramaṇīyavacaḥphrvṛttīn | aṅkāśrayapraṇayinastanayānvahanto dhanyāstadaṅgarajasā ‘paruṣībhavanti’ ga malinībhavanti || 92 ||’ ‘atra yadā ratirjāyate tadā putreṣu snihyati’ khaatra yadā yadā ratirjāyate tadā tadā putreṣu snihyati putrarūpeṇa vā jāyata iti janmāntaravāsanārūpo nisargaḥ saṃgacchate || sāṃsargikī yathā— ‘viśvaṃbharā bhagavatī bhavatīmasūta rājā prajāpatisamo janakaḥ pitā te | teṣāṃ vadhūstvamasi nandini pārthivānāṃ yeṣāṃ ‘kuleṣu’ ka khakule ca savitā ca gururvayaṃ ca || 93 ||’ atra viśvaṃbharādisaṃsargāt sītāyāṃ vasiṣṭhamiśrāḥ snihyanti | aupamānikī yathā— ‘kuvalayadalasnigdhaśyāmaḥ śikhaṇḍakamaṇḍano baṭupariṣadaṃ puṇyaśrīkaḥ śriyaiva sabhājayan | punariva śiśurbhūtvā vatsaḥ sa me raghunandano jhaṭiti kurute dṛṣṭaḥ ko 'yaṃ dṛśoramṛtāñjanam || 94 ||’ atra rāmaupamyāllave janakaḥ prīyate || ādhyātmikī yathā— ‘paritastaṃ pṛthāsūnuḥ snehena paritastare | avijñāte 'pi bandhau hi balātprahlādate‘prahnādate’ gha manaḥ || 95 ||’ atrāvijñāto 'pi vāsavaḥ svasūnumarjunaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ prīṇayati || ābhiyogikī yathā— ‘‘duḥkhaikabandhu’ ka khaajñātabandhurayamṛkṣaharīśvaro me paulastya eṣa samareṣu puraḥ prahartā | ityādṛtena kathitau raghunandanena ‘vyutkramya’ ka kha gavyutkrāntalakṣmaṇamubhau bharato vavande || 96 ||’ atra sītānveṣaṇāderabhiyogādrāmasya sugrīvabibhīṣaṇayoḥ prītirudayate‘rutpadyate’ ka kha | sāṃprayogikīsthāne ābhyāsikī yathā— ‘iti vismṛtānyakaraṇīyamātmanaḥ sacivāvalambitadhuraṃ narādhipam | parivṛddharāgamanubaddhasevayā mṛgayā jahāra catureva kāminī || 97 ||’ atra ‘śabdādibhyo bahirbhūtā yā karmābhyāsalakṣaṇā | prītiḥ sābhyāsikī jñeyā mṛgayādiṣu karmasu ||’ iti lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭate || ābhimānikī yathā— ‘dattendrābhayadakṣiṇairbhagavato vaivasvatādāmano- rdṛptānāṃ dahanāya dīpitanijakṣāttrapratāpāgnibhiḥ | ādityairyadi vigraho nṛpatibhirdhanyaṃ mamaitattato dīptāstrasphuradugra‘dīdhitibharainīṃrājitajyaṃ’ ka
