khadīdhitiśikhānīrājitajyaṃ dhanuḥ || 98 ||’ atrābhimatapratidvandvilābhāllavānupadī kuśastuṣyati || ‘vaiṣayikī yathā—’ kavaiṣayikīṣu śabde yathā— ‘lāvaṇyaiḥ kṣaṇadāvirāmamadhurāḥ kiṃcidvinidrālasa‘vinidrālasaṃ’ ka khaśrotraiḥ savraṇamugdhacāraṇavadhūdantacchadāvāsinaḥ | pīyante mṛdutrakrapītamarutaḥ paurāṇarītikrama‘gītikrama’ ka khavyālolāṅguliruddhaśukta‘mukta’ ka khasuṣiraśreṇīravā‘śreṇīdharā’ ka kha veṇavaḥ || 99 ||’ sparśe yathā— ‘praśāntagharmābhibhavaḥ śanairvivānvilāsinībhyaḥ parimṛṣṭapaṅkajaḥ | dadau bhujālambamivāttaśīkarastaraṅgamālāntaragocaro 'nilaḥ || 100 ||’ rupe yathā— ‘ayamabhinavameghaśyāmalottuṅgasānu- rmadamukharamayūrīmu‘baddhaviśrabdhanṛtyaḥ’ ghaktasaṃsaktakekaḥ | śakuniśabalanīḍānokahasnigdhavarṣmā vitarati bṛhadaśmā parvataḥ prītimakṣṇoḥ || 101 ||’ rase yathā— ‘ikṣudaṇḍasya maṇḍasya dadhnaḥ piṣṭakṛtasya‘piṣṭaghṛtasya’ ka kha ca | ‘varāhasya’ ka khavarāhasya ca māṃsasya so 'yaṃ gacchati phālgunaḥ || 102 ||’ gandhe yathā— ‘kapolakaṇḍūḥ karibhirvinetuṃ vighaṭṭitānāṃ saraladrumāṇām | yatra ‘snuta’ gasrutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni ganghaḥ surabhīkaroti || 103’ upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tenotsāhasya yuddhadānadayāvīrādayaḥ, krodhasya ‘bhīmamanyutrāsādayaḥ’ ka khabhāmamanyūtprāsādayaḥ, hāsasya smitahasitavihasitādayaḥ, ‘prasuptapralayamatyādīnāṃ’ ka khasuptapralayamatyādīnāṃ tu‘tu’ kha ka pustakayornāsti svapnamaraṇaśamādayo bhedā jāyante | tatra yadyapi ‘ajitvā sārṇavāmurvīm’ ityanena yuddhavīraḥ, ‘aniṣṭa‍vā vividhairmakhaiḥ’ ityanena dānavīraḥ, ‘adattvā cārthamarthibhyaḥ’ ityanena dayāvīraścotsāharūpeṇa niṣpattau varṇitaḥ‘rasaniṣpattau vartate’ ka kha, ‘tathāpyekaśo 'pyetadrasaniṣpattirastīti pradarśyante’ ka khatathāpyekaśo 'pyete rasaniṣpattyai prabhavantīti pradarśyante || teṣu yuddhavīro yathā— ‘etāṃ paśya ‘purastaṭī’ ka kha puraḥsthalīmiha kila krīḍākirāto haraḥ kodaṇḍena kirīṭinā sarabhasaṃ cūḍāntare tāḍitaḥ | ityākarṇya kathādbhutaṃ himanidhāvadrau subhadrāpate- rmandaṃ mandamakāri yena nijayordordaṇḍayormaṇḍanam 104’ dānavīro yathā— ‘dadhikṣīraghṛtāmbhodhivyañjanaspṛhaṇīyayā | mahādānotsave yasya hantakārāyitaṃ bhuvā || 105 ||’ dayāvīro yathā— ‘sa tvaṃ madīyena śarīravṛttiṃ dehena nirvartayituṃ yatasva | dināvasānotsukabālavatsā vimucyatāṃ dhenuriyaṃ maharṣeḥ || 106 ||’ krodhasya yadyapi ‘bhīkādayo’ ka , ‘krodhasya bhīmādayo’ kha bhāmādayo ‘mānabhedāḥ’ ityasya ‘viśeṣāḥ’ iti ṭippaṇarūpeṇa gha, ‘viśeṣāḥ’ ka khamānabhedāścaturviṃśatiḥ saṃbhavanti tathāpi lalitālalitobhayabhedena rūpeṇa krameṇa sarvasaṃgrahāttatra traya eva prakārāḥ pradarśyante || teṣu strīṇāṃ ‘lalitaḥ kopābhāvo yathā’ ka khalalitakopo bhāmo yathā— ‘bhrūbhedibhiḥ prakampauṣṭhairlalitāṅgulitarjanaiḥ | yatra kopaiḥ kṛtā srīṇāṃ saṃprasādārthinaḥ priyāḥ || 107 ||’ priyāparādhajanmā duḥkhotpīḍo manyuryathā— ‘dhaṇuovappaṇavallariviraïakaṇṇāvaaṃsaduppecche | vāhaguruā‘vāhagaruī’ ka kha ‘nisammaï’ ghaṇisammaï vāhīea bahumuhe diṭṭhī || 108 ||’ [dhanudhanvapanavallarīviracitakarṇāvataṃsaduṣprekṣye | bāṣpagurukā niśāmyati bādhyā vadhūmukhe dṛṣṭiḥ ||] nanviyamīrṣyā kasmānna bhavati, nātra ‘mānadānāmarṣaṇamātraṃvivakṣā’ ka khamānadānāmarṣamātraṃ vivakṣitamapi tu tajjanito duḥkhātiśaya iti || priyādiṣu vyājanindotprāso yathā— ‘pahavaṃti ccia‘vvia’ ka purisā mahilāṇaṃ kiṃ ‘khu’ ka khatha suhaa vihiosi | ‘lolliāe’ ka kha aṇurāaṇolliāe ko doso ‘apahajāie’ ka , ‘āhijāie’ kha āhijāīe || 109 ||’ [prabhavantyeva puruṣā mahilānāṃ kimatra subhaga vihito 'si | anurāganoditāyāḥ ko doṣa ābhijātyāyāḥ ||] hāsasya yadyapyupahāsādayo bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti tathāpi vihasitena teṣāṃ ‘apasaṃgrahāt’ khasaṃgrahādīṣannyūnādhikamiti ‘trayastriśadbhedāḥ’ ghatrayastadbhedā udāhriyante— tatreṣaddhasitaṃ smitaṃ yathā— ‘puṣpaṃ pravālopahitaṃ yadi syānmuktāphalaṃ vā sphuṭavidrumastham |’ tato 'nukuryādviśadasya tasyāstāmrauṣṭhaparyastarucaḥ smitasya || 110 ||’ dṛṣṭadaśanakānti hasitaṃ yathā— ‘timiraniruddhabhīmarajanīmukhacandrikayā ‘gaṇayati’ khagaṇapatitāṇḍavābhinayadarśanadīpikayā | abhibhavasi tvamadya śaśinaḥ ‘śriyamutkaṇṭhayā’ khaśriyamutkaṭayā daśanamayūkhamañjaritayā hasitaprabhayā || 111 ||’ tadeva saviśeṣaṃ ‘vihasitam’ ka khahasitaṃ yathā— ‘cyutāmindorlekhāṃ ratikalahabhagnaṃ ca valayaṃ dva‍yaṃ cakrīkṛtya prahasitamukhī‘prahasitavatī’ gha śailatanayā | avocadyaṃ paśyetyavatu sa śivaḥ sā ca girijā sa ca krīḍācandro daśanakiraṇāpūritatanuḥ || 112 ||’ suptaviśeṣaḥ svapno yathā— ‘jāne kopaparāṅmukhī priyatamā svapne 'dya dṛṣṭā mayā mā mā saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā puraḥ | no yāvatparirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi priyāṃ‘kṣaṇaṃ’ ka kha bhrātastāvadahaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā nidrādaridrīkṛtaḥ || 113 ||’ mūrcchāviśeṣo maraṇaṃ yathā— ‘kṣaṇamātrasakhīṃ sujātayoḥ stanayostāmavalokya vihvaṃlā | nimimīla narendrasundarī hṛtacandrā tamaseva śarvarī || 114 ||’ mativiśeṣaḥ ‘svapno yathā’ ‘narottamapriyā’ S.P. Pandit saṃpādite raghuvaṃśeśamo yathā— ‘yadāsīdajñānaṃ smaratimirasaṃskārajanitaṃ tadā dṛṣṭaṃ nārīmayamidamaśeṣaṃ jagaditi | idānīmasmākaṃ paṭutaravivekāñjanajuṣāṃ samībhūtā dṛṣṭistribhuvanamapi brahma manute || 115 ||’ evamanye 'pi vijñeyā ‘rasābhavādi’ ka kharasabhāvādisaṃśrayāḥ | viśeṣāḥ prāptakālo 'tha ‘pariśeṣo’ ka, ‘paripoṣo’ khapariśeṣo ‘nigadyate’ ka khanidarśyate || 167 || tatrāśrayastridhā—pumān—strī—tiryagādayaḥ || teṣu pumān yathā— ‘āścaryamutpaladṛśo vadanāmalendu- sāṃnidhyato mama muhurjaḍimānametya | jātyena‘jāḍyena’ kha candramaṇineva mahīdharasya saṃdhāryate dravamayo manasā vikāraḥ || 116 ||’ strī yathā— ‘tenātha nātha durudāharaṇātapena‘duradāharaṇātapena’ kha saumyāpi nāma paruṣatvamabhiprapannā | jajvāla tīkṣṇaviśadāḥ sahasodgirarantī‘sahasodgirantīḥ’ ka gha vāgarciṣastapanakāntaśileva sītā || 117 ||’ tiryagādiṣu yathā— ‘utkūjati śvasiti muhyati yāti tīraṃ tīrāttaruṃ tarutalātpunareti‘punareva’ ka kha vāpīm | vāpyāṃ na rajyati na cātti mṛṇālakhaṇḍaṃ cakraḥ kṣapāsu virahe khalu cakravākyāḥ || 118 ||’ viṣayastridhā—cetanaḥ, tiryagū, acetanaśca || teṣu cetano yathā— ‘iyaṃ sā lolākṣī tribhuvanalalāmaikavasatiḥ sa cāyaṃ duṣṭātmā svasurapakṛtaṃ yena mama tat | itastīvraḥ kāmo gururayamitaḥ krodhadahanaḥ kṛto veṣaścāyaṃ kathamidamiti bhrāmyati manaḥ || 119 ||’ tiryagū yathā— ‘āyāte dayite marusthalabhuvāṃ ‘udvīkṣya’ subhāṣitāvalau, ‘utprekṣya’ śārṅgaradharapaddhatausaṃcintya durlaṅghyatāṃ ‘tanvaṅga‍yā’ subhāṣitāvalau, ‘gehinyāḥ’ khagehinyā paritoṣabāṣpataralāmāsajya dṛṣṭiṃ ‘mayi’ ka khamukhe | dattvā pīluśamīkarīrakavalān ‘lolāñcalena’ śārṅgadharapaddhatausvenāñcalenādarā- dunmṛṣṭaṃ karabhasya kesarasaṭābhārāgralagnaṃ‘bhārāvalagnaṃ rajaḥ’ subhāṣitāvalau rajaḥ || 120 ||’ acetano yathā— ‘kṣiptaṃ puro na jagṛhe muhurikṣukāṇḍaṃ nāpekṣate sma nikaṭopagatāṃ kareṇum | sasmāra vāraṇapatiḥ parimīlitākṣa- micchāvihāravanavāsamahotsavānām‘mahotsavāntam’ kha || 121 ||’ jñānaṃ tridhā—dṛṣṭam, śrutam, anumānajaṃ ca || teṣu dṛṣṭaṃ yathā— ‘sarasijamanuviddhaṃ śaivalenāpi ramyaṃ malinamapi himāṃśorlakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanoti | iyamadhikamanojñā valkalenāpi tanvī kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ ‘maṇḍanena’ ga maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām || 122 ||’ śrutaṃ yathā— ‘kiṃ rūpaṃ sphuṭameva sā śaśimukhī dhatte tadatyadbhutaṃ māmutsāhayituṃ parāpakaraṇe cittaṃ kimasmatsvasuḥ | ityantarvikasadvitarkavidhuraṃ cetastathā vartate svalpo 'pyeṣa mama prayāti purataḥ panthā yathā dīrghatām 123’ anumānaṃ yathā— ‘śāntamidamāśramapadaṃ sphurati ca bāhuḥ kutaḥ phalamihāsya | athavā bhavitavyānāṃ dvārāṇi bhavanti sarvatra || 124 ||’ saṃskārastridhā—ādṛtaḥ, paṭuḥ, abhyastaśceti‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ kha | tatrāśrayaguṇenādarapratyayādutpanna‘ādarādutpanna’ ka kha ādṛto yathā— ‘kanyāratnamayonijanma bhavatāmāste vayaṃ cārthino ratnaṃ yatkvacidasti‘cetkvacidasti’ mudritamahāvīracarite tatpariṇamatyasmāsu śakrādapi | kanyāyāśca parārthataiva hi matā tasyāḥ pradānādahaṃ bandhurvo bhavitā pulastyapulahapraṣṭhāśca saṃbandhinaḥ || 125 ||’ viṣayaguṇena paṭupratyayādutpannaḥ paṭuryathā— ‘utpattirdevayajanādbrahmavādī nṛpaḥ pitā | suprasannojjvalā mūrtirasyāḥ‘mūrtirasyāṃ sneha’ mudritamahāvīracarite snehaṃ karoti me || 126 ||’ jñānapaunaḥ‘paunaḥpunyena’ ga ghapunyenābhyāsapratyayādutpanno 'bhyastaḥ || sa yathā— ‘bhūyo bhūyaḥ savidhanagarīrathyayā paryaṭantaṃ dṛṣṭa‍vā dṛṣṭa‍vā bhavanavalabhītuṅgavātāyanasthā | sākṣātkāmaṃ navamiva ratirmālatī mādhavaṃ yadgạ̄dhotkaṇṭhālulitalulitairaṅgakaistāmyatīti || 127 ||’ atra yadyapi viṣayaguṇāt paṭuḥ, āśrayaguṇādāhato 'pi‘ccādṛto 'pi’ ka kha pratyayaḥ, paṭumāhataṃ ca‘ca’ ka kha nāsti saṃskāraṃ ‘prasūyate’ ka khaprasūte tathāpyabhyāsātpaṭīyānāhatatamaśca jāyamāno 'bhyasta ityucyate || uddīpanavibhāveṣu mālyavastravibhūṣaṇādayo mālyādayaḥ || teṣu mālyaṃ yathā— ‘aśokanirbhartsitapadmarāgamākṛṣṭahemadyutikarṇikāram‘karnikāram’ kha | muktākalāpīkṛtasindhuvāraṃ vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī || 128 ||’ vastraṃ yathā— ‘āvarjitā kiṃcidiva stanābhyāṃ vāso vasānā taruṇārkarāgam | sujātapuṣpastabakāvanamrā‘stavakāvananrasaṃcāriṇī’ ka saṃcāriṇī pallavinī lateva || 129 ||’ vibhūṣaṇaṃ yathā— ‘kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca ‘nistulasya’ ka nistalasya | anyonyaśobhājananādbabhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ 130’ ‘ṛturvayomadādayaḥ’ ka khaṛtuvayomadādaya ṛtvādayaḥ | teṣu ṛturyathā— ‘idamapulabhavastu prārthanādunirvāraṃ prathamamapi mano me pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti | kimuta malayavātonmūlitāpāṇḍupattrai- rupavanasahakārairdarśiteṣvaṅkureṣu || 131 ||’ vayo yathā— ‘māmūmuhatkhalu bhavantamananyajanmā mā te malīmasavikāraghanā matirbhūt | ityādi nanviha nirarthakameva yasmā- tkāmaśca jṛmbhitaguṇo navayauvanaṃ ca || 132 ||’ mado yathā— ‘tatkṣaṇaṃ viparivartitahriyorneṣyatoḥ‘nekṣatoḥ’ gha śayanamiddharāgayoḥ | sā babhūva vaśavartinī ‘tayoḥ’ ka khadvayoḥ śūlinaḥ suvadanā madasya ca 133’ candanasnānadhūpādayaścandanādayaḥ | teṣu candanaṃ yathā— ‘candanaṃ viṣadharāśrayaḥ śaśī vāruṇī ca viṣasodarāvubhau | tāpayanti virahe kimucyate mārayanti na yadetadadbhutam 134’ snānaṃ yathā— ‘āambaloaṇāṇaṃ ‘ullu tua’ ka, ‘uttuṃsua’ khaollaṃsuapā‘paaḍorujahaṇā’ kaaḍorujahaṇāṇaṃ | ‘avaruhṇa’ ka khaavaraṇhamajjirīṇaṃ kae ṇa kāmo ‘vahaï cāvaṃ’ iti kāvyamālāmudritagāthāsaptaśatyām, ka kha cadhaṇuṃ vahaï || 135 ||’ [ātāmralocanānāmārdrāṃśukaprakaṭorujaghanānām | aparāhṇamajjanaśīlānāṃ kṛte na kāmo dhanurvahati ||] dhūpo yathā— ‘snānārdramukteṣva‘śuṣkeṣu’ ghanudhūpavāsaṃ vinyastasāyantanamallikeṣu | kāmo ‘vasantātapa’ khavasantātyayamandavīryaḥ keśeṣu lebhe balamaṅganānām 136’ candrodayo ghanadhvanirupakārasmaraṇamityādyāścandrodayādayaḥ | teṣu candrodayo yathā— ‘‘vilimpantyetasmin’ ghavilimpatyetasminmalayajarasārdreṇa‘malayarajasādreṃṇa’ ka kha mahasā diśāṃ vaktraṃ candre sukṛtamatha tasyā mṛgadṛśaḥ | dṛśorbāṣpaḥ pāṇau vadanamasavaḥ kaṇṭhakuhare hṛdi tvaṃ hrīḥ pṛṣṭhe vacasi ca guṇā eva bhavataḥ || 137’ ghanadhvaniryathā— ‘ajja mae teṇa viṇā ‘aṇubhūasuhāiṃ aṇisaṃbharantīe’ ka khaaṇuhūasuhāiṁ saṃmaraṃtīe | ‘ahiṇavamohaṇaravo’ kha ahiṇavamehāṇaṁ ravo ṇisāmio ‘vajjapaḍahovva’ ghavajjhapaḍaho vva || 138 ||’ [adya mayā tena vinānubhūtasukhāni saṃsmarantyā | abhinavameghānāṃ ravo niśāmito vadhyapaṭaha iva ||] upakārasmaraṇaṃ yathā— ‘tanme manaḥ kṣipati yatsarasaprahāramālokya māmagaṇitaskhaladuttarīyā | trastaika‘hāyaṇa’ khahāyanakuraṅgaviloladṛṣṭirāśliṣṭavatyamṛtasaṃvalitairivāṅgaiḥ || 139 ||’ anubhāveṣu ‘smaratirthathā’ ka khasmarati yathā— ‘khaṇamettaṃ pi‘vi’ gha ṇa phiṭṭaï aṇudiahaṃ ‘aṇudiahaviiṇṇagaruasaṃtāvā’ gāthāsapta॰ ‘diṇṇaguruasaṃtāvā’ ghadiṇṇagaruasaṃtāvā | ‘pacchaṇṇapāpasaṃkavva’ gha, ‘pacchannapāvasaṃkevva’ gāthāsapta॰pacchaṇṇapāvasaṃkavva sāmalī majjha ‘hiaāo’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘hiaāhi’ ka kha gahiaāhiṁ || 140 ||’ [kṣaṇamātramapi nāpagac‍chatyanudivasaṃ dattagurukasaṃtāpā | pracchannapāpaśaṅkeva śyāmalāṅgī mama hṛdayāt ||] vāñchati‘vāñchatiryathā’ ka kha yathā— ‘emea ‘akaapuṇṇā’ ghaakaaüṇṇā appattamaṇorahā vivajjisaṃ | jaṇavāo vi ṇa jāo teṇa samaṃ haliaütteṇa‘haliaputteṇa’ gha || 141 ||’ [evamevākṛtapuṇyāprāptamanorathā vipatsye | janavādo 'pi na jātastena samaṃ halikaputreṇa ||] dveṣṭi‘dveṣṭiryathā’ ka kha yathā— ‘gottakkhalaṇaṃ soūṇa piaame ajja ‘tīa’ gāthāsapta॰māmi ‘khaṇadiahe’ iti tatraivachaṇadiahe | vajjhamahisassa mālavva maṃḍaṇaṃ se ṇa ‘uaha’ paśyata ityapi capaḍihāi || 142 ||’ [gotraskhalanaṃ śrutvā priyatame 'dya sakhi utsavadivasekṣaṇadivase | vadhyamahiṣasya māleva maṇḍanamasyā na pratibhāti ||] prayatate yathā— ‘anugacchanmunitanayāṃ sahasā vinayena vāritaprasaraḥ | svasthānādacalannapi gatveva punaḥ pratinivṛttaḥ || 143 ||’ ‘avaitiryathā’ ka khaavaiti yathā— ‘candasarisaṃ muhaṃ se sariso amaassa muharaso tissā | sakaaggaharahasujjalacuṃbaṇaaṃ kassa sarisaṃ se || 144 ||’ [candrasadṛśaṃ mukhamasyāḥ sadṛśo 'mṛtasya mukharasastasyāḥ | sakacagraharabhasojjvalacumbanakaṃ kasya sadṛśamasyāḥ ||] manyate yathā— ‘‘parivaṭṭa diva’ ka, ‘parivaṭṭadivaṃ’ khaparivaṭṭaṃtiva ṇisaṃsa(ma)i maṃḍaliakusumāuhaṃ va aṇaṃgaṃ | virahammi maṇṇaï harīṇahe‘hariṇahe agatthe’ ka, ‘harīṇāhe’ ‘aṇatthe’ kha aṇatthapaḍiuṭṭhiaṃ va miaṃkam || 145’ [parivartamāneva(?) niśāmyate maṇḍalitakusumāyudhamivānaṅgam | virahe manyate hārinakhe anarthapratyutthitamiva mṛgāṅkam ||] vakti yathā— ‘ālāo mā dijjaü loaviruddhatti ṇāma kāūṇa | samuhāvaḍie ko verie vi diṭṭhiṃ ṇa pāḍei || 146 ||’ [ālāpo mā dīyatāṃ lokaviruddha iti nāma kṛtvā | saṃmukhāpatite ko vairiṇyapi dṛpṭiṃ na pātayati ||] ceṣṭate yathā— ‘ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa | ajjā ṇimīliacchī paaparivāḍiṃ ghare kuṇaï || 147 ||’ [adya mayā gantavyaṃ ghanāndhakāre 'pi tasya subhagasya | āryā nimīlitākṣī padaparipāṭīṃ gṛhe karoti ||] saṃcāriṣu svedaromāñcavepathavo yathā— ‘diṭṭhe jaṃ pulaïjjasi ‘rahagharasi’ ka khatharaharasi piammi jaṃ samāsaṇṇe | tuha saṃbhāsaṇa‘seoli’ ka, ‘seolli’ khaseulliphaṃsaṇe kiṃ vi ‘ṇijjihasi’ ka khaṇijjihisi || 148 ||’ [dṛṣṭe yatpulakāyase tharaharāyase priye yatsamāsanne | tava saṃbhāṣaṇasvedārdrīkṛtasparśe kimapi nīyase ||] aśru yathā— ‘‘ṇaaṇavbhaṃtara’ ka kha, ‘ṇaaṇaṃtara’ ga ghaṇaaṇabbhaṃtaragholaṃtabāhabharamaṃtharāi‘mantharāe’ ka kha ga gha diṭṭhīe | puṇaruttapechirīe‘peccharīe’ ka kha vālaa kiṃ jaṃ ṇa bhaṇio si || 149 ||’ [nayanābhyantaraghūrṇamānabāṣpabharamantharayā dṛṣṭayā | punaruktaprekṣaṇaśīlayā bālaka kiṃ yanna bhaṇito 'si ||] harṣo yathā— ‘savvassammi vidaddhe(ḍ̣dhe)‘vidaṭṭe’ ka kha taha vi hu hiaassa ṇivvudi ccea | jaṃ teṇa gāmaḍāhe hatthāhatthiṃ kuḍo gahio || 150 ||’ [sarvasve 'pi dagdhe tathāpi khalu hṛdayasya nirvṛtireva | yattena grāmadāhe hastāhasti kuṇḍo gṛhītaḥ ||] amarṣo yathā— ‘katto saṃpaḍaï ‘mahampi’ ka, ‘maī’ kha maha pi piasahi piasaṃgamo paose vi | jaṃ jiajaï‘aï’ gha gahia‘kūra’ ka khakaraṇiara khiṃkhirīśaranirmitavādyaviśeṣaḥ ‘khikkhirī ḍumbacindhalaṭhṭhīe’ iti deśīnāmamālā | ḍumbādīnāṃ sparśaparihārāryaṃ cihnayaṣṭiḥ caṃdacaṃḍālo’ || [kutaḥ saṃpatati mamāpi priyasakhi priyasaṃgamaḥ pradoṣe 'pi | yajjīvati gṛhītakaranikarakhiṃkhirī candracaṇḍālaḥ ||] līlādiṣu priyajanaceṣṭānukṛtilīṃlā yathā— ‘jaṃ jaṃ karesi jaṃ jaṃ jappasi jaṃ‘jaha tuma’ kāvyamālāmudritagāthāsapta॰ jaṃ ṇiacchesi | taṃ tamaṇusikkharīe‘śikkhirīe’ kha, ‘sikkhirīe’ ityapi gāthāsapta॰ dīho diaho ṇa saṃpaḍaï || 152 ||’ [yadyatkaroṣi yadyajjalpasi yadyannirīkṣase | tattadanuśikṣaṇaśīlāyā dīrgho divaso na saṃpadyate ||] netrabhrūvaktrakarmaṇāṃ viśeṣaṇe lasanaṃ vilāso yathā— ‘sabhrūvilāsamatha so 'yamitīrayitvā sapratyabhijñamiva māmavalokya tasyāḥ | anyonyabhāvacatureṇa sakhījanena muktāstadā smitasudhāmadhurāḥ kaṭākṣāḥ || 153 ||’ vibhūṣaṇādīnāmanādaravinyāso vicchittiryathā— ‘aṅgāni candanarajaḥparidhūsarāṇi tāmbūlarāgasulabho 'dharapallavaśca | acchāñjane ca nayane vasanaṃ tanīyaḥ kāntāsu bhūṣaṇamidaṃ vibhavaśca śeṣaḥ || 154 ||’ vibhūṣaṇādīnāmasthānaprayogo vibhramo yathā— ‘cakāra kācitsitacandanāṅke kāñcīkalāpaṃ stanabhārapṛṣṭhe | priyaṃ prati preṣitacittavṛtti- rnitambabimbe ca ‘babandha’ ga ghababhāra hāram || 155 ||’ smitaruditahasitādīnāṃ harṣādasakṛdekīkaraṇaṃ kilakiñcitaṃ yathā— ‘pāṇipallavavidhūnanamantaḥsītkṛtāni ‘ghanaromavibhedāḥ’ ga nayanārdhanimeṣāḥ | yoṣitāṃ rahasi gadgadavācāmastratāmupayayurmadanasya || 156 ||’ dṛṣṭajanakathāyāṃ tadbhāvabhāvanotthitavikāro moṭṭāyitaṃ yathā— ‘tava sā kathāsu parighaṭṭayati śravaṇaṃ yadaṅgulimukhena muhuḥ | ghanatāṃ dhruvaṃ nayati tena bhavadguṇapūgapūritamatṛptatayā || 157 ||’ keśastanādharādigrahaṇādduḥkhe 'pi sukhabuddhiceṣṭā kuṭṭamitaṃ yathā— ‘hnībharādavanataṃ parirambhe rāgavānavaṭujeṣvavakṛṣya | arpitoṣṭhadalamānanapadmaṃ yoṣito mukulitākṣamadhāsīt || 158 ||’ abhīṣṭaprāptāvabhimānagarvasaṃbhāvanānādarakṛto viṃkāro ‘vicchoko’ ghavivvoko yathā— ‘nirvibhujya daśanacchadaṃ tato vāci bharturavadhīraṇāparā | śailarājatanayā samīpagāmālalāpa vijayāmahetukam || 159 ||’ sukumāratayā karacaraṇāṅganyāso lalitaṃ yathā— ‘gurutarakala‘nūpurānurāvaṃ’ khanūpurānunādaṃ‘nurāvaṃ’ ka kha salalitanartitavāmapādapadmā | itaradanatilolamādadhānā padamatha manmathamantharaṃ jagāma 160’ vaktavyasamaye 'pi vacasābhibhāṣya kriyānuṣṭhānaṃ vihṛtaṃ yathā— ‘patyuḥ śiraścandrakalāmanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam | sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna || 161 ||’ bālyakaumārayauvanasādhāraṇo vihāraviśeṣaḥ krīḍitaṃ yathā— ‘mandākinīsaikatavedikābhiḥ sā kandukaiḥ kṛtrimaputrakaiśca | reme muhurmadhyagatā sakhīnāṃ krīḍārasaṃ nirviśatīva bālye || 162 ||’ krīḍitameva ‘priyatamaviṣayaṃ’ ghapriyatamaviṣaye keliryathā— ‘vyapohitaṃ locanato mukhānilai- rapārayantaṃ kila puṣpajaṃ rajaḥ | payodhareṇorasi kācidunmanāḥ priyaṃ jaghānonnatapīvarastanī || 163 ||’ helādiṣu rāgataḥ sahasā pravṛttihetuścittollāso helā | sā striyāṃ yathā— ‘rehaï piaparirambhaṇapasāriaṃ suraamaṃdiraddāre | ‘jave helā’ deśīnāmamālā, ‘tumutammi koue halahala’ ityapihelāhalahaliathorathaṇaharaṃ bhualaājualaṃ || 164 ||’ [rājate priyaparirambhaṇaprasāritaṃ suratamandiradvāre | vegakautukitasthūlastanabharaṃ bhujalatāyugalam ||] saiva puruṣe yathā— ‘uttiṣṭhantyā ratānte bharamuragapatau pāṇinaikena kṛtvā dhṛtvā cānyena vāso vigalitakavarībhāramaṃse vahantyāḥ | bhūyastatkālakāntidviguṇitasurataprītinā śauriṇā vaḥ śayyāmāliṅgya nītaṃ vapuralasalasadbāhu lakṣmyāḥ punātu || 165 ||’ helaiva savacanavinyāso hāvaḥ | sa striyāṃ yathā— ‘jaï ṇa chivasi pupphavaïṃ purao tā kīsa‘kī so’ kha vārio ṭhāsi | chittosi culuculantehiṁ ‘dhāviuṇa amha’ iti mudritagāthāsapta॰, ‘pahāviūṇāmbhahatthehiṃ’ ga ghapahāviūṇa maha hatthehiṃ || 166 ||’ [yadi na spṛśasi puṣpavatīṃ puratastatkiṃ vāritastiṣṭhasi | spṛṣṭo 'si culuculāyamānaiḥ dhāvitvāsmākaṃ hastābhyām ||] sa eva puruṣe yathā— ‘loo jūraï ‘jhūraï’ ka ‘jhūraü’ khajūraü vaaṇijjaṃ hoi hou taṃ ṇāma | ehi ‘ṇimajjasu’ mudritagāthāsapta॰ṇimajjasu‘ṇisijjasu’ ka kha, ‘ṇisajjasu’ ga gha pāse pupphavaï ṇa ei me ṇiddā || 167 ||’ [lokaḥ khidyate khidyatu vacanīyaṃ bhavati bhavatu tannāma | ehi nimajja pārśve puṣpavati naiti me nidrā ||] ādigrahaṇena bhāvādayo gṛhyante | teṣu bhāvāḥ striyāṃ yathā— ‘tāvaccia raïsamae mahilāṇaṃ vibbhamā virāaṃti | jāva ṇa kuvalaadala‘sacchāhāiṁ’ khasacchahāiṁ maüleṃti ṇaaṇāiṃ || 168 ||’ [tāvadeva ratisamaye mahilānāṃ vibhramā virājante | yāvanna kuvalayadalasacchāyāni mukulībhavanti nayanāni ||] vyājaḥ puṃso yathā— ‘aliapasuttaviṇimīliaccha de suhaa majjha oāsaṃ | gaṃḍapariuṃbaṇāpulaïaṃga ṇa puṇo cirāissaṃ || 169 ||’ [‘dehīti śeṣaḥ | desu dhaa majjha’ kvacit | atra he dhava, mamāvakāśaṃ dehīti yojyam |’ kecittu ‘desu haamajjha’ iti padacchedaḥ hatamadhya aṅgavinyāsaruddhamadhya=dehi avakāśam arthānmama ityāhuḥ’ iti gāthāsaptaśatyā vyākhyātā gaṅgādharabhaṭṭa iti gā. sa. vyākhyātāalīkaprasuptavinimīlitākṣa he subhaga mamāvakāśam | gaṇḍaparicumbanāpulakitāṅga na punaścirayiṣyāmi ||] visrambhabhāṣaṇaṃ striyā yathā— ‘jāo so vi vilakkho mae vi hasiūṇa gāḍhamuvagụ̄dho | paḍhamosariassa ṇiaṃsaṇassa gaṃṭhiṃ vimagganto || 170 ||’ [jātaḥ so 'pi vilakṣo mayāpi hasitvā gāḍhamupagūḍhaḥ | ‘prathametyanurāgātiśayena priyasparśātpūrvameva skhalitasya vasanasya granthim’prathamāpasṛtasya nivasanasya granthiṃ vimārgayamāṇaḥ ||] cāṭu strīpuṃsayoryathā— ‘ekkaṃ ‘ruvvāṇaṃ’ kapaharuvviṇṇaṃ hatthaṃ muhamāruṇṇaṃ eṇa vīaṃto | so vi hasaṃtīeĕ mae gahio vīeṇa kaṃṭhammi || 171 ||’ [ekaṃ prahārodvignaṃ hastaṃ mukhamārutena bījayan | so 'pi hasantyā mayā gṛhīto dvitīyena kaṇṭhe ||] premābhisaṃdhānaṃ puṃso yathā— ‘kelīgottakkhalaṇe varassa papphullaïṃ dihiṃ dehi | bahuvāsaavāsahare bahue vāholliā diṭṭhī || 172 ||’ [kelīgotraskhalane varasya praphullāṃ dhṛtiṃ dadhāti | bahuvāsakavāsagṛhe vadhvā bāṣpārditā dṛṣṭiḥ ||] parihāsaḥ striyāṃ(yā) yathā— ‘aï diara kiṃ ṇa ‘dicchī’ ga ghapecchasi āāsaṃ kiṃ muhā paloesi | jāāi bāhumūlaṃ mi ‘addhaandāṇa’ ka kha ga addhaandāṇaṁ paḍivāḍiṃ || 173 ||’ [ayi devara kiṃ na prekṣasa ākāśaṃ kiṃ mudhā pralokayasi | jāyāyā bāhumūle 'rdhacandrāṇāṃ paripāṭīm ||] kutūhalaṃ puṃso yathā— ‘asamattamaṃḍaṇaccia‘asamattamaḍaṇā via’ mudritagāthāsapta॰, ‘maṃḍaṇaṃ via’ ka vacca gharaṃ se sakouhallassa | ‘koue halahalahalam’ deśī nāmamālā, gāthāsaptaśatyanusāraṃ ca ‘halahalaasya’ pāṭhaḥ | ‘halahalakaṃ kāmautsukyamiti deśī’ kulabāladevaḥ | atra draṣṭavyā śrīpitṛcaraṇānāṃ ṭippaṇībolāviahalahalassaa[assa]putti citte ṇa ‘laggihasi’ kalaggihisi ||’ [asamāptamaṇḍanaiva vraja gṛhaṃ tasya sakautūhalasya | vyatikrāntautsukyasya putri citte na lagiṣyasi ||] cakitaṃ striyā yathā— ‘‘ṇavalaïāpāharaṃ’ ka dolāvilāsasamaye 'jattha palāsalayāe jaṇehi païṇāma pucchiā juvaī | akahantī ṇihaṇijjaï ṇiamaviseso ṇavalayā sā ||’ deśīnāmamālāṇavalaï pahāratuṭhṭhāi‘tuṭṭhāe’ ka kha taṃ kaaṃ kiṃ pi haliasoṇhāe | jaṃ ajja vi juaïjaṇo ghare ghare sikkhiuṃ bhamaï || 175 ||’ [patināmapraśnapūrvakaprahāratuṣṭayā tatkṛtaṃ kimapi hālikasnuṣayā | yadadyāpi yuvatijano gṛhe gṛhe śikṣituṃ bhramati ||] helā ‘bhāvaśca hāvaśca’ khahāvaśca bhāvaśca vyājo visrambhabhāṣaṇam | cāṭu premābhisaṃdhānaṃ parihāsaḥ kutūhalam || 168 || cakitaṃ ceti nirdiṣṭāśceṣṭāḥ kāścidvilāsinām | śeṣāṇāṃ vipralambhādau rūpamāvirbhaviṣyati || 169 || tatra nāyakayoḥ prāgasaṃgatayoḥ, saṃgatayośca, saṃgataviyuktayorvā, mithodarśanaśravaṇābhyāmavasthitābhimānajanmā parasparānurāgo 'nyatarānurāgo vābhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādīnāmanavāptau satyāṃ samupajāyamānaistaistairutkaṇṭhādibhirvyabhicāribhāvairmanovāgbuddhiśarīrārambhajanmabhiścānubhāvairanubaddhaḥ prāptaprāpyaprakarṣāvastho vipralambhaśrṛṅgārākhyāṃ labhate | sa caturdhā—pūrvānurāgo, mānaḥ, pravāsaḥ, karuṇaśca || teṣu prāgasaṃgatayoḥ pūrvānurāgaḥ puruṣaprakāṇḍe yathā— ‘dūraṃ muktālatayā bisasitayā vipralobhyamāno me | haṃsa iva darśitāśo mānasajanmā tvayā nītaḥ || 176 ||’ atra puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetāyāṃ prāgasaṃgatāyāṃ samutpannaḥ saṃkalparamaṇīyo 'bhilāṣastadanāptāvuktaprakāreṇa prakṛṣyamāṇastvayā me ‘sa’ khamānasajanmā dūraṃ nīta ityuttarakāmāvasthayā prakāśyate || sa eva strīprakāṇḍe yathā— ‘dullahajaṇānurāo lajjā garuī paravaso appā | piasahi visamaṃ pemmaṃ maraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ mudritaratnāvalyāṃ tu ‘ṇa vārakkaṃ’ pāṭhaḥ, ‘na pārakyam’ chāyā ca | ‘nā ariṇavantarye’ deśīnāmamālāyāṣṭīkāyāmṇavari ekkaṃ || 177 ||’ [durlabhajanānurāgo lajjā gurvī paravaśa ātmā | priyasakhi viṣamaṃ prema maraṇaṃ śaraṇamanantaramekam ||] atrāpi prāgvadeva sāgarikāyā vatsarāje 'nurāgaḥ prakṛṣyamāṇo maraṇaṃ śaraṇamityuttarayaiva kāmāvasthayā kathyate || saṃgatayormānaḥ sa nirheturyathā— ‘atthakkarūsaṇaṃatthakketyākasmike 'dbhute vā deśī khaṇapasijjaṇaṃ aliavaaṇaṇibbandho | unmatsareti bahule | ‘unmūrcchanaṃ pratikūlavācā prakopanam’ iti prācīnaṭīkā gaṅgādharabhaṭṭoṭṭaṅkitāummaccharasaṃtāvo puttaa paavī siṇehassa || 178 ||’ [akasmādroṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇaprasādanamalīkavacananirbandhaḥ | unmatsarasaṃtāpaḥ putraka padavī snehasya ||] atra premagateḥ svabhāvakauṭilyāddhetumantareṇopajāyamāno nirheturucyate sa eva saheturyathā— ‘‘paḍiutthiā’ ka khapaḍiucchiā ṇa jaṃpaï gahiā vi pphuraï cumbiā rusaï | tuṇhiṃkā‘tuṇhiṃbhūā’ ka kha ṇavabahuā ‘kaāvarāeṇa’ ghakaāvarāheṇa daïeṇa || 179 ||’ [paripṛṣṭā na jalpati gṛhītāpi sphurati cumvitā ruṣyati | tūṣṇīṃbhūtā navavadhūkā kṛtāparādhena dayitena ||] atra yadyapyāliṅganāderneti netyādeḥ pratiṣedho na vidyate tathāpi tadartho 'styeveti mānalakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭate || saṃgataviyuktayoḥ pravāsaḥ | sa navānurāgo yathā— ‘priyamādhave kimasi mayyavatsalā nanu so 'hameva yamanandayatpurā | ‘svayamāgṛhīta’ iti Dr. R. G. Bhandarkar saṃpādite mālatīmādhaveayamāgṛhītakamanīyakaṅkaṇaḥ ‘tava’ ka gha | mudrite ca ‘viditaḥ kaitavavatsalastava’sakhi mūrtimāniva mahotsavaḥ karaḥ || 180 || atra vivāhānantarameva mālatyāḥ kapālakuṇḍalayāpahārānmādhavamālatyorayaṃ navānurāgaḥ pravāsa ucyate || sa eva praụdhānurāgo yathā— ‘tvāmālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyāmātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvadicchāmi kartum | asraistāvanmuhurupacitairdṛṣṭirālupyate me krūrastasminnapi na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ || 181 ||’ atra prācīnapraṇayaprasādanābhiranurāgasya praụdhiravagamyate || saṃgatayorevānyataravyapāye karuṇaḥ | sa strīvyapāye puruṣasya yathā— ‘dhruvamasmi śaṭhaḥ śucismite kalitaḥ kaitavavatsalastvayā | paralokamasaṃnivṛttaye yadanāmantrya‘yadanāpṛcchya’ iti mudritaraghuvaṃśe gatāsi māmitaḥ || 182 ||’ atrendumatīvyapāyādajasya duḥkhātiśayaḥ karuṇa ucyate || sa eva puruṣasya vyapāye striyā yathā— ‘hṛdaye vasasīti matpriyaṃ yadavocastadavaimi kaitavam | upacārapadaṃ na cedidaṃ tvamanaṅgaḥ kathamakṣatā ratiḥ || 183 ||’ atrānaṅgaviṣaye rateḥ ‘śokaprakarṣāt’ ka khaśokaprakarṣaḥ karuṇa ityākhyāyate || ‘hīnapātreṣu’ ghahīnapātrādiṣu caitadābhāsā bhavanti | tatra hīnapātreṣu puṃsi premānurāgo yathā— ‘kaalīgabbhasaricche ūrū daṭṭhūṇa haliasoṇhāe | ullalaï ṇaharaṃjaṇaṃ caṃdilassacandilo nāpitaḥ, caṇḍila iti tu saṃskṛtasamamiti deśīnāmamālāvyākhyā seulliakarassa || 184 ||’ [kadalīgarbhasadṛkṣe ūrū dṛṣṭa‍vā hālikasnuṣāyāḥ | ārdrībhavati nakharañjanaṃ nāpitasya svedārditakarasya ||] atraiva striyāṃ māno yathā— ‘paḍhamaghariṇīa samaaṃ ‘tuha’ ka, ‘tua’ khaua piṃḍāre‘piṇḍāraṃ’ kha daraṃ kuṇantammi | ṇavabahuāi sarosaṃ savva ccia vacchalā mukkā || 185 ||’ [prathamagṛhiṇyā samakaṃ paśyābhīre bhayaṃ kurvati | navavadhvā saroṣaṃ sarve 'pi ca vatsakā muktāḥ ||] tiryakṣu pakṣiṇi pravāso yathā— ‘āpṛcchāmi vyathayati mano durbalā vāsaraśrīre- hyāliṅga kṣapaya rajanīmekikā cakravāki | nānyāsakto na khalu kupito nānurāgacyuto vā daivādhīnaḥ sapadi bhavatīmasvatastrastyajāmi || 186 ||’ atraiva kariṇi‘kariṇīkarūṇo’ ka kha karuṇo yathā— ‘nāntarvartayati dhvanatsu jaladeṣvāmandramudgarjitaṃ nāsannātsarasaḥ karoti kavalānāvarjitaiḥ śaivalaiḥ | dānajyāniviṣaṇṇamūkamadhupavyāsaṅgadīnānano nūnaṃ prāṇasamāviyogavidhuraḥ‘vidhurastamberamaḥ’ ga kha gha stamberamastāmyati || 187 ||’ atha saṃbhogaḥ | tatra nāyakayoḥ prāgasaṃgatayoḥ saṃgataviyuktayorvā mithaḥ samāgame prāgutpannastadānīṃtano vā ratyākhyaḥ sthāyibhāvo 'bhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādīnāmavāptau satyāṃ samupajāyamānairharṣa-dhṛti-smṛti-matiprabhṛtibhirvyabhicāribhāvaiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ, ṛtūdyānopagamajalakrīḍāparvatopadeśaprasādhanagṛha‘prasādhanagraha'ga ghamadhupānendūdayādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ, savibhramabhrūkaṭākṣavikṣepālāpasaṃbhramasmitādibhiranubhāvairabhivyajyamāna īpsitamāsādayan, jihāsitaṃ vā jihānaḥ, prāptaprāpyaprakarṣārambhaḥ saṃbhogaśrṛṅgārākhyāṃ labhate | sa caturdhā—prathamānurāgānantaraḥ, mānānantaraḥ, pravāsānantaraḥ, karuṇānantara iti || teṣu prathamānurāgāntaro yathā— ‘pāṇiggahaṇe ccia‘pāṇiggahaṇe vvia pavvaïeĕ’ gāthāsapta॰ ‘pāṇiggahaṇavvia’ gha pavvaīa ṇāaṃ sahīhiṃ sohaggam | pasuvaïṇā vāsuikaṃkaṇammi osārie dūram || 188 ||’ [pāṇigrahaṇa eva pārvatyā jñātaṃ sakhībhiḥ saubhāgyam | paśupatinā vāsukikaṅkaṇe 'pasārite dūram ||] mānāntaro yathā— ‘uvvahaï dahaagahiāharoṭṭhajhijjantarosapaḍirāam | pāṇosarantamaïraṃ gauḍavahonāmni vākpativiracite prākṛtakāvye ‘phaliyacasayaṃ imā vayaṇaṃ’ pāṭhaḥ, ‘sphaṭikacaṣakameṣā vadanam’ iti chāyā cacasaaṃ va ṇiaṃ muhaṃ bālā || 189 ||’ [udvahati dayitagṛhitādharauṣṭhakṣīyamāṇaroṣapratirāgam | pānāpasaranmadiraṃ caṣakamiva nijaṃ sukhaṃ bālā ||] pravāsānantaro yathā— ‘maṃgalavalaaṃ jīaṃ va rakkhiaṃ jaṃ paütthavaïāi‘capajjhiavaïāe’ ka kha | pattapiadaṃsaṇūsasiabāhulaïāiṃ taṃ‘taṃ bhīe’ kha ﻿ bhiṇṇam || 190 ||’ [maṅgalavalayaṃ jīvitamiva rakṣitaṃ yatproṣitapatikayā | prāptapriyadarśanocchvasitabāhulatikāyāṃ tadbhinnam ||] karuṇānantaro yathā— ‘ṇa muammi‘muamhi’ gha mue vi pie diṭṭho uṇa piṃaamo jiaṃtīe | ia lajjā a ‘parihāso’ ka, ‘pahārihāso’ ca khapahariso tīe hiae ṇa saṃmāi || 191 ||’ [na mṛtāsmi mṛte 'pi priye dṛṣṭaḥ punaḥ priyatamo jīvantyā | iti lajjā ca praharṣastasyā hṛdaye na saṃmāti ||] te 'mī catvāro 'pi saṃbhogāścaturbhireva vipralambhaiḥ prakarṣamāpadyante || teṣu prathamānurāgeṇa yathā— ‘induryatra na nindyate na madhuraṃ dūtīvacaḥ śrūyate ‘nālāpā nipatanti vāṣpakaluṣā’nocchvāsā hṛdayaṃ dahantyaśiśirā nopaiti kārśyaṃ vapuḥ | svādhīnāmanukūlinīṃ svagṛhiṇīmāliṅgya yatsupyate tatkiṃ prema gṛhāśramavratamidaṃ kaṣṭaṃ samācaryate || 192 ||’ mānena yathā— ‘raïviggahammi‘rahavigāhammi’ kha kuṇṭhīkaāo dhārāo pemmakhaggassa | aṇamaāiṃ vva sijjhanti māṇasāiṃ ṇāi‘ṇāiṃ’ kha mihuṇāṇam 193’ [rativigrahe kuṇṭhīkṛtā dhārāḥ premakhaṅgasya | annamayānīva svidyanti mānasāni jñāyante mithunānām ||] pravāsena yathā— ‘śāpānto me bhujagaśayanādutthite śārṅgapāṇau' māsānetān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā | paścādāvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tamātmābhilāṣaṃ‘ātmābhiyogaṃ’ ka nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśaraccandrikāsu kṣapāsu || 194 ||’ karuṇena yathā— ‘na martyalokastridivātprahīyate mriyeta nāgre yadi vallabho janaḥ | nivṛttameva tridivaprayojanaṃ mṛtaḥ sa cejjīvata eva jīvati 195’ tiryagādiṣu caitadābhāsā bhavanti || teṣu sarīsṛpamṛgayoryathā— ‘madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikapātre papau priyāṃ svāmanuvartamānaḥ | śrṛṅgeṇa saṃsparśanimīlitākṣīṃ mṛgīmakaṇḍūyata kṛṣṇasāraḥ 196’ paśupakṣiṇoryathā— ‘dadau saraḥpaṅkajareṇugandhi gajāya gaṇḍūṣajalaṃ kareṇuḥ | ardhopabhuktena bisena jāyāṃ saṃbhāvayāmāsa rathāṅganāmā || 197 ||’ kiṃnareṣu yathā— ‘gītāntareṣu śramavārileśaiḥ ‘īṣatsamucchvāsitapattralekham’ ghakiṃcitsamuccha‍vāsitapattralekham | puṣpāsavādhūrṇitanetraśobhi priyāmukhaṃ kiṃpuruṣaścacumbe || 198 ||’ taruṣu yathā— ‘paryāptapuṣpastabakastanībhyaḥ sphuratpravāloṣṭhamanoharābhyaḥ‘prabālauṣṭhamanoharābhyaḥ’ gha | latāvadhūbhyastaravo 'pyavāpurvinamraśākhābhujabandhanāni || 199 ||’ vipralambhaceṣṭāsu prathamānurāge striyā yathā— ‘pecchaï ‘aladdhalacchadī ha’ ka khaaladdhalakkhaṃ dīhaṃ ṇīsasaï suṇṇaaṃ hasaï | jaï jaṃpaï aphuḍatthaṃ taha se hiaaṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ vi || 200 ||’ [prekṣate 'labdhalakṣyaṃ dīrghaṃ niḥśvasiti śūnyaṃ hasati | yathā jalpatyasphuṭārthaṃ tathāsyā hṛdayasthitaṃ kimapi ||] puṃso yathā— ‘so tuha‘tujjha kae sundari’ kā. mā. mudritagāthāsapta॰ kaeṇa suṃdari taha ‘jhīṇo’ ka khajhīṇo sumahilo haliaütto | jaha se macchariṇīa vi doccaṃ jāāe paḍibaṇṇam 201’ [sa tava kṛtena sundari tathā kṣīṇaḥ sumahilo hālikaputraḥ | yathāsya matsariṇyāpi dautyaṃ jāyayā pratipannam ||] māne striyā yathā— ‘‘kāṇḍujjuā’ gāthāsapta॰ kāṇḍavadṛjukā, ‘kaṇṇujjuā’ iti pāṭhe karṇaṛjukā karṇadurbaletyartha iti ṭīkākṛt | ‘alasā ia ruṇṇaviambhiāi’ gāthāsapta॰kaṇṇujjuā varāī sā ajja tae kaāvarāheṇa | ‘jaṃ bhāiprā’ kajaṃbhāiarukkhapaloaïāiṃ diaheṇa sikkhiviā‘sikkhaviā’ ka || 202 ||’ [karṇarjukā varākī sādya tvayā kṛtāparādhena | jṛmbhāyitarūkṣapralokitāni divasena śikṣitā ||] puṃso yathā— ‘avibhāviaraaṇimuhaṃ tassa a saccariavimalacandujjoam | jāaṃ piāvirohe baḍhaṃtāṇuamūḍhalakkhaṃ hiaama || 203 ||’ [avibhāvitarajanīmukhaṃ tasyāśca saccaritavimalacandroddayotam | jātaṃ priyāvirodhe vardhamānānuśayamūḍhalakṣyaṃ hṛdayam ||] pravāse striyā yathā— ‘piyasaṃbharaṇapalloṭṭa‘paoṭṭaṃta’ kha tavāhadhārāṇi‘niāa’ kavāabhiāe | dijjaï vaṃkaggīvāi‘baṃkaggīvāe’ gāthāsapta॰ dīvao pahiajāāe || 204 ||’ [priyasaṃsmaraṇapraluṭhadbāṣpadhārānipātabhītayā | dīyate vakragrīvayā dīpakaḥ pathikajāyayā ||] puṃso yathā— ‘majjhaṇṇapatthiassa vi gimhe pahiassa haraï saṃtāvam | hiaaṭṭhiajāāmuhamiaṃkajoṇhājalappavaho‘jalappavāhe’ ka || 205 ||’ [madhyāhnaprasthitasyāpi grīṣme pathikasya harati saṃtāpam | hṛdayasthitajāyāmukhamṛgāṅkajyotsnajalapravāhaḥ ||] karuṇe striyā yathā— ‘ṇavari a pasāriaṃgī raabhariuppahapaïṇṇaveṇībaṃdhā | paḍiā urasaṃdāṇiamahialacakkalaï‘cakkūlaï’ kaatthaṇī jaṇaasuā 206’ [anantaraṃ ca prasāritāṅgī rajobharitotpathaprakīrṇaveṇībandhā | patitoraḥsaṃdānitamahītalacakrīkṛtastanī janakasutā ||] puṃso yathā— ‘‘antohuttaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰aṃtohuṃtaṃ ḍajjhaï jāāsuṇṇe dhare haliaütto | ukkhittaṇihāṇāiṃ va ramiaṭhṭhāṇāiṃ pecchaṃto‘pekkhanto’ ka || 207 ||’ [antarabhimukhaṃ dahyate jāyāśūnye gṛhe hālikaputraḥ | utkṣiptanidhānānīva ramitasthānāni paśyan ||] ‘evamanyatrāpi’ ka khaevamanyā api || karuṇavarjaṃ striyā yathā— ‘saudhādudvijate tyajatyupavanaṃ dveṣṭi prabhāmaindavīṃ dvārāttrasyati citrakelisadaso‘citrakelisadane’ ka veṣaṃ viṣaṃ manyate | āste kevalamabjinīkisalayaprastāraśayyātale saṃkalpopanatatva‘panamattva’ kadākṛtirasāyattena cittena sā || 208 ||’ striyā eva prathamānurāgavarjaṃ yathā— ‘tiṣṭhaḥ dvāri bhavāṅgaṇe vraja bahiḥ ‘sa preti’ khasadmeti vartmekṣate śālāmañca tamaṅgamañca valabhīmañceti veśmāñcati | dūtīṃ saṃdiśa saṃdiśeti bahuśaḥ saṃdiśya sāste tathā talpe kalpamayīva nirghṛṇa yathā nāntaṃ niśā gacchati 209’ prathamānurāgavarjaṃ puṃso yathā— ‘ramyaṃ dveṣṭiṃ pusa yathā prakṛtibhirna pratyahaṃ sevyate śayyo pāntavivartanaurviṃgamayatyunnidra eva kṣapāḥ | dākṣiṇyena dadāti vācamucitāmantaḥpurebhyo yadā gotreṣu skhalitastadā bhavati sa‘ca’ ka mudrite 'bhijñānaśākuntale ca vrīḍāvanamraściram 210’ puṃsa eva pravāsakaruṇayoryathā— ‘sītāveśma yato nirīkṣya harate dṛṣṭiṃ jhaṭityākulā manyonyārpitacañcudattakavalaiḥ pārāvatairdūyate‘bhūyate’ ka kha || indordūrata eva naśyati viśatyantargṛhaṃ duḥkhitaḥ pracchādyānanamañcalena rajanīpvastatrapaṃ roditi || 211 ||’ saṃbhogaceṣṭāsu pūrvānurāgāntare cumbanaṃ yathā— ‘āarapaṇāmioṭṭhaṃ aghaḍiaṇāsaṃ ‘asaṃghalia’ ka ‘asaṃvalia’ khaasaghaḍiaṇilāḍam | ‘vaeṇaaluppamuhīe tīe’ ka, ‘vaṇavaaluppamuhūe tīe’ khavaṇṇagghaalippamuhīa tīa pariuṃbaṃṇaṃ marimo || 212 ||’ [ādarapraṇāmitauṣṭhamaghaṭitanāsamasaṃghaṭitalalāṭam | varṇadhṛtaliptamukhyāstasyāḥ paricumbanaṃ smarāmaḥ ||] atraivāliṅganaṃ yathā— ‘tāvamavaṇei ṇa tahā caṃdaṇapaṃko vi kāmimihuṇāṇam | jaha dūsahe vi‘vi’ ka kha nāsti gimhe aṇṇoṇṇāliṃgaṇasuhellīgāthāsaptaśatyāṃ ‘sukhakeliḥ’ iti cchāyā | deśīnāmamālāyāṃ tu 'suhe suhellīa’ iti, ‘suhellī sukham suhallītyanye’ iti ṭīkā ca || 213 ||’ [tāpamapanayati na tathā candanapaṅko 'pi kābhimithunānām | yathā duḥsahe 'pi grīṣme 'nyonyāliṅganasukham ||] mānānantare cumbanaṃ yathā— ‘jaha jaha se pariuṃbaï‘paḍiuṃbaï’ kha maṇṇubhariāiṃ’ ṇihuvaṇe daïo | acchīiṃ uvari uvari taha taha bhiṇṇāiṃ vigalaṃti || 214 ||’ [yathā yathāsyāḥ paricumbati manyubharitāni nidhuvane dayitaḥ | akṣīṇyuparyupari tathā tathā bhinnāni vigalanti ||] atraivāliṅganaṃ yathā— ‘‘mānaduma’ ghamāṇadumaparusapavaṇassa māmi savvaṃgaṇibbudiarassa | gāthāsapta॰ ‘avaūhaṇassa’ iti, ‘avagūhanasya’ iti cchāyā cauvaūhaṇassa bhaddaṃ raïṇāḍaapuvvaraṃgassa || 215 ||’ [mānadrumaparuṣapavanasya mātulāni sarvāṅganirvṛtikarasya | upagūhanasya bhadraṃ ratināṭakapūrvaraṅgasya ||] pravāsānantare‘pravāsānantaraṃ’ ka kha cumbanaṃ yathā— ‘kenacinmadhuramulbaṇarāgaṃ bāṣpataptamadhikaṃ viraheṣu | oṣṭhapallavamapāsya muhūrtaṃ subhruvaḥ sarasamakṣi cucumbe || 216 ||’ karuṇānantaramāliṅganaṃ yathā— ‘candrāpīḍaṃ sā ca jagrāha kaṇṭhe kaṇṭhasthānaṃ jīvitaṃ ca prapede | tenāpūrvāṃ sā samullāsalakṣmīminduṃ spṛṣṭa‍vā sindhuveleva bheje 217’ ‘prathamarāgānantaraṃ daśanakṣataṃ’ ka, ‘prathamānurāgānantaraṃ daśanakṣataṃ’ khaprathamānurāgānantare dantakṣataṃ yathā— ‘ṇāsaṃ va sā kavole ajja vi tuha daṃtamaṃḍalaṃ bālā | ubbhiṇṇapulaabaī‘pariveḍha’ ka khaveḍhaparigaaṃ rakkhaï varāī || 218 ||’ [nyāsamiva sā kapole 'dyāpi tava dantamaṇḍalaṃ bālā | udbhinnapulakavṛtiveṣṭaparigataṃ rakṣati varākī ||] tadeva mānānantare yathā— ‘pavaṇuvvelliasāhuli‘vatthabbhūbhuasāhāpikisarisasahīsu sāhulī cea |’ iti deśīnāmamālā, ‘sāhulī vastraṃ bhurbhujaḥ śākhā pikī sadṛśaḥ sakhī ceti saptārdhāḥ’ iti taṭṭakā ca ‘thaeva suṭhaṭhia’ ka, ‘tthaevasaṭṭia’ khaṭhaesu ṭhiadaṃtamaṃḍale ūrū | ‘caṭuāraaṃ mā duputti’ ka, ‘caṭuāraaṃ māi putti’ kha, ‘païṃ’ iti nāstveva ka khacaḍuāraaṃ païṃ mā hu putti ‘jaṇahāsaaṃ’ ka jaṇahāsiaṃ kuṇasu || 299 ||’ [pavanodvellitavastrāñcale sthagaya sthitadaṇḍamaṇḍale ūrū | caṭukārakaṃ patiṃ mā khalu putri janahasitaṃ kuru ||] pravāsānantare dantakṣatādayo yathā— ‘daṃtakkhaaṃ kavole kaaggahuvvelio a dhammillo | ‘paḍighummirā’ ka, ‘paḍighummirā a’ khaparighummirā a diṭṭhī piāgamaṃ sāhaï vahūe || 220 ||’ [dantakṣataṃ kapole kacagrahodvellitaśca dhammillaḥ | parighūrṇanaśīlā ca dṛṣṭiḥ priyāgamaṃ sādhayati vadhvāḥ ||] ‘prathamānurāgānantaraṃ’ kaprathamānurāgānantare nakhakṣataṃ yathā— ‘ajjāi ‘ṇabaṇahakkhaṇivikkhaṇe’ kha, ‘ṇavaṇahakkhaaṇivirakkhaṇe’ khaṇavaṇahakkhaaṇirikkhaṇe garuajovvaṇuttuṃgam | paḍimāgaaṇiaṇaaṇuppalacciaṃ‘ṇaaṇupparūṃ’ ka kha hoi thaṇavaṭṭham || 221 ||’ [āryāyā navanakhakṣatanirīkṣaṇe gurukayauvanottuṅgam | pratimāgatanijanayanotpalārcitaṃ bhavati stanapṛṣṭham ||] atraiva puruṣāyitaṃ yathā— ‘daravevirorujualāsu maüliacchīsu luliaciurāsu‘cihurāsu’ mudritagāthāsapta॰ ka | ‘purisāirīsu’ iti gāthāsapta॰purisāiasīrisu kāmo piāsu sajjāuho vasaï || 222 ||’ [īṣadvepanaśīloruyugalāsu mukulitākṣīṣu lulitacikurāsu | puruṣāyitaśīlāsu kāmaḥ priyāsu sajjāyudho vasati ||] sarvaṃ sarvatra yathā— ‘poḍhamahilāṇaṃ jaṃ suṭṭhu sikkhiaṃ taṃ rae suhāvei‘khae suhāvedi’ ka, ‘raïe suhāvedi’ kha | ‘jaṃ jeṇa’ khajaṃ jaṃ asikkhiaṃ ṇavavahūṇaṃ taṃ taṃ ‘raïṃ’ ka khadhiiṃ deṭṭha || 223 ||’ [prauḍhamahilānāṃ yatsuṣṭhu śikṣitaṃ tadrate sukhayati | yadyadaśikṣitaṃ navavadhūnāṃ tattaddhṛtiṃ dadāti ||] vipralambhaparīṣṭiṣvabhiyogataḥ premaparīkṣā yathā— ‘haṃho kaṇṇullīṇā bhaṇāmi re suhaa kiṃ pi mā jūra‘mā jhūra’ ka, ‘bhāsura’ kha | ṇijjaṇapāraddhīsu‘pāraddhīsu’ kha, ‘pāṇaddhī racchāe’ iti deśīnāmamālā tue kahiṃ‘kahaṃ pi’ kha vi puṇṇehiṃ laddhosi || 224 ||’ [haṃho karṇollīnā bhaṇāmi re subhaga kimapi mā khidyasva | nirjanarathyāsu tvaṃ kathamapi puṇyairlabdho 'si ||] pratyabhiyogato yathā— ‘golāvisamoāracchaleṇa appā urammi se mukko | aṇuaṃpāṇiddosaṃ teṇa vi sā ‘āḍhamuvaụ̄dhā’ iti gāthāsapta॰gāḍhamuvaụ̄dhā || 225 ||’ [godāvarīviṣamāvatāracchalenātmā urasi tasya muktaḥ | anukampānirdoṣaṃ tenāpi sā gāḍhamupagụ̄dhā ||] viṣahaṇena yathā— ‘ajja vi seaṃjalollaṃ pavvāi ṇa tīa haliasoṇhāe | phaggucchaṇa‘cikkhallo kaddamae’ iti deśīnāmamālācikkhi(kkha)llaṃ jaṃ taï diṇṇaṃ thaṇucchaṅge 226’ [adyāpi svedajalārdritaḥ pramlāyate na tasyā hālikasnuṣāyāḥ | phalgūtsavakardamo yastasyā dattāḥ stanotsaṅge ||] vimarśena yathā— ‘tatto ccia ṇenti‘honti’ iti gāthāsaptaśatyāṃ ‘bhavanti’ iti tacchāyā ca kahā ‘kiasaṃti’ ka, ‘kiāsaṃti’ khaviasaṃti tarhi ‘samatthanti’ ka, ‘samatthanti’ khasamappanti | kiṃ maṇṇe māucchā ekkajuāṇo imo gāmo || 227 ||’ [tata eva niryānti kathā vikasanti tatra tatra samāpyante | kiṃ manye mātṛṣvasaḥ ekayuvako 'yaṃ grāmaḥ ||] bahumānena yathā— ‘teṇa ira ṇavalaāe diṇṇo paharo imīa thaṇavaṭṭhe | gāmataruṇīhiṃ ajja vi diahaṃ parivāliā bhamaï || 228 ||’ [tena kila dolāvilāse daktaḥ prahāra etasyāḥ stanapṛṣṭhe | grāmataruṇībhiradyāpi divasaṃ pratipālitā bhramati ||] ślāghayā yathā— ‘sā taï sahatthadiṇṇaṃ phaggucchaṇakaddamaṃ thaṇucchaṃge | parikuviā iva‘via’ gha sāhaï ‘salāharī’ ghasalāhirī gāmataruṇīṇam || 229 ||’ [sā tvayā svahastadattaṃ phalgūtsavakardamaṃ stanotsaṅge | parikupiteva sādhayati ślāghanaśīlā grāmataruṇīnām ||] iṅgitena yathā— ‘jaï so ṇa ‘vallaho vvia gottaggahaṇeṇa’ gāthāsapta॰vallaha ccia ṇāmaggahaṇena tassa sahi kīsa | hoi muhaṃ te raviaraphaṃsavisaṭṭaṃ‘phaṃsavvisadaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘phaṃsavisaddaṃ’ gha va tāmarasam || 230 ||’ [yadi sa na vallabha eva nāmagrahaṇena tasya sakhi kimiti | bhavati mukhaṃ te ravikarasparśavikasitamiva tāmarasam ||] dūtasaṃpreṣaṇena yathā— ‘seulliasavvaṃgī ‘gottaggahaṇena’ gāthāsapta॰ṇāmaggahaṇena tassa suhaassa | ‘hūraṃ’ (?) ka dūtamiti bhavetdūiṃ ‘paṭṭhāentī’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘prasthāpayantī (saṃdiśantī vā)’ iti cchāyā ca |‘saṃdiṭṭhaṃ appāhiyam’ iti dhanapālasya ‘pāiyalacchī’ iti nāmamālāappāheṃtī tasse a gharaṃgaṇaṃ pattā || 231 ||’ [svedārdrīkṛtasarvāṅgī nāmagrahaṇena tasya subhagasya | dūtīṃ saṃdiśantī tasyaiva gṛhāṅgaṇaṃ prāptā ||] ‘dūtapraśnena’ ka khadūtapreśne yathā— ‘kaha ṇu gaā kaha diṭṭhā‘diṭṭhī’ ka kiṃ bhaṇiā kiṃ ca teṇa paḍivaṇṇaṃ‘paḍivaaṇaṃ’ ka kha | eaṃ cia ṇa samappaï punaruttaṃ ‘jaṃpa‍māṇāe’ ghajaṃpamāṇīe || 232 ||’ [kathaṃ nu gatā kathaṃ dṛṣṭā kiṃ bhaṇitā kiṃ ca tena pratipannam | evameva na samāpyate punaruktaṃ jalpamānāyāḥ ||] lekhavidhānena yathā— ‘‘vevirisiṇṇa’ ka, ‘vevirisisma’ khavevirasiṇṇakaraṅguli‘pariggahakkhaliha’ gha, ‘pariggahakkhasia’ iti mudritagāthāsapta॰pariggahakkhalialehaṇīmagge | sotthi ccia‘vvia’ gāthāsapta॰ ṇa samappaï piasahi lehammi kiṃ lihino || 233 ||’ [vepanaśīlasviṃnnakarāṅguliparigrahaskhalitalekhanīmārge | svastyeva na samāpyate priyasakhi lekhe kiṃ likhāmaḥ ||] lekhavācanena yathā— ‘prītyā svastipadaṃ vilokitavatī sthānaṃ stutaṃ‘śrutaṃ’ kha tuṣṭayā paścājjñātamanukrameṇa puratastattāvakaṃ nāmakam | tanvyā saṃmadanirbhareṇa manasā tadvācayantyā muhurna prāpto ghanabāṣpapūritadṛśā lekhe 'pi kaṇṭhagrahaḥ || 234 ||’ saṃbhogaparīṣṭiṣu prathamānurāgānantare sādhvasena puṃso yathā— ‘līlāio ṇiasaṇe rakkhiu taṃ rāhiāi thaṇavaṭṭhe | hariṇo paḍhamasamāgamasajjhasavasarehiṃ‘sajjhasavarehiṃ’ ka veviro hattho || 235 ||’ [līlāyito nivasane rakṣatu tvāṃ rādhikāyāḥ stanapṛṣṭhe | hariṇaḥ prathamasamāgamasādhvasaprasarairvepanaśīlo hastaḥ ||] atraiva dohadena mugdhāyā yathā— ‘kiṃ kiṃ de paḍihāsaï sahīhiṁ ia pucchiāi‘pucchiāeṁ muddhāe’ gāthāsapta॰ ka kha muddhāiṁ | paḍhamullaadohaliṇīa‘paḍhamuggaadohaṇīe’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘yaḍhamulluahalidoṇīe’ ka, ‘paḍhamullaadohaliṇīe’ kha ‘ṇavaraṃ’ gāthāsapta॰ṇavari daïaṃ gaā diṭṭhī || 236 ||’ [kiṃ kiṃ te pratibhāsate sakhībhiriti pṛṣṭāyā mugdhāyāḥ | prathamodgatadohadinyāḥ kevalaṃ dayitaṃ gatā dṛṣṭiḥ ||] atraiva pragalbhāyāḥ priyavākyavarṇanena‘priyavākyavarṇanaṃ yathā’ ka kha yathā— ‘huṃhuṃ ‘de bhaṇasu’ ka khahe bhaṇasu puṇo ṇa suaṃti karei kālavikkheaṃ | ghariṇī hiaamuhāiṃ païṇo kaṇṇe bhaṇaṃtassa || 237 ||’ [huṃhuṃ he bhaṇa punarna svapanti karoti kālavikṣepam | gṛhiṇī hṛdayasukhāni patyuḥ karṇe bhaṇataḥ ||] mānānantare striyāḥ ‘kaitavasvapne yathā—’ ka khakaitavasmaraṇena yathā— ‘bharimo se saaṇaparammuhīa vialaṃtamāṇapasarāe | ‘kaïavasuttuvvattaṇathaṇakalasa’ gātāsapta॰, ‘kaïavasuttuvvattaṇathaṇahara’ ka, ‘kaïavasuttuvvattaṇatthānahara’ khakeavasuttuvvattaṇathaṇaharapellaṇasuhellim || 238 ||’ [smarāmastasyāḥ śayanaparāmukhyā vigalanmānaprasarāyāḥ | kaitavasuptodvartanastanabharapreraṇasukhakelim ||] striyā eva sakhīvākyasyokṣepeṇa yathā— ‘bhiuḍīa‘bhiuḍīrhi’ ka kha puloissaṃ ṇivbhacchissaṃ‘ṇimbhacchissaṃ’ ka parammuhī hossam | jaṃ bhaṇaha taṃ karissaṃ sahio jaï taṃ ṇa pecchissam 239’ [bhrakuṭyā pralokayiṣye nirbhartsye parāṅmakhībhaviṣyāmi | yadbhaṇata tatkariṣye sakhyo yadi taṃ na prekṣiṣye ||] tasyā eva tadanuṣṭhānavighnena yathā— ‘granthimudgrathayituṃ hṛdayeśe vāsasaḥ spṛśati mānadhanāyāḥ | bhrūyugena sapadi pratipede romabhiśca samameva vibhedaḥ || 240 ||’ ‘pravāsānantare’ ka khapravāsānantaraṃ striyā yathā— ‘‘atthakkā’ ka kha acchakkāgaahiae bahuā ‘daïaṭhammi jaṇapurao’ ka kha daïammi gurupurao | ‘ūraï’ ka khajūraï vialaṃtāṇaṃ harisavisaṭṭāṇa‘visaṭṭhāṇa’ kha valaāṇam || 241 ||’ [akasmādāgatahṛdaye vadhūkā dayite gurupurataḥ | krudhyati vigalabhdyo harṣavikasabhdyo valayebhyaḥ||] atraiva strīpuṃsayoryathā— ‘ramiūṇa ‘paaṃ pi gao’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘padamapi gataḥ’ iti cchāyā, ‘païmmi gae’ ka kha gapaammi gae (o)jāhe avaūhiuṃ paḍinivṛtto‘paḍiniutto’ ka kha, gāthāsapta॰ | ahaaṃ ‘paütthapaïā vva’ iti gāthāsapta॰paütthapaïavva takkhaṇaṃ so pavāsivva || 242 ||’ [ratvā padamapi gato yadopagūhituṃ pratinivṛttaḥ | ahaṃ proṣitapatikeva tatkṣaṇaṃ sa pravāsīva ||] sāmānyata eva pravāsasādhvasena striyā yathā— ‘hoṃtapahiassa jāā āpṛcchanaṃ gamanapraśna priye yāmyahamityevaṃrūpaḥ | ‘jīva’ ka khaāucchaṇajīaadhāraṇarahassam | pucchantīṃ bhamaï gharaṃ ghareṇa piavirahasahirīo‘sihirio’ ka, ‘sihiriā’ kha || 243 ||’ bhaviṣyatpathikasya jāyā āpṛcchanajīvadhāraṇarahasyam | pṛcchantī bhramati gṛhaṃ gṛheṇa priyavirahasahanaśīlāḥ ||] ‘pravāsavilambenaiva’ ka khapravāsavilambena puṃso yathā— ‘ekko vi kālasāro ṇa dei gaṃtuṃ paāhiṇa valanto‘vasanto’ kha | kiṃ uṇa bāhāuliaṃ loaṇajualaṃ miacchīe‘piaamāe’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘maacchīe’ ka kha ga gha || 244 ||’ [eko 'pi kṛṣṇasāro na dadāti gantu pradakṣiṇaṃ valan | kiṃ punarbāṣpākulitaṃ locanayugalaṃ mṛgākṣyāḥ ||] parihāre svedādibhiḥ striyā yathā— ‘ullāaï se aṃgaṃ ūrū vevanti ‘kūbalaṃ jaghaṇavasaṇe’ iti deśīnāmamālākūvalo galaï | ‘chuchu ele’ ka, ‘chucchurā(e)le’ khaucchucchulei hiaaṃ piāame pupphavaïāi‘puphuiāe’ ka, ‘pupphaïāie kha || 245 ||’ [ārdrībhavatyasyā aṅgamūrū vepete jaghanavasanaṃ galati | utkampate hṛdayaṃ priyāgame puṣpavatyāḥ ||] karuṇānantaraṃ puṃso yathā— ‘‘karasparśārambhotpulakita’ ka khakarasparśārambhātpulakitapṛthūrojakalaśe śramāmbho vāmārdhe vahati madanākūtasubhagam | vibhorvāraṃvāraṃ kṛta‘samayikoddhūnanavidheḥ’ ka khasamadhikoddhūlanavidhe- stanau bhasmasnānaṃ kathamapi samāptaṃ vijayate || 246 ||’ vipralambhaniruktiṣu prathamānurāge pratiśrutyādānaṃ yathā— ‘‘kiṃ ṇa bhaṇiosi’ gāthāsapta॰, ka khakiṃ bhaṇiosi ṇa vālaa gāmaṇidhūāi‘gāmaṇidhūāi’ ka kha guruaṇasamakkham | ‘aṇimisamīsīsivalantavaaṇa’ gāthāsapta॰ ‘animiṣamīṣadīṣadvaladvadana’ cchāyā caaṇimisavaṃkavalaṃtaaāṇaṇa‘vaaṇa’ ka khaṇaaṇaddhadiṭṭhehiṃ || 247 ||’ [kiṃ bhaṇito 'si na bālaka grāmaṇīduhitrā gurujanasamakṣam | animiṣavakravaladānananayanārdhadṛṣṭaiḥ ||] atra ‘vakrekṣitādibhiḥ’ ga gha, ‘vaktekṣitādibhiḥ’ khavakrekṣitādibhiḥ pratiśrutyāliṅganādayo hrībhayādibhirna dīyante || māne visaṃvādanaṃ yathā— ‘aṇṇua ṇāhaṃ kuviā uvaūhasu‘uvahūasu’ ka kha, ‘uvahuhasu’ ga kiṃ muhā pasāemi | tuha maṇṇusamuppaṇṇeṇa majjha māṇeṇa‘māṇeṇāvi’ ga viṇa kajjam || 248 ||’ [ajña nāhaṃ kupitā upagūhasva kiṃ mudhā prasādayāmi | tava manyusamutpannena mama mānenāpi na kāryam ||] atra māninī pūrvamāliṅganādīnniṣidhya paścādayathāvatprayacchati yathā kaścidaṣṭau ‘aṣṭaśatam’ ka khaśatāni pradāsyāmīti pratiśrutyāṣṭabhira‘aṣṭābhiḥ’ ka khadhikaṃ śataṃ praya-cchati na tvaṣṭau śatānīti | tadetavdyalīka‘viprayogādibhiḥ’ ka khavipriyādibhirāliṅganādīnāṃ nirākaraṇamayathāvatpradānatvādvisaṃvādanamevocyate || pravāse kālaharaṇaṃ yathā— ‘‘ehaï’ gāthāsapta॰ehii so vi‘vi’ ka kha paüttho ‘ahaṃ a’ gāthāsapta॰ |‘ahaṃ ca’ iti cchāyā caahaaṃ kuppejja so vi‘vi’ ka kha nāsti aṇuṇejja | ‘iaphalaï kassa vi’ ka kha ia kassa vi phalaï ‘maṇorahāṇa’ ka kha ga, ‘manorahāṇa’ ghamaṇorahāṇaṁ mālā piaamammi || 249 ||’ [eṣyati so 'pi proṣito 'haṃ kupiṣyāmi so 'pyanuneṣyati | iti kasyāpi phalati manorathānāṃ mālā priyatame ||] atrāliṅganādīnāṃ vyaktaiva kālaharaṇapratītiḥ || karuṇe pratyādānaṃ yathā— ‘‘samavaṭhṭhiāṇa’ ka, ‘samavaṭṭiāṇa’ kha ga, ‘samavạdḥdhiāṇa’ ghasamasokkhadukkhaparivaḍ̣dhiāṇaṁ kāleṇa rūḍhapemmāṇaṃ‘rūḍhapemmāṇa’ ka gha | ‘bhihuṇāṇa’ ghamihuṇāṇaṁ maraï jaṃ taṃ khu jiaï iaraṃ muaṃ hoi || 250 ||’ [samasaukhyaduḥkhaparivardhitayoḥ kālena rūḍhapremṇoḥ | mithunayormriyate yattatkhalu jīvatītaranmṛtaṃ bhavati ||] atra— ‘suhṛdiva prakaṭayya sukhapradaḥ prathamamekarasāmanukūlatām | punarakāṇḍavivartanadāruṇaḥ Dr. R. G. Bhandarkar saṃpādite mālatīmādhave ‘vidhiraho viśinaṣṭi manorujam’ ityapi pāṭhaḥpraviśinaṣṭi vidhirmanaso rujam 251’ ityayamarthaḥ saṃbadhyate | tasya ca pratyādānamevārtho bhavati || prathamānurāge ‘vañcanaṃ’ kavañcanamātraṃ vividhaṃ yathā— ‘diṭṭhāi‘diṭhṭhāe’ ka kha jaṃ ṇa diṭṭho‘diṭhṭhā’ kha ālaviāe vi jaṃ ṇa ālatto | uvaāro jaṃ ṇa kao taṃ cia‘via’ ga kaliaṃ chaïllehiṃ || 252 ||’ [dṛṣṭayā yanna dṛṣṭa ālapitayā yannālāpitaḥ | upakāro yanna kṛtastadeva kalitaṃ vidagdhaiḥ ||] atra vrīḍādibhi‘darśanādibhiḥ’ ka kha nāstiradarśanādibhirvañca‘vañcanābhiḥ’ kha nāstinādibhirvaividhyaṃ pratīyate || māne viruddhaṃ yathā— ‘ṇa muaṃti ‘dīhasāsaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰dīhasāse ṇa ruaṃti ‘ciraṃ ṇa honti kisiāo’ iti gāthāsapta॰ṇa honti virahakisiā o | dhaṇṇāŏ tāŏ jāṇaṃ bahuvallaha vallaho ṇa tumam || 253 ||’ [na muñcanti dīrghaśvāsān na rudanti na bhavanti virahakṛśāḥ | dhanyāstā yāsāṃ bahuvallabha vallabho na tvam ||] atrerṣyāyitādibhirvallabhāliṅganādiviruddhairmānavatī vañcyate || pravāse vyāviddhaṃ yathā— ‘kaïā gao pio ajja putti ajjeṇa kaï diṇā hoṃti | ekko eddahamette ‘eddahametto’ ka kha, ‘eddahamatte’ ghabhaṇie mohaṃ gaā kuṃvarī‘bālā’ ka kha || 254 ||’ [kadā gataḥ priyo 'dya putri adyeti kati dināni bhavanti | eka etāvanmātre bhaṇite mohaṃ gatā kumārī ||] atraikasyāpi divasasya ‘varṣāyamānatayā’ ka khavarṣāyamāṇatayā ‘priyāliṅganādivañcanayā’ ityadhikaṃ ka khaviśeṣato dairghyaṃ pratīyate || karuṇe niṣiddhaṃ yathā— ‘āvāabhaaaraṃ cia‘via’ kha ṇa hoi dukkhassa dāruṇaṃ ‘avasāṇaṃ’ ka khaṇivvahaṇam | ṇāha jiantīa mae diṭṭhaṃ sahiaṃ a tuha imaṃ avasāṇam ||’ [āpātabhayaṃkarameva na bhavati duḥkhasya dāruṇaṃ nirvahaṇam | nātha jīvantyā mayā dṛṣṭaṃ soḍhaṃ ca tavedamavasānam ||] tadetadrāmaviṣaye sītāyāścirāśaṃsitasamāgamasukhāvāptivyapāyarūpaṃ vacanaṃ karuṇe niṣidhyate || prathamānurāgeṇa saha rāgo yathā— ‘sā mahaï tassa ṇhāuṃ aṇusotte sovi se samuvvahaï | thaṇavaṭṭabhiḍaṇaviluliakallolamahagghie salile || 256 ||’ [sā vāñchati tasya snātumanusrotasi so 'pyasyāḥ samudvahati | stanapṛṣṭamilanavilulitakallolamahārghite salile ||] atra dvayorapyekakālamanyo 'nyānurāgaḥ pratīyate tatraikā lāvaṇyādinā rajyate 'nyaḥ snehādineti || tatraiva paścādyathā— ‘māmi hiaaṃ va pīaṃ teṇa juāṇeṇa majjamāṇāe‘majjamāṇīe’ ka kha | ṇhāṇahaliddā‘haladdā’ ka khakaḍuaṃ aṇusottajalaṃ piaṃteṇa || 257 ||’ [mātulāni hṛdayameva pītaṃ tena yūnā majjamānāyāḥ | snānaharidrākaṭukamanusrotojalaṃ pibatā ||] atraikasyānurāgaṃ dṛṣṭa‍vā paścāddvitīyo rajyate || tatraivānurūpo‘anurūpaṃ’ ka kha yathā— ‘saccaṃ jāṇaï daṭa‍ṭhuṃ sarisammi jaṇammi jujjae rāo | maraü ṇa tumaṃ bhaṇisyaṃ maraṇaṃ vi‘maraṇaṃ vi’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘maraṇamapi’ gha salāhaṇijjaṃ se || 258 ||’ [satyaṃ jānāti draṣṭuṃ sadṛśe jane yujyate rāgaḥ | mriyatāṃ na tvāṃ bhaṇiṣyāmi maraṇamapi ślāghanīyamasyāḥ ||] atra na kevalaṃ lāvaṇyādinaiva rajyate kiṃ tarhyanurūpaviṣayiṇābhilāṣeṇāpīti pratīyate || tatraivānugato yathā— ‘gahavaïsueṇa samaaṃ saccaṃ aliaṃ va kiṃ viāreṇa‘viarei’ ka kha | dhaṇṇāi haliakumāriāi‘umāriāi’ ka jaṇammi jaṇavāo‘jaṇavāde’ gha || 259 ||’ [gṛhapatisutena samakaṃ satyamalīkaṃ vā kiṃ vicāreṇa | dhanyāyā hālikakumārikāyā jane janavādaḥ ||] atra yadyapi saubhāgyādiprasiddhikṛtasārūpyaṃ‘ānurūpyaṃ’ ka kha na vidyate tathāpi striyā uttamaprārthanamagarhitatvādanugatameva bhavati | so 'yaṃ ‘karaṇasādhāraṇasādhanotpatti’ ka, ‘karuṇasādhāraṇa’ khakaraṇasādhanotpattipakṣe uktaḥ | bhāvasādhanapakṣe tu sahārthādiviśiṣṭā ratirdīptirvānurāgaśabdenocyate | ‘sarvatra’ ityadhikaṃ ka khaprathamaṃ copajāyamānatvādayaṃ prathamānurāga iti ‘prathate’ ityasya sthāne ‘prathamato’ ityagre ‘saṃbaddhamāste’ ka khaprathate || māne ‘prathamato māne’ ka, ‘prathamato mānaḥ mānyate’ khamānyate yeneti yathā— ‘pāapaḍaṇāṇaṁ muddhe rahasavalāmoḍia'balāmoḍicumbiavvāṇaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘balātkāracumbitavyānām’ iti cchāyā ca, ‘avvāṇa’ khacciavvāṇam | daṃsaṇametta‘pasaṇṇe’ iti gāthāsapta॰pasijjiri cukkā ‘suhāṇaṃ bahuāṇam’ gāthāsapta॰bahuāṇa sokkhāṇaṁ || 260 ||’ [pādapatanānāṃ mugdhe rabhasabalātkṛtārcitavyānām | darśanamātraprasādanaśīle bhraṣṭā bahūnāṃ saukhyānām ||] atra 'māna pūjāyām’ iti dhātoḥ ‘svārthe’ ka khasvārthikaṇijantāṇṇici ghañi ca māna iti rūpam | ‘sa mānaḥ’ ghasa hi preyāṃsamasyāḥ pādapatanādipūjāyāṃ prayojayati || yaṃ priyatvena manyate yathā— ‘kāraṇagahio vi mae māṇo emea jaṃ samosario | atthakkapphulla‘phulli’ ka kha gaaṃkolla tujjha taṃ matthae paḍaü || 261 ||’ [kāraṇagṛhīto 'pi mayā māna evameva yatsamupasṛtaḥ | akasmātphullitāṅkolla tava tanmastake patatu ||] atra ‘mana jñāne’ iti dhātuḥ | tathā hi mānaṃ priyatvena manyamānā tadapahāriṇe 'ṅkollāya kāpi māninī ‘kāminī’ khakupyati || yaḥ prema manute yathā— ‘jattha ṇa ujjāgarao jattha ṇa īsāvisūraṇaṃ māṇam | ‘sambā va cāhuaṃ’ ka, ‘sambāva bāhuaṃ’ khasabbhāvacāṭuaṃ jattha ṇatthi ṇeho tahiṃ ṇatthi || 262 ||’ [yatra nāstyujjāgarako yatra nerṣyākhedī mānaḥ | sadbhāvacāṭukaṃ yatra nāsti snehastatra nāsti ||] atra 'manu avabodhane’ iti dhātuḥ | mānena hi janaḥ premāsti nāsti veti budhyate‘jano budhyate’ ka kha | tasya ca karaṇabhūtasyāpi prādhānyādatra kartṛtvopacāraḥ | tadyathā 'prajñā paśyati no cakṣurdṛṣṭiḥ sārasvatī hi sā |’ iti || prema mimīte yathā— ‘‘ūviā’ kakuviā a saccahāmā‘saccahāsā’ ka same vi bahuāṇa ṇavara māṇakkhalaṇe | pāaḍiahiaasāro pemmāsaṃghasariso paaṭṭaï maṇṇū || 263 ||’ [kupitā ca satyabhāmā same 'pi bandhūnāṃ kevalaṃ mānaskhalane | prakaṭitahṛdayasāraḥ premāśvāsasadṛśaḥ pravartate manyuḥ ||] atra ‘māṅ māne’ iti dhātoḥ ‘kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam 3|3|113’ iti kartari lyuṭ | ‘ko 'sāvanumāna’ iti bhāṣyaprayogāt | tena ca yadyapi karaṇabhūtenaivātmani rukmiṇyāṃ ca priyapremṇaḥ parimāṇaṃ satyabhāmā pratyāyayati tathāpi pūrvavadihāpyayaṃ ‘pūrvavatkartṛtvenopayujyate’ khapūrvavatkartṛtvenopacaryate || pravāse vasata ityupalakṣaṇenātmānamaṅganā na bhūṣayanti‘nātmānamaṅganā bhūṣayanti’ kha yathā— ‘sāhīṇe vi piaame patte vi khaṇe ṇa maṇḍio appā | ‘duggaapaütthavaïaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘durgataproṣitapatikāṃ’ iti cchāyā cadukkhiapaütthavaïaṃ saajjiaṃ‘saajjhiaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰ saṃṭhavaṃtīe || 264 ||’ [svādhīne 'pi priyatame prāpte 'pi kṣaṇe na maṇḍita ātmā | duḥkhitaproṣitapatikāṃ prativeśinīṃ saṃsthāpayantyā ||] atra ‘vasa ācchādane’ ityasya 'prasmarati’ ityādivanniṣedhārthakaprapūrvasya ‘ghañi ca’ ka kha ghañi ‘pravāsa’ kha nāstipravāsa iti rūpaṃ nirūpyate || yuvānaḥ priyāsaṃnidhau na vasanti yathā— ‘virahāṇalo sahijjaï āsābaṃdheṇa vallahajaṇassa‘dullahajaṇasya’ ka kha | ekkaggāmapavāso māe maraṇaṃ visesei || 265 ||’ [virahānalaḥ sahyata āśābandhena vallabhajanasya | ekagrāmapravāso mātarmaraṇaṃ viśeṣayati ||] atra dūrasthayorivāntikasthayorapi saṃnikarṣābhāvātpravāso bhavati || utkaṇṭhādibhiśceto vāsayati yathā— ‘āloaṃta‘āloanti’ ka kha disāo sasaṃta jaṃbhaṃta‘jammanta’ (?) gāthāsapta॰ gaṃta roanta | ‘mucchanta’ gāthāsapta॰mujjhaṃta ‘paḍanta khalanta’ ghapaḍaṃta hasaṃta pahia kiṃ te paüttheṇa || 266 ||’ [ālokayan diśaḥ śvasan jṛmbhamāṇo gāyan rudan | muhyan patan hasan pathika kiṃ tena proṣitena ||] atrotkaṇṭhādibhirvāsite‘utkaṇṭhādinirvāsite’ ka cetasi śūnyāvalokanādayo 'nubhāvā jāyante || pramāpayati yathā— ‘saṃjīvaṇosahimmiva‘saṃjīvaṇosahammiva’ gāthāsapta॰ suassa‘piassa’ ka kha rakkhaï aṇaṇṇavāvārā | sāsū ṇavambhadaṃsaṇakaṃṭhāgaajīviaṃ soṇham || 267 ||’ [saṃjīvanauṣadhimiva sutasya rakṣatyananyavyāpārā | śvaśrūrnavābhradarśanakaṇṭhāgatajīvitāṃ snuṣām ||] atra prasādaṃ karotītyādivatpramāpaṇopakramo 'pi pramāpaṇamucyate || karuṇe ‘karoteranubhūtopādānārthatve’ ka kha, ‘karoterabhūtotpādanārthatve’ ghakaroterbhūtopādanārthatve kurute mūrcchāṃ yathā— ‘‘visaria vioadukkhaṃ’ setubandhe pāṭhaḥ, ‘vismṛtaviyogaduḥkhaṃ’ iti cchāyā cavialiavioaviaṇaṃ takkhaṇa‘piṭhabhaṭhṭha’ setubandhaṃ, ‘pambaṭhṭha’ ka, ‘pamhavva’ gapabbhaṭṭharāmamaraṇāāsam | jaṇaataṇaāi ṇavaraṃ laddhaṃ mucchāṇimīliacchīa suhaṃ 268’ [vigalitaviyogavedanaṃ tatkṣaṇaprabhraṣṭarāmamaraṇāyāsam | janakatanayayā kevalaṃ labdhaṃ mūrcchānimīlitākṣyā sukham ||] atra sītāyāḥ patiśokaprakarṣeṇābhūtā‘prakarṣeṇa bhūtā’ ka mūrcchotpadyate || uccāraṇārthatve kurute vilāpaṃ yathā— ‘puhavīa ‘hoihi’ ka kha ga, ‘hohii’ setubandhe, ‘hoi’ ghahohii paī bahupurisavisesacaṃcalā rāasirī | kaha tā mahaccia‘mahaṃ cia’ setubandhe imaṃ ṇīsāmaṇṇaṃ ‘uatthiaṃ’ setubandhe, ‘uaṭṭhiaṃ’ gauvaṭhṭhiaṃ vehavvam || 269 ||’ [pṛthivyā bhaviṣyati patirbahupurūṣaviśeṣacañcalā rājyalakṣmīḥ | kathaṃ tanmamaivedaṃ niḥsāmānyamupasthitaṃ vaidhavyam ||] ‘atra pravāsaduḥkhena’ ka khaatra rāmaduḥkhena vilapantī ‘sītā vilapantī’ ka kha, ‘sītā’ ga nāstisītedamuccarati || ‘avasthāpanārthatve’ ka kha gaavasthāpanārthe kurute sāhase mano yathā— ‘‘ahametya’ mudritakumārasaṃbhaveiyametya pataṅgavartmanā punaraṅkāśrayiṇī bhavāmi te | caturaiḥ surakāminījanaiḥ priya yāvanna ‘vilobhyase’ mudritakumārasaṃbhave, khavilupyase divi || 270 ||’ atra rateḥ kāmaśokena maraṇasāhase mano 'vasthāpyate || abhyañjanārthatve karoti cittaṃ duḥkhena yathā— ‘dalati hṛdayaṃ gạ̄dhodvegaṃ dvidhā‘śokodvegād’ mudrita uttararāmacarite tu na bhidyate‘na tu bhidyate’ ka kha vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mohaṃ na muñcati cetanām | jvalayati tanūmantardāhaḥ karoti na bhasmasāt praharati vidhirmarmacchedī na kṛntati jīvitam || 271 ||’ atra ‘vāmādeḥ’ ga gharāmāderduḥkhena cittamabhyajyate || saṃbhoganiruktiṣu prathamānurāgānantare pālanārtho‘pālanārthe’ gha yathā— ‘dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭimadho dadāti kurute nālāpamābhāṣitā śayyāyāṃ parivṛtya tiṣṭhati balādāliṅgitā vepate | niryāntīṣu sakhīṣu vāsabhavanānnirgantumevehate bālā vāmatayaiva ‘me 'dya sutarāṃ’ iti mudrite nāgānandapustakesaṃprati mama prītyai navọdhā priyā || 272 ||’ atrāprāgalbhyavāmatābhyāmanukūlāyāmapi navọdhāyāmicchānuvṛttyā ratiḥ pālyate || mānānantare kauṭilyārtho yathā— ‘pāde mūrdhani tāmratāmupagate karṇotpale cūrṇite chinne hāralatāguṇe karatale saṃpātajātavraṇe | aprāptapriyatāḍanavyatikarā hantuṃ punaḥ kopitā vāñchantī muhureṇaśāvanayanā paryākulā‘paryākulaṃ’ ka kha roditi || 273 ||’ atra premṇaḥ svabhāvakuṭilatvānmānavatyāḥ kacagrahaṇena yatpādatāḍanādirūpāḥ kuṭilā‘kuṭilā eva jāyante’ ka, ‘kuṭilā eva saṃbhogā jāyante’ kha eva saṃbhogā jāyante || pravāsānantare 'bhyavahārārtho yathā— ‘vasiṣṭhadhenoranuyāyinaṃ tamāvartamānaṃ vanitā vanāntāt | papau nimeṣālasapakṣmapaṅktirupoṣitābhyāmiva locanābhyām || 274 ||’ atra ‘uttarārdhe’ ka khauttarārdhenopoṣitasyānnopayoga iva priyālokajanmā pibaterabhyavahāraḥ ‘abhyavahārārthaḥ’ khakathyate || karuṇānantare 'nubhavārtho yathā— ‘aṇumaraṇapatthiāe paccāgaajīvie‘jīemmi’ ka , ‘jīviemmi’ kha piaamammi | vehavvamaṃḍaṇaṃ kulavahūa sohaggaaṃ jāam || 275 ||’ [anumaraṇaprasthitāyāḥ pratyāgatajīvite priyatame | vaidhavyamaṇḍanaṃ kulavadhvāḥ saubhāgyakaṃ jātam ||] atra yatheyaṃ matprāṇabhūtaivamasyā ahamapi jīvitameveti patyā visrambhajo 'nurāgaḥ‘rāga ’ ka kha patnyāḥ punaḥ pretyāpi yatsaṃgamo mayābhilaṣitaḥ so 'yaṃ jīvantyaiva jīviteśvaraḥ samāsādita iti visrambhādatisukhamevānubhūyate || atra prathamānurāgānantare saṃbhogaḥ saṃkṣipto yathā— ‘apetavyāhāraṃ ‘cyutavividha’ ka khadhutavividhaśilpavyatikaraṃ ‘karasparśārambhe’ kakarasparśārambhapragalitadukūlāntaśayanam | muhurbaddhotkampaṃ diśi diśi muhuḥ preritadṛśo- rahalyāsutrāmṇoḥ kṣaṇikamiha tatsaṃgatamabhūt || 276 ||’ atra saṃkṣepo nigadenaiva vyākhyāyate || sa eva mānānantare saṃkīrṇo yathā— ‘aṇuṇiakhaṇaladdhasuhe puṇo vi saṃbhariamaṇṇudūmiavihale‘vihalo’ ka | hiae māṇavaīṇaṃ cireṇa ‘paaṇagaruo’ khapaṇaagaruo pasammaī roso 277’ [anunītakṣaṇalabdhasukhe punarapi saṃsmṛtamanyudūnitavihvale | hṛdaye mānavatīnāṃ cireṇa praṇayagurukaḥ praśāmyati roṣaḥ ||] atrāvasthitā prakṛṣṭā ca ratirvyalīkasmaraṇādibhiḥ saṃkīryate || pravāsānantare saṃpūrṇo‘saṃpūrṇā’ ka kha yathā— ‘śāpānto me bhujagaśayanādutthite śārṅgapāṇau māsānetāngamaya‘śeṣānmāsān’ mudrite meghadūte caturo locane mīlayitvā | paścādāvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tamātmābhilāṣaṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśaraccandrikāsu kṣapāsu || 278 ||’ atrāmunā virahivākyenāpi nirvekṣyāva iti bhaviṣyatkālopādheḥ ‘praveśānantare’ ka khapravāsānantare 'pyavirudhyamānena taṃ tamātmābhilāṣamityādinā tadānīntanasaṃbhogasya‘bhogyasya’ ka kha saṃpūrṇatvaṃ varṇyate || karuṇānantare samṛddho yathā— ‘tīrthe toyavyatikarabhave jahnukanyāsarayvordehatyāgādamaragaṇanālekhyamāsādya sadyaḥ | pūrvākārādhikatararucā‘pūrvākārādhikacaturayā’ Mr. S. P. Pandit M. A. saṃpādite raghuvaṃśe, ka ga gha saṃgataḥ kāntayāsau līlāgāreṣvaramata punarnandanābhyantareṣu || 279 ||’ atrottarārdhenendumatyajayorlokāntarapratyujjīvanena saṃbhogasamṛddhiḥ pratipādyate || prathamānurāgānantare sahārthānvayo yathā— ‘muhapecchao paī se ‘savīsesadaṃsaṇummaïā’ iti gāthāsapta॰sāvi hu piarūadaṃsaṇummaïā | do vi kaatthā puhaviṃ‘puhaïṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘amahilapurisaṃ va’ iti gāthāsapta॰apurisamahilaṃ tti maṇṇaṃti || 280 ||’ [mukhaprekṣakaḥ patistasyāḥ sāpi khalu priyarūpadarśanonmattā | dvāvapi kṛtārthau pṛthivīmapuruṣamahileti manyete ||] atra pūrvārdhe rañjayatyartha uttarārdhe rājatyarthaḥ prathamānurāge saha ‘siddhabhāvena siddhaḥ’ ka khabhāvena siddhastadanantare 'pi tathaivānuvartate || tatraiva paścādarthānvayo yathā— ‘adya prabhṛtyavanatāṅgi tavāsmi dāsaḥ krītastapobhiriti vādini candramaulau | ahvāya sā niyamajaṃ klamamutsasarja kleśaḥ phalena hi punarnavatāṃ vidhatte || 281 ||’ atra rañjayatyarthaḥ prathamānurāge puṃsi paścādbhāvena siddhastadanantare 'pi tathaivānuvartate || atraivānurūpārthānvayo yathā— ‘śaśinamupagateyaṃ kaumudī meghamuktaṃ jalanidhimanurūpaṃ jahnukanyāvatīrṇā | iti samaguṇayogaprītayastatra paurāḥ śravaṇakaṭu nṛpāṇāmekavākyaṃ vivavruḥ || 282 ||’ atra rājatyarthaḥ prathamānurāge strīpuṃsayorapyānurūpyeṇa siddhastadanantare 'pi tathaivānuvartate || tatraivānugatārthānvayo yathā— ‘sthāne tapo duścarametadarthamaparṇayā pelavayābhitaptam‘pelavayāpi taptaṃ’ iti mudrite kumārasaṃbhave, ‘pelavayādhitaptaṃ’ ka | yā dāsyamapyasya labheta nārī sā syātkṛtārtha kimutāṅkaśayyām || 283 ||’ atra pūrvārdhe rañjayatyarthaḥ ‘prathamānugatārdhattrena’ khaprathamānurāge 'nugatārthatvena siddhastadanantare tathaivānuvartate | so 'yaṃ ‘karuṇasādhanaḥ’ khakaraṇasādhanaḥ pratyayotpattipakṣa uktaḥ | bhāvasādhanapakṣe tu sarvatra sahārthādiviśiṣṭā ratirdīptirvānurāgaśabdenocyamānā tadanantare 'pi samāsasāmarthyādanuvartate | kaḥ punaratra samāsaḥ | ṣaṣṭhīlakṣaṇastatpuruṣaḥ | prathamānurāgasyānantaraḥ‘iti’ ityadhikamatrāsti ka kha prathamānurāgānantara iti | kā ca vṛttiḥ | ajahatsvārthā na hyatra nāyakau mithaḥ samāgatāvapi prathamānurāgamutsṛjataḥ | yuktaṃ punaryadajahatsvārthā parārthābhidhānarūpā vṛttiḥ syāt, avaśyaṃ hyanena parasyārthamabhidadhātā svārtha utsraṣṭavyaḥ | bāḍhaṃ yuktam | evaṃ hi dṛśyate loke bhikṣuko dvitīyā‘na dvitīyāṃ bhikṣāṃ’ ka, ‘yaddvitīyāṃ bhikṣām’ kha bhikṣāmāsādya pūrvāṃ na jahāti saṃcayāyaiva yatate, evaṃ tārhi dvayordvivacanamiti dvivacanaṃ prāpnoti | kasyā vibhakteḥ | ṣaṣṭhyāḥ | na ṣaṣṭhīsamartho 'nantaraḥ | tarhi prathamāyāḥ | na prathamāsamarthaḥ prathamānurāgaḥ saṃbandhādhikyāt | abhihitaḥ so 'rtho 'nantarbhūtaḥ‘atrāntarbhūtaḥ’ ka kha prātipadikārthaḥ saṃpanna iti sāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyati | maivam | iha prathamānurāgānantara ‘ityasmāt’ ka khaityetasmātsamudāyādvibhaktyā utpattavyam | tena ca samudāyenaiko 'rthapiṇḍo‘tena caiko 'rthaḥ’ kha mṛtpiṇḍa ivāvibhāgāpanna‘avibhāgotpanna’ ka khapāṃsūdakavibhāgo 'vayavārthaśaktyānugṛhītaḥ pṛthagavyapadeśyāvayavaśaktirabhidhīyate | tasmiṃśca samudāyārtha ekatvaṃ samavetamato vidyamānāyāmapyavayavasaṃkhyāyāṃ tadāśrayā subutpattirna bhaviṣyati || mānānantare pūjārthānvayo yathā— ‘na spṛṣṭo 'pi tridaśasaritā dūramīrpyānubandhā- nnāpyunmṛṣṭo‘nāpyutsṛṣṭo’ ka kha bhujagapatinā tarjanābhirjayāyāḥ | mānasyānte nayanasalilaiḥ kṣālitaḥ śailaputryā patyurmaulau natiyuji jayatyātmanaḥ pādapāṃsuḥ || 284 ||’ atra pādapatanādipūjā mānasiddhā tadanantare 'pyanuvartate || atraiva mānaṃ prati priyatvābhimānārthānvayo‘priyatvābhimānānvayo’ ka kha yathā— ‘vihāyaitanmānavyasanamanayoruccakucayo- rnidheyaḥ‘vidheyaḥ’ ka kha preyāṃste yadi vayamanullaṅghyavacasaḥ | sakhībhyaḥ snigdhābhyo ‘śivamiti’ ka khagiramiti niśamyaiṇanayanā nivāpāmbho datte nayanasalilairmānasuhṛde || 285 ||’ atra mānaṃ prati priyatvābhimāno mānānantare 'pyanuvartate || atraiva premāvarodhārthānvayo yathā— ‘dūmeṃti je muhuttaṃ kuviaṃ dāsavva je‘te’ kha pasāeṃti‘pasāaṃti’ ka kha ga | te ccia mahilāṇa piā sesā sāmi ccia varāā‘varoā’ kha 286’ [dūnayanti ye muhurtaṃ kupitāṃ dāsā iva ye prasādayanti | ta eva mahilānāṃ priyāḥ śeṣāḥ svāmina eva varākāḥ ||] atrāsyāmapi premāsti ‘na ve ti’ ka kha ghanāsti veti jijñāsuḥ ‘priyaḥ’ nāsti gapriyaḥ priyāṃ kelīgotraskhalanādinā dunoti | sā ca premavatyavaśyamasmai kupyati | sa copalabdhapremā ‘na dāsavadenāṃ pravāsayati’ ka, ‘taddāsavadenāṃ prasādayati’ khadāsavadenāṃ prasādayati | athaiṣātmani premāstitvamavabudhyate‘anubadhyate’ kha | so 'yaṃ mānasiddho 'rthastadanantare 'pyanuvartate || tatraiva premapramāṇārthānvayo‘premapramāpaṇārthānvayo’ ka yathā— ‘surakusumehiṃ kalusiaṃ jaï tehiṃ cia puṇo pasāemi tumaṃ | to pemmassa kisoari avarāhassaṃ a ṇa me kaaṃ aṇurūaṃ‘aṇurūvaṃ’ gha 287’ [surakusumaiḥ kaluṣitāṃ yadi taireva punaḥ prasādayāmi tvām | tataḥ premṇaḥ kṛśodari aparādhasya ca na me kṛtamanurūpam ||] atra rukmiṇyāḥ surakusumamañjarī dattā mama tu suratarureva preyasā pratipannastadahamasyāḥ ‘sahasraguṇena’ ka khasahasraguṇatvena priyatameti satyabhāmā svapremāṇaṃ-mimīte‘pramimīte’ kha | sa cāyamartho ‘mānasiddhaḥ’ ka khamānena siddhastadanantare 'pi samāsamāmarthyādanuvartate | kaḥ punaratra samāsaḥ | ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣa eva | kā vṛttiḥ | ‘prathamānurāgānantaram’ ka khaprathamānurāgānantaravadajahatsvārthaiva | yuktaṃ tatra visrambhaṇādāvapi prathamānurāgasya vidyamānatvāt | iha tu mānanivṛttau mānāpagamādayo jāyante | anvayādviśeṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati | tadyathā—ghṛtaghaṭastailaghaṭa iti niṣikte 'pi ghṛte taile vā ghṛtaghaṭo 'yaṃ‘ayaṃ ghṛtaghaṭaḥ, ayaṃ tailaghaṭaḥ’ ka kha tailaghaṭo 'yamityanvayātpūrvapadārtho viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati | ‘bhavati’ kha nāstibhavati tatra yā ca yāvatī ‘vā’ ka khacārthamātrā ihāpi tattulyameva || tathā hi— ‘sakaaggahataṃsuṇṇāmiāṇaṇā‘rahasuttāṇiāṇaṇā’ iti gāthāsapta॰ kha, ‘rabhasottānitānanā’ iti cchāyā piaï piaamaviiṇṇam‘piamuha viiṇṇam’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘primamukhavitīrṇāṃ’ iti cchāyā ca | ‘thoaṃ thoaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘thoatthoaṃ’ ka, ‘thoathoaṃ’ gha, ‘tthoaṃ tthoaṃ’ khathoaṃ thoaṃ rososadhaṃ‘mahaṃ va’ iti gāthāsapta॰ va māṇaṃsiṇa‘ua māṇiṇī’ iti gāthāsapta॰ maïram || 288 ||’ [sakacagrahatrastāvanāmitānanā pibati priyatamavitīrṇam | stokaṃ stokaṃ roṣauṣadhamiva māninī madirām ||] sakaṣāyaireva vākyairnāyakaṃ nistudantī śayanīyaṃ gacchediti mānaśeṣānvayo dṛśyate || pravāsānantare priyā na vasata ityarthasyānvayo yathā— ‘vasane paridhūsare vasānā ‘niyamakṣāmamukhī dhṛtaikaveṇiḥ’ iti mudrite 'bhijñānaśākuntaleniyamakṣāmatanuḥ kṛtaikaveṇiḥ | atiniṣkaruṇasya śuddhaśīlā mama dīrghaṃ virahavrataṃ‘virahajvaram’ ka kha bibharti 289’ atra duṣyantena śakuntalāyāḥ pravāse vibhūṣaṇādyagrahaṇaṃ yadavagataṃ ‘tadānantare’ ka khatattadanantare 'pyanuvartamānaṃ premaprakarṣāya bhavati || tatraiva‘atraiva’ ka kha yuvānaḥ priyasaṃnidhau na vasantītyarthasyānvayo yathā— ‘samarthaye yatprathamaṃ priyāṃ prati kṣaṇena tanme parivartate 'nyathā | ato vinidre sahasā vilocane karomi na sparśavibhāvitāpriyaḥ‘sparśavibhāvitapriyaḥ’ ka kha mudrite vikramorvaśīye ca 290’ atra purūravāḥ pravāsānmatta urvaśībudhdyā latādikaṃ ‘yadyadāsādayati’ kayadyadāsasāda ‘tattadanekaśo’ ka khatattadānekaśo 'nyathā babhūva | ‘tattatsaṃkārāt’ ka khatatsaṃskārāccāyaṃ yasyā latārūpaparivartanaṃ pratyeti so 'yaṃ priyāsaṃnidhau yūnāmavāsaḥ‘avāsaḥ pravāsaḥ’ ka kha saṃsiddhastadanantare 'pyanuvartate || atraivotkaṇṭhādibhiśceto vāsayatītyarthasyānvayo yathā— ‘‘abbo’ iti khedeabbo dukkaraāraa puṇo vi tartti karesi gamaṇassa | ajja vi ṇa hoṃti saralā veṇīa taraṃgiṇo ciurā‘cihurā’ ka kha ga 291’ [he duṣkarakāraka punarapi cintāṃ karoṣi gamanasya | adyāpi na bhavanti saralā veṇyāstaraṅgiṇaścikurāḥ ||] atra ‘pravāsodbhūta’ ka khapravāsānubhūtabhṛśotkaṇṭhādicittavāsanāḥ‘cittavāsanā’ kha pravāsānantare 'pi tasyā ‘no śāmyatīti’ ka khanopaśāmyantīti veṇikāvarṇanādinā sūcyate || atraiva pramāpayatītyarthasyānvayo yathā— ‘tvadviyogodbhave caṇḍi mayā tamasi majjatā | diṣṭyā pratyupalabdhāsi cetaneva gatāsunā || 292 ||’ atrorvaśī‘virahe’ ka khavirahātpurūravā uttarāṃ ‘kāmāvasthāmāpannaḥ’ ka khakāmāvasthāṃ prapannaḥ priyāprāptau pretyeva pratyujjīvitastadevānusaṃdhatte | so 'yaṃ pramāpaṇārthaḥ pravāsasiddhastadanantare 'pi samāsasāmarthyādanuvartate | kaḥ punaratra samāsaḥ | ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣa eva | kā vṛttiḥ‘kātra vṛttiḥ’ ka kha | na tāvadanutsṛṣṭasvārthā, nahi proṣyasamāgatayoḥ pravāsasaṃbandho 'pi vidyate | utsṛṣṭasvārthā tadiha bhavatu | yuktaṃ punaryadutsṛṣṭasvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt | bāḍhaṃ yuktam | evaṃ hi dṛśyate lokepuruṣo 'yaṃ parakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svakarmotsṛjati | tadyathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi pravartamānastakṣakarmotsṛjati | nanvevaṃ sati rājapuruṣamānayetyukte puruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | utsṛjannapyayaṃ svārthaṃ nātyantāyotsṛjati, yaḥ parārthavirodhī svārthastamevotsṛjati | tadyathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi pravartamānastakṣakarmotsṛjati na tu sthitavihasitakampitādīni | na cāyamarthaḥ parārthavirodhī viśeṣaṇaṃ nāma | tasmānnotsrakṣyati || karuṇānantare 'nubhūta‘prādurbhāvārthānvayārtho’ khaprādurbhāvānvayārtho yathā— ‘jayanti jāyāśliṣṭasya śambhorambhodhimanthane | magnāmṛtaviṣāsvādamadamūrcchā manomudaḥ || 293 ||’ atra ‘dākṣāyiṇyā’ ga ghadākṣāyaṇyā haimavatītvena karuṇānantaratvam | tatra karuṇaduḥkhena mūrcchādayaḥ prādurāsan | iha tvānandena te prādurbhavanti || tatraivoccāraṇānvayārtho yathā— ‘klāmyantī yadupekṣitāsi purataḥ kāmo yadagre hataḥ kliṣṭaṃ yattapasā vapuryadapi ca proktā baṭucchadmanā | tatsarvaṃ praṇatasya me 'dya dayite dākṣāyaṇi kṣamyatāmityuktvā caraṇābjayorvijayate ‘tuṣyan’ ka khaluṇṭhañchivāyāḥ śivaḥ 294’ atra karuṇāvasthāyāṃ priyāpādābjayorluṇṭhatā śokena yo vilāpaḥ kṛtaḥ sa iha prakarṣālāpatvena ‘pariṇamati’ ka khavipariṇamati || atraiva mano 'vasthāpanānvayārtho yathā— ‘akhaṇḍitaṃ prema labhasva patyurityucyate tābhirumā sma namrā | tayā tu tasyārdhaśarīralābhādadhaḥkṛtāḥ snigdhajanāśiṣo 'pi 295’ atraiva— ‘yadaiva pūrvaṃ jvalane śarīraṃ ‘sākṣādaroṣāt’ ghasā dakṣaroṣātsudatī sasarja | tataḥprabhṛtyeva vimuktasaṅgaḥ patiḥ paśūnāmaparigraho 'bhūt || 296 ||’ iti karuṇāvasthāyāmatisnehenāparigrahatvasāhase yanmano 'vasthāpitaṃ tadihārdhaśarīrapradānamahāsāhasamevāvatiṣṭhate || tatraivābhyañjanānvayārtho yathā— ‘bhinna sadyaḥ samādhāvuparamati parajyotiṣi spandasaṃjñe saṃjñāmāpadyamāne mṛdumanasi manāgunmiṣatsvindriyeṣu | vyāpāre pāravaśyaṃ visṛjati maruti brahmasabrahmacārī vāmārdhasparśajanmā jayati purariporantarānandapūraḥ || 297 ||’ atra yatkaruṇāvasthāyāṃ manaḥ śokaprakarṣeṇābhyaktamāsīttadiha priyāśleṣajanmānā paramānandenābhyajyate | so 'yaṃ ‘karuṇadharmasamanvayaḥ’ ka khakaruṇadharmānvayastadanantare 'pi samāsasāmarthyādbhavati | kaḥ punaratra samāsaḥ | ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣa eva | kā vṛttiḥ | jahatsvārthā | na hyatra karuṇārthasya gandho 'pi | kathaṃ tarhyanvayaḥ | yathā mallikāpuṭaḥ campakapuṭa ityatra ‘nigīrṇāsu’ khaniḥkīrṇāsvapi sumanaḥsu mallikādirvāsanāvaśādviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati—ayaṃ mallikāpuṭo 'yaṃ campakapuṭa iti, evaṃ nivṛtte 'pi svārthe vāsanāvaśātkaruṇo 'nantarasya viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati | astu vā prathamānurāgādiṣvapi jahatsvārthaiva vṛttiḥ | nanvevaṃ rājapuruṣamānayetyukte puruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | vṛttau samarthādhikāraḥ kriyate | sāmarthyaṃ ca bhedaḥ saṃsarga ubhayaṃ vā | tatra rājña ityukte ‘sarvasvaṃ’ ghasarvaṃ svaṃ prasaktam | puruṣa ityukte sarvaḥ svāmī prasaktaḥ | ihedānīṃ rājapuruṣamānayetyukte rājā purūṣaṃ nivartayatyanyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ;puruṣo 'pi rājānamanyebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ‘svebhyaḥ’ ka nāsti | evamasminnubhayato vyavacchinne yadi rājārtho nivartate, kāmaṃ nivartatām | na ‘jātu kvacit’ ka khajātucitpuruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ bhaviṣyati | ‘prāk pravṛtteḥ’ kha, ‘prāk ca pravṛttaiḥ’ gaprāk ca vṛtterakṛtārthasya nivṛttau sāmarthyābhāvādvṛttireva na syāt | vṛttinimittā ca nivṛttistasmādadoṣa iti | tatra rājñaḥ puruṣa ityatra yadā tāvadavadhṛtaparāyatta‘yatra’ ga ghavṛttirayaṃ puruṣo na svatantrastadā svāmisaṃsargasyāvagatatvātsvāmiviśeṣajñānāyopādīyamāno rājaśabdaḥ svāmyantarebhyaḥ puruṣaṃ vyāvartayati | so 'yaṃ svāmyantaravyavacchedo bheda ‘iti’ kha nāstiityucyate | yadā punaranavagataparāyattabhāvasya puruṣasya svāmisaṃbandhadyotanāya rājaśabdaḥ prayujyate tadā viśeṣasaṃsargasya‘viśeṣasaṃsargaṃ cābhisaṃdhāyopasarjanasya’ kha śabdopādānatvādanavakāśo viśeṣāntarasaṃpāta ityaśabdā‘aśābdī’ ka svāmyantaranivṛttiravasīyate | yadā tvarthāntaranivṛttiṃ vārthasaṃsargaṃ ‘svātmasaṃsargaṃ ca’ ka, ‘svārthasaṃsargaṃ ca’ kha vābhisaṃdhāyopasarjanapadāni prayujyante tadā śabdārthasāmarthyayoḥ pratipattinibandhanayorabhedāpekṣayā‘abhedāpekṣāyām’ ka kha ga pustake pāṭho 'yaṃ truṭitaḥ bhedasaṃsargasamudayaḥ sāmarthyaṃ bhavati | yathā nīlaṃ ca tadutpalaṃ ceti nīlotpalam | prathamaścāsāvanurāgaśceti prathamānurāga iti, prathamānurāgānantara ityādiṣu ca bhedasāmarthyaṃ yathā rājño bhṛtya iti | yato 'nantara ityukte 'vadhṛtamidaṃ kasyāpyavagheranantaro 'yaṃ na svatantra iti sarvo 'vadhiḥ prasaktaḥ | prathamānurāgasyetyukte sarvaḥ saṃbandhī prasaktaḥ | ihedānīṃ prathamānurāgānantara ityukte prathamānurāgo 'nantaraṃ nivartayatyanyebhyo 'vadhibhyaḥ | anantaraḥ prathamānurāgaṃ nivartayatyanyebhyaḥ saṃbandhibhyaḥ | tatra yo 'sau bhedastatsāmarthyaṃ ca, tannimittā ca vṛttiḥ | bhedanimittāyāṃ ca vṛttau satyāṃ vṛttyabhimukhasya bhedamupajanayyopasarjanasya prathamānurāgasyārtho nivartate | yasyāpi pradhānasyānantarasyāvadhimato nivartate so 'pyavadhimavacchinatti | evamubhayato vyavacchede nirjñāte 'nantaraviśeṣe samudāyārthe cānyasminprādurbhavati | yadi prathamānurāgādyartho nivartate, kāmaṃ nivartatām, na ‘jātu kvacit’ ka khajātucidavadhimanmātrasya saṃpratyayo bhaviṣyati | nanu cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jahatsvārthatvaṃ nopapadyate | tathā hi ‘prathamānurāgānantare’ ityukte kaścicchabdaḥ śrūyate | prathamānurāgetyanantareti ca pratīyamānavibhāgaḥ, artho 'pi kaścidgamyate kanyāvisrambhaṇādiravadhimattvaṃ ca | ‘mānānantare’ ityukte kaścicchabdabhāgo hīyate, kaścidupajāyate, kaścidanvayī | prathamānurāgeti hīyate, ‘mānyeti’ khamānetyupajāyate, atantara ityanvayī | artho 'pi kaściddhīyate, kaścidupajāyate, kaścidanvayī | kanyāvisrambhaṇādirhīyate, mānaśaithilyādipajāyate, avadhimattvamanvayi‘anvayitvena’ ka kha | tena manyāmahe yaḥ śabdabhāgo hīyate tasyāsāvarthaḥ; yo 'rtho hīyate, ya upajāyate tasyāyamartho; yo 'rtha upajāyate, yo 'nvayī tasyāsāvartho; yo 'rthaḥ so 'nvayīti | maivam | yato 'nanyathāsiddhābhyāmevānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdā-rthayoḥ saṃbandhāvadhāraṇam | anyathāsiddhau cemau | tathā hi yatra bṛṃhitaṃ hīyate, hneṣitamupajāyate, reṇucakramanvayi; tatra hastino hīyante, aśvā upajāyante, pipīlikā anvayinyaḥ | na caitāvatā reṇucakrādipipīlikāḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavati‘bhavanti’ kha | yatra vā kṣīraṃ hīyate, dadhyupajāyate, pātramanvayi, tatra mādhuryaṃ hīyate, amlatopajāyate, tṛptiranvayinī | na caitāvatā pātrasya tṛptiḥ kāryaṃ bhavati | avadhṛtaṃ hi sāmarthyamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pravibhajyate | yathā loke badhiro 'pi cakṣuṣmānālokayati, satyapi śrotra upahatacakṣurnālokayati rūpamityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cakṣuḥśrotrasaṃnidhāne rūpālokanaṃ cakṣuṣa eva vyavasthāpyate na śrotrasya | yasya kevalasya yo 'rtho 'vadhṛtaḥ padārthāntarasaṃnidhāne 'pi tasya sa eva | nahi rasanamasaṃnidhau darśanasya madhurādivyañjakaṃ darśanasaṃnidhau nīlādivyaktiṃ prati sāmarthyaṃ labhate | prathamānurāgaśabdasya kevalasyotkaṇṭhādiṣu, mānaśabdasyerṣyāyitādiṣu, anantaraśabdasya punaravadhimatsveva sāmarthyamavadhṛtamatasteṣāṃ tāvānevārtho bhavati | yaḥ punaḥ padayoranyonyopaśleṣādvisrambhaṇādirmānaśaithilyādirvāvadhimadviśeṣo 'nyāvadhikaḥ pratīyate vākyārthaḥ sa bhavatīti | yadi vā‘ca’ ka kha yathānapekṣitāvayavārthā vṛkṣaśrotriyaśakragopādayaḥ svasāmarthyaniyatamarthamācakṣate tathā saṃghātā evaite prathamānurāgānantarādayo rājapuruṣādayaścānapekṣitāvayavārthā yathāsāmarthyamartheṣu niviśante | nanu cāvyapadeśyapūrvāparavibhāgā ‘abhinnārthābhidhāyinaḥ’ ga ghabhinnārthābhidhāyino vṛkṣādayaḥ pratīyamānabhāgabhedānuyātāḥ saṃbandhipadārthopahitabhedavṛttyabhidhāyinaḥ punarime tatkathaṃ prathamānurāgānantarādayo vṛkṣādivadrụ̄dhiśabdā bhavitumarhanti | tadasat | rụ̄dhiśabdā yaugikā iti vibhāgo 'bhedadarśanādarśanābhyāma‘abhiniviśate’ ka khabhiniviṣṭa- buddheḥ pratipādanopāya eva | ‘ayathābhiniviṣṭo’ khaapathābhiniviṣṭo hyayaṃ krameṇa tasmādapathā‘apadārthāt’ kannivartayitavyaḥ | tato 'syāpratyabhijñāyamānaprakṛtayaḥ śrotriyakṣatriyādayo darśyante | na hyatra prakṛtirūpamavasīyate | yataḥ prakṛtyarthāvacchinnaḥ pratyayārtho 'bhidhīyate | tato 'navasīyamānāvayavavibhāgā rūḍhayaḥ kāścidupanyasyante | yatrātyantamasaṃbhavo 'vayavārthasya yathā—śakragopāḥ, tailapāyikāḥ, ‘maṇḍapa iti’ ka khamaṇḍapeti | punaḥ kadācitsaṃnihitāvayavārthā jātiviśeṣābhidhāyinaḥ saptaparṇakṛtamālādaya udāhriyante | yataḥ prapalāśo 'pyanudbhinnapalāśo 'pi ca vanaspatiḥ sapta parṇānyasya parvaṇi parvaṇīti saptaparṇa ityākhyāyate | tathā niḥkīrṇakusumastaruranārabdhakalikājālako 'pi kṛtā mālāneneti kṛtamāla ityabhidhīyate | atha ca‘ca’ ka kha ga nāsti pañcāṅgulamivāśvakarṇa iva parṇamasyetyupacaritārthāvayavā jātivācina eva pañcāṅgulāśvakarṇādayo varṇyante | teṣu hi pañcāṅgulādivyapadeśaḥ prodbhidyamānapravālamapi yāvadanuvartate | tataḥ ‘saṃnidhīyamāne 'pi’ ka khasaṃnidhāne 'pyanāśrīyamāṇavṛttipadārthā‘padārthāḥ’ kha lohitaśālirgaurakhara‘gaurasvaraḥ’ kha ityādayo nigadyante | tatra hi sannapi varṇaviśeṣaḥ samudāyasya jātivacanatvācchabdārthatvena nāvasīyate | tadevamayaṃ śakalīkṛtavṛttipadārthābhiniveśaḥ prathamānurāgānantarādāviva rājapuruṣādāvapyavayavābhiniveśaṃ śakyate tyājayitum | ata eva prathamānurāgādīnāṃ vipralambhasaṃbhogādīnāṃ ca pāribhāṣiko 'pi saṃsargaḥ saṃnidhīyata iti || prakīrṇakeṣu spṛhayantīvratamaṣṭamīcandrakaḥ | sa hi caitracaturthīto 'ṣṭamacaturthyāmupādīyamānaḥ kāminībhirarcyate | yathā— ‘avasahiajaṇo païṇā salāhamāṇeṇa ecciraṃ hasio | cando tti tujjha‘tassa’ kha ‘muhadiṇṇakusumaṃ’ khamuhasaṃmuhadiṇṇakusumaṃjalivilakkho‘jātavilakkho’ kha || 298 ||’ [avaśahṛtajanaḥ patyā ślāghyamāneneyacciraṃ hasitaḥ | candra iti tava mukhasaṃmukhadattakusumāñjalivilakṣaḥ ||] yasyāṃ yavasrastareṣvabalā lolanti sā kundacaturthī | yathā— ‘luliā gahavaïdhūā diṇṇaṃ va phalaṃ javehiṃ savisesaṃ | ‘ehiṃ’ khaeṇhiṃ aṇivāriameva ‘sevagohaṇaṃ’ ka, ‘sevaggehaṇaṃ’ khagohaṇaṃ ‘cavara’ kacaraü chettammi || 299 ||’ [lulitā gṛhapatisutā dattamiva phalaṃ yavaiḥ saviśeṣam | idānīmanivāritameva godhanaṃ caratu kṣetre ||] vasantāvatāradivasaḥ suvasantako yathā— ‘chaṇapiṭṭhadhūsaratthaṇi mahumaatambacchi kuvalaāharaṇe | ‘kassa’ khakaṇṇakaacūamaṃjari putti tue maṃḍio gāmo || 300 ||’ [kṣaṇapiṣṭadhūsarastani madhumadatāmrākṣi kuvalayābharaṇe | karṇakṛtacūtamañjari putri tvayā maṇḍito grāmaḥ ||] yatra striyo dolāmārohanti sāndolanacaturthī | yathā— ‘aṃdolaṇakkhaṇoṭṭhiāe diṭṭhe tumammi muddhāe | ‘āsaṅghijjaï’ kaāsaṃdhijjaï kāuṃ‘kāo’ ka kha karapellaṇaṇiccalā‘ṇiccatā’ ka kha dolā || 301 ||’ [āndolanakṣaṇotthitayā dṛṣṭe tvayi mugdhayā | āśāsyate kartuṃ karapreraṇaniścalā dolā ||] ekameva ‘sukusumanirbharaṃ’ ka, ‘sukusumanirbharaśālmalivṛkṣaṃ’ khakusumanirbharaṃ śālmalivṛkṣamāśritya sunimīlitakādibhiḥ khelatāṃ krīḍaikaśālmalī | yathā— ‘ko esotti paloṭṭhuṃ‘paladdhaṃ’ kha ‘saṃvali’ kasiṃvalivaliaṃ piaṃ parikkhasaï | haliasuaṃ muddhavahū seajalolleṇa hattheṇa || 302 ||’ [ka eṣa iti pratyāvartituṃ śālmalivalitaṃ priyaṃ paripātayati | hālikasutaṃ mugdhavadhūḥ svedajalārdreṇa hastena ||] trayodaśyāṃ kāmadevapūjāmadanotsavaḥ | yathā— ‘gāmataruṇīo hiaaṃ haraṃti pọdhāṇa‘cheāṇaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘vidagdhānām’ iti cchāyā ca thaṇaharillīo | ‘maaṇe kusumbharañjiakañcu[i]āharaṇamettāo’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘madane kusumbharāgayuktakañcukābharaṇamātrāḥ’ iti cchāyā camaaṇūsaammi kosuṃbhakaṃcuāharaṇamettāo || 303 ||’ [grāmataruṇyo hṛdayaṃ haranti praụdhānāṃ stanabhāravatyaḥ | madanotsave kausumbhakañcukābharaṇamātrāḥ ||] gandhodakapūrṇavaṃśanāḍīśṛṅgakādibhiryūnāṃ priyajanābhiṣekakardamena krīḍodakakṣveḍikā | yathā— ‘‘ahaṃ’ khaaha dhāviūṇa‘dhāvijaṇa’ kha saṃjhāmaeṇa‘saṅgamaeṇa’ kha savvaṃgiaṃ paḍicchaṃti | ‘paggumahe’ kaphaggumahe taruṇīo gahavaïsuahatthacikkhillaṃ || 304 ||’ [atha dhāvitvā saṃdhyāmadena sarvāṅgikaṃ pratīkṣante | phalgumahe taruṇyo gṛhapatisutahastakardamam ||] yatrottamastriyaḥ pādābhighātenāśokaṃ vikāsya‘vikāśya’ ka kha ga tatkusumamavataṃsayanti sāśokottaṃsikā | yathā— ‘uttaṃsiūṇa dohalaviasiāsoaminduvadaṇāe | ‘virahiṇo’ ka khavihiṇo ṇipphalakaṃkellikaraṇasaddo samuppusio || 305 ||’ [uttaṃsayitvā dohadavikasitāśokaminduvadanayā | vidherniṣphalakaṃkolakaraṇaśabdaḥ samutproñchitaḥ ||] yatrāṅganābhiścūtamañjaryo 'varujyānaṅgāya ‘bālarāgatvenaiva’ khabāṇatvena dāyaṃ dāyamavataṃsyante sā cūtabhañjikā | yathā— ‘raïaṃ pi tā ṇa sohaï raïjoggaṃ kāmiṇīṇa chaṇaṇevacchaṃ | kaṇṇe jā ṇa raïjjaï‘jāva ṇa raïjjaï’ ka, ‘jāva ṇa rajjaï’ kha kavolagholaṃtasahaāraṃ‘kavolaghoṇantapallavasahaāraṃ’ ka kha || 306 ||’ [racitamapi tāvanna śobhate ratiyogyaṃ kāminīnāṃ kṣaṇanepathyam | karṇe yāvanna racyate kapolaghūrṇamānasahakāram ||] yatra yuvatayo madirāgaṇḍūṣadohadena bakulaṃ vikāsya‘vikāśya’ ka kha ga tatpuṣpāṇyavacinvanti sā puṣpāvacāyikā | yathā— ‘pīṇathaṇaesu kesara dohaladāṇummuhīa ṇivalaṃto | tuṃgasiharaggapaḍaṇassa jaṃ phalaṃ taṃ tue‘tae’ ka kha pattaṃ || 307 ||’ [pīnastaneṣu kesara dohadadānonmukhyā nipatan | tuṅgaśikharāgrapatanasya yatphalaṃ tattvayā prāptam ||] yatra kaste priyatama iti pṛcchadbhiḥ palāśādinavalatābhiḥ priyo jano hanyate sā cūtalatikā | yathā— ‘‘ṇavalaapaharaṃ’ ka kha gāthāsapta॰ṇavalaïpahāramaṃge jahiṁ jahiṁ mahaï dearo dāuṃ | romaṃcadaṃḍarāī tahiṃ tahiṃ dīsaï bahūe || 308 ||’ [navalatāprahāramaṅge yatra yatrecchati devaro dātum | romāñcadaṇḍarājistatra tatra dṛśyate vadhvāḥ ||] ‘pañcālyanunayantī’ ka, ‘pañcātmānunayantī’ khapañcālyanuyātaṃ bhūtamātṛkā | yathā— ‘vihalaï se ṇevacchaṃ pammāaï maṃḍaṇaṃ gaī khalaï | bhūachaṇaṇaccaṇaammi‘ṇaccaṇapāmmi’ kha suhaa mā ṇaṃ ‘puloesu’ ka khapaloesu || 309 ||’ [vihvalayatyasyā nepathyaṃ pramlāyate maṇḍanaṃ gatiḥ skhalati | bhūtakṣaṇanṛtye subhaga maināṃ pralokayeḥ ||] varṣāsu kadambanīpahāridrakādikusumaiḥ praharaṇabhūtaurdvidhā vanaṃ‘dalaṃ’ ka, ‘balaṃ’ kha vibhajya kāminīnāṃ krīḍāḥ‘krīḍā’ kha ga kadambayuddhāni | yathā— ‘sahiāhiṁ piavisajjiakadaṃbaraabhariaṇibbharucchasio | dīsaï kalaṃvathavaovva thaṇaharo haliasoṇhāe || 310 ||’ [sakhībhiḥ
