priyavisarjitakadambarajobharitanirbharocchvasitaḥ | dṛśyate kadambastabaka iva stanabharo hālikasnuṣāyāḥ ||] prathamavarṣaṇaprarūḍhanavatṛṇāṅkurāsu sthalīṣu śādvalamabhyarcya bhuktapītānāṃ kṛtrimavivāhādikrīḍā navapattrikā | ‘tatra’ ghatatra ca varaṇavidhānādau teṣāmevaṃvidhāḥ parihāsā bhavanti | yathā— ‘tā kuṇaha kālaharaṇaṃ tuvarantammi vi vare vivāhassa‘vivālassa’ ka | ‘jāva’ ka, ‘jāvaṃ’ khajā[va] ‘paduṇahavaāi’ khapaṃḍuṇahavaāiṃ hoṃti kumārīa aṃgāiṃ || 311 ||’ [tāvatkuruta kālaharaṇaṃ tvaramāṇe 'pi vare vivāhasya | yāvatpāṇḍunakhapadāni bhavanti kumāryā aṅgāni ||] abhinavabisāṅkurodbhedābhirāmaṃ saraḥ samāśritya kāmimithunānāṃ krīḍā bisakhādikā | yathā— ‘geṇhaṃti piaamā piaamāṇa vaaṇāhi visalaaddhāiṃ | hiaāiṁ vi kusumāuhabāṇakaāṇearaṃdhāiṃ‘iṃdhāiṃ’ kha || 312 ||’ [gṛhṇanti priyatamāḥ priyatamānāṃ vadanādbisalatārdhāni | hṛdayānīva kusumāyudhabāṇakṛtānekarandhrāṇi ||] śakrotsavadivasaḥ śakrārcā | yathā— ‘saccaṃ caa kaṭṭhamao‘kaṭṭamao’ kha suraṇāho jeṇa haliadhūāe‘dhoāe’ ka, ‘dhīāe’ kha | hatthehiṁ ‘kamaladalakomalehiṃ’ ga pāṭhastruṭitaḥkamaladalakomalehiṁ chitto ṇa pallavio || 313 ||’ [satyameva kāṣṭhamayaḥ suranātho yena hālikaduhitrā | hastaiḥ kamaladalakomalaiḥ spṛṣṭo na pallavitaḥ ||] ‘āśvina’ ka khaāśvine paurṇimāsī kaumudī | yathā— ‘aha taï ‘mahatthadiṇṇe’ ka khasahatthadiṇṇo ‘kaha vi’ khakaha vi khalaṃtamattajaṇamajjhe | ‘tiṇṇāthaṇesu’ katissā thaṇesu jāo vilevaṇaṃ komuīvāso‘kemuīvāso’ ka || 314 ||’ [atha tvayā svahastadattaḥ kathamiva skhalanmattajanamadhye | tasyāḥ staneṣu jāto vilepana kaumudīvāsaḥ ||] dīpotsavo yakṣarātriḥ | yathā— ‘aṇṇe vi hu‘hi’ ka, ‘asme vi hi’ kha hoṃti chaṇā ‘ṇa’ ka kha nāsti, ‘chaṇā ṇo’ gaṇa uṇo dīāliāsaricchā de‘sariccho de’ ka kha | jattha jahicchaṃ gammaï ‘piavasadī’ ka kha, ‘piavasaī’ ghapiavasahī ‘dīavamiseṇa’ ka khadīvaamiseṇa || 315 ||’ [anye 'pi khalu bhavanti kṣaṇā na punardīpālikāsadṛkṣāste | yatra yathecchaṃ gamyate priyavasatirdīpakamiṣeṇa ||] ‘śamidhānya’ khaśamīdhānyaśūkadhānyānāmārdrāṇāmevāgnipakvānāmabhyavahāro 'bhyū‘abhyupakhādikā’ ka, ‘abhyuṣakhādikā’ khaṣakhādikā | yathā— ‘‘vā aṇaggiṇā’ ka, ‘aṇaggiṇā’ khavāaggiṇā karo me ‘daddhotti’ ka khadaṭṭhotti puṇo puṇo ccia kahei‘kahehii’ ka | haliasuā‘hāliasuā’ ka kha maliacchusadohalī‘dohalā’ ka, ‘dohasā’ kha pāmarajuāṇe‘pāmarajuvāṇe’ ka, ‘pāmarajuvāṇo’ kha || 316 ||’ [nirvāṇāgninā karo me dagdha iti punaḥ punareva kathayati | hālikasutā mṛditocchvāsadohadinī pāmarayūni ||] prathamata evekṣubhakṣaṇaṃ navekṣubhakṣikā | yathā— ‘diarassa saraamaüaṃ aṃsūmaïleṇa dei hattheṇa | paḍhamaṃ hiaaṃ bahuā‘bahuā’ gha ‘pavaṭhṭhā’ khapacchā gaṇḍaṃ sadantavaṇaṃ || 317 ||’ [devarasya śaranmṛdukamaśrumalinena dadāti hastena | prathamaṃ hṛdayaṃ vadhūkā paścādikṣuṃ sadantavraṇam ||] grīṣmādau jalāśayāvagāhanaṃ toyakrīḍā | yathā— ‘pisuṇeṃti kāmiṇīṇaṃ ‘jalalukkapiāvaūhahā’ ka, ‘jalalukkāiāvaūhahā’ khajalalukkapiāvaūhaṇasuhelliṃ | ‘kaṇṭhaïakavotā pulla’ ka, ‘kaṇṭhaïakavolā papphulla’ khakaṇḍaïakavoluphullaṇiccalacchīiṁ vaaṇāiṃ || 318 ||’ [piśunayanti kāminīnāṃ jalalīnapriyāvagūhanasukhakelim | kaṇṭakitakapolotphullaniścalākṣīṇi vadanāni ||] ‘nāthādidarśanaṃ’ khanāṭyādidarśanaṃ prekṣā | yathā— ‘ṇaccihii ṇaḍo pecchihii ‘jeṇa pao’ khajaṇavao bhoio‘bhorao’ ka nāyakaḥ | so vi dūsihii ‘jara’ khajaï ‘raṅgavihaüṇaarī’ kharaṅgavihaḍaṇaarī gahavaïghūā‘gaïvaïdhuā’ ka, ‘gahavaradhuā’ kha ṇa baccihii‘yavaccihii’ ka, ‘paviccihii’ kha ||’ [nartiṣyate naṭaḥ prekṣiṣyate janapado bhogiko nāyakaḥ | so 'pi dūṣayiṣyati yadi raṅgavighaṭanakarī gṛhapatiduhitā na vrajiṣyati] āliṅganādiglahā durodarādikrīḍā‘durodarakrīḍā’ gha dyūtāni | yathā— ‘āśleṣe prathamaṃ krameṇa vijite ‘hṛṣṭādharasyārpaṇe’ ka, ‘dṛṣṭādharasyārpaṇe’ khahṛdye 'dharasyārpaṇe ‘kelīdyūtavidhau’ ka khakelidyūtavidhau paṇaṃ priyatame kāntāṃ punaḥ pṛcchati | sāntarhāsaniruddhasaṃbhṛtarasodbhedasphuradgaṇḍayā‘sphuraddantayā’ kha tūṣṇīṃ ‘śārivisāraṇāya’ kasārivisāraṇāya nihitaḥ svedāmbugarbhaḥ karaḥ || 320 ||’ rāgoddīpanāya ‘mādhvīkādisevā’ kamādhvīsevā madhupānaṃ | yathā— ‘thoārūḍhamahumaā khaṇa‘pamhuṭṭhā vimhariyā’ iti dhanapālapāiyalacchīnāmamālā | 'pamhaṭṭa’ ka, ‘palhadā’ kha, ‘pamhaṭhā’ ga, ‘pamhaṭhṭhā’ ghapamhaṭṭhāvarāhadiṇṇullāvā | hasiūṇa saṃṭhavijjaï pieṇa saṃmarialajjiā kāvi piā 321’ [stokārūḍhamadhumadā kṣaṇavismṛtiraparādhadattollāpā | hasitvā saṃsthāpyate priyeṇa saṃsmṛtalajjitā kāpi priyā ||] premaprakāre vipriyādibhirapyavināśanīyo nityo yathā— ‘diṭṭhākuviāṇuṇaā piā sahassajaṇapellaṇaṃ pi visahiaṃ‘visahiām’ ka, ‘visahiā’ kha | jassa ‘ṇisaṇṇaï’ kaṇisaṇṇāi ure sirīe‘sirīa’ ka pemmeṇa lahuio‘lahuaïo’ ka kha appāṇo 322’ [dṛṣṭā kupitānunayā priyā sahasnajanapreraṇamapi visoḍham | yasya niṣaṇṇayorasi śriyā premṇā laghūkṛta ātmā ||] tapaścaraṇādijanmā naimittiko yathā— iyeṣa sā kartumavandhyarūpatāṃ samādhimāsthāya tapobhirātmanaḥ | avāpyate vā kathamanyathā dvayaṃ tathāvidhaṃ prema patiśca tādṛśaḥ 323’ anirdhāritaviśeṣaḥ sāmānyo yathā— ‘kuviāo‘kuviāa’ kha, ‘kuviāa’ ka ga vi pasaṇṇāo ‘oraṇṇamuhīo’ ka, nāsti |‘oṇāmuhīo’ khaoraṇṇamuhīo ‘visamāṇīo’ ityādi gāthāṃśaḥ—ga truṭita evavi samāṇīo | jaha gahiā taha hiaaṃ dhāreṃti a ṇivvaïṃ bālā || 324 ||’ [dhvanyāloke tviyameva gāthaivamudāhṛtā—‘kuviāo pasaṇṇāo oraṇṇamuhīo vihasamāṇāo | jaha gahio taha hiaaṃ haranti ucchintamahilāo ||’ [kupitāḥ prasannā avaruditavadanā vihasantyaḥ | yathā gṛhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ haranti svairiṇyo mahilāḥ ||] iti cchāyā cakupitā api prasannā avaruditamukhyo 'pi samānāḥ | yathā gṛhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ dhārayantīva nirvṛtiṃ bālāḥ ||] nirdhāritaviśeṣaprakāro viśeṣavān yathā— ‘ṇavi taha aṇālavaṃtī hiaaṃ dūmei ‘māṇiīṇī'(?) kamāṇiṇī ahiaṃ | jaha ‘dūre vi’ kadūraviaṃbhia‘garūa’ khagaruarosamajjhatthabhaṇiehiṃ‘bhaṇiṣeṇa’ ka, ‘bhaṇiei’ kha || 325 ||’ [nāpi tathā nālapantī hṛdayaṃ dunoti māninyadhikam | yathā dūravijṛmbhitagurukaroṣamadhyasthamaṇitaiḥ ||] iṅgitādibhirapyanavagamyaḥ pracchanno yathā— ‘diahe diahe ‘rūpaī’ ka, ‘rūsaï’ khasūsaï saṃkeaabhaṃga‘vaṭṭiāsaṅkā’ kavaḍ̣dhiāsaṅkā | ‘āvaṇḍuroṇaamuhī’ gāthāsapta॰āvaṃḍurovaṇamuhī kalameṇa samaṃ kalamagovī‘gopī’ gha || 326 ||’ [divase divase śuṣyati saṃketakabhaṅgavardhitāśaṅkā | āpāṇḍurāvanatamukhī kalamena samaṃ kalamagopī ||] ‘saṃkhyādibhiḥ’ khasakhyādibhiravagataḥ prakāśo yathā— ‘jaï hosi ṇa tassa piā aṇudiahaṃ ṇīsahehiṁ‘dīaha’ ka, ‘aṇudiahaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰ pāṭhaḥ, ‘anudivasaṃ’ iti cchāyā ca aṃgehiṃ | ṇavasūapīapeūsamaṃtapāḍi vva‘mattapāḍivva’ ka, ‘mao pāḍivva’ kha, ‘mattapāḍivva’ gāthāsapta॰ pāṭhaḥ kiṃ suvasi || 327 ||’ [yadi bhavasi na tasya priyānudivasaṃ niḥsahaiḥ surataśramakhinnairaṅgaiḥniḥsahairaṅgaiḥ | navasūtapīta pīyūṣeṇābhinavadugdhena mattā pāḍīva vatsikevapīyūṣamattamahiṣīvatsikeva kiṃ svapiṣi ||] kāraṇopādhikaḥ kṛtrimo yathā— ‘addaṃsaṇeṇa puttaa suṭa‍ṭhu vi ṇehāṇubaṃdha‘ghaḍiāiṃ’ gāthāsapta॰gahiāiṃ | hatthaüḍapāṇiāiṁ vi(va)‘va’ gāthāsapta॰ kāleṇa galaṃti pemmāiṃ‘vāllanti’ ka 'vāllānti’ kha || 328 ||’ [adarśanena putraka suṣṭha‍vapi snehānubandhagṛhītāni | hastapuṭapānīyānīva kālena galanti premāṇi ||] kāraṇanirapekṣo 'pṛtrimo yathā— ‘jaha jaha jarāpariṇao hoi paī duggao virūo vi | ‘kulavāliāṇaṁ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘kulavāliāe’ ka khakulapāliāiṃ taha taha ahiaaraṃ vallaho hoi || 329 ||’ [yathā yathā jarāpariṇato bhavati patirdurgato virūpo 'pi | kulapālikāyāstathā tathādhikataraṃ vallabho bhavati ||] janmāntarasaṃskārajanitaḥ sahajo yathā— ‘āṇia‘pulaobbheo’ ka khapulaübbheo savattipaṇaaparidhūsarammi vi gurue‘garue’ ka, ‘garūe’ kha | piadaṃsaṇe pavaḍḍhaï ‘mamhaṭhṭhāṇe’ kamaṇṇuṭṭhāṇe vi ‘rummiṇīa’ karuppiṇīa pahariso || 330 ||’ [ānītapulakodbhedaḥ sapatnīpraṇayaparidhūsare 'pi guruke | priyadarśane pravardhate manyusthāne 'pi rukmiṇyāḥ praharṣaḥ ||] upacārāpekṣaprakarṣa āhāryo yathā— ‘ghariṇīa akaïavvaṃ‘kaïavvaṃ’ ka kha caṭuaṃ‘caḍulaṃ’ ka, ‘bahulaṃ’ kha piaame kuṇaṃtammi | akaatthāiṃ vi jāāi ‘nhatti’ ka, ‘gatti’ khajhaṃti sịdhilāiṃ‘sịdhiliāiṃ’ ka kha aṃgāiṃ || 331 ||’ [gṛhiṇyā akaitavaṃ caṭukaṃ priyatame kurvāṇe sati | akṛtārthānīva jāyāyā jhaṭiti śithilānyaṅgāni ||] yauvanajo yathā— ‘taṃbamuhakaāhoā jaha‘jaha’ ka jaha thaṇaā kileṃti kumarīṇam‘kumārīṇaṃ’ ka | taha taha laddhāvāsovva vammaho‘mammaho’ gha hiaamāvisaï || 332 ||’ [tāmramukhakṛtābhogau yathā yathā stanau klāmyataḥ kumārīṇām | tathā tathā labdhāvāsa iva manmatho hṛdayamāviśati ||] upacārānapekṣo visrambhajo yathā— ‘ṇa vi taha chearaāiṃ haraṃti punaruttarāaramiāiṃ | jaha jatthava tatthava jaha va taha va sabbhāvaramiāiṃ || 333 ||’ [nāpi tathā chekaratāni haranti‘hṛdayamityadhyāhāryaṃm’ punaruktarāgaramitāni | yathā yatraiva tatraiva yathā vā tathā vā sadbhāvaramitāni ||] premapuṣṭiṣu cakṣuḥprītiryathā— ‘‘vyutpattiḥ’ gautpattirdevayajanādbrahmavādī nṛpaḥ pitā | suprasannojjvalā mūrtirasyāḥ snehaṃ karoti me || 334 ||’ manaḥsaṅgo yathā— ‘eṣā mano me prasabhaṃ śarīrātpituḥ padaṃ madhyamamutpatantī | ‘surāpagā’ ghasurāṅganā karṣati khaṇḍitāgrātsūtraṃ mṛṇālādiva rājahaṃsī || 335 ||’ saṃkalpotpattiryathā— ‘taṃ pulaïaṃ‘pulaïā’ kha ‘pi’ ka kha gavi pecchaï taṃ cia‘taṃcā’ ka, ‘taṃ via’ kha ṇijjhāi‘ṇijjāaïi’ ka, ‘ṇijjā aï’ kha tīa geṇhaï gottaṃ | ‘ghaïaṃ tassā maaṇe’ khaṭhāia tassa samaaṇe aṇṇaṃ vi‘pi’ ka kha ga viciṃtaammi‘vicitaṃaṇi’ kha saccia hiae ||’ [tāṃ pulakitāṃ prekṣate tāmeva nirdhyāyati tasyā gṛhṇāti gotram | tiṣṭhati tasya samadane anyāmapi vicintayati saiva hṛdaye ||] pralāpo yathā— ‘amaamaa gaaṇasehara raaṇīmuhatilaa caṃda de chivasu | ‘chitto jehiṃ pi piā’ ka, ‘chitto te jehi’ khachitto jehiṃ piaamo ‘mamaṃ’ itigāthāsapta॰mamamaṃ ‘pi’ ka kha gavi tehiṃ cia‘via’ kha karehiṃ || 337 ||’ [amṛtamaya gaganaśekhara rajanīmukhatilaka candra he spṛśa | spṛṣṭo yaiḥ priyatamo māmapi taireva karaiḥ ||] jāgaro yathā— ‘‘taha’ khatuha ‘virahujjāgario’ ka, ‘virahajjāgario’ khavirahujjāgarao siviṇe vi ṇa‘sa’ ka kha dei daṃsaṇasuhāiṃ | vāheṇa jahāloaṇaviṇoaṇaṃ‘choaṇaviloaṇaṃ’ ka, ‘loaṇaviloaṇaṃ’ kha pi ‘se haaṃ taṃ pi’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘tasyā hataṃ tadapi’ iti cchāyā case vihaam || 338 ||’ [tava virahojjāgarakaḥ svapne 'pi na dadāti darśanasukhāni | bāṣpeṇa yathālokanavinodanamapyasyā vihatam ||] kārśyaṃ yathā— ‘‘āi' ka khaaïkovaṇā vi ‘sāsu’ khasāsū ‘ruāviā’ ka, ‘rūāviā’ kha gāthāsapta॰roāviā ‘gaavaīe’ ka kha, ‘gaavaïa’ ghagaavaīa soṇhāe | ‘pāapaḍaṇeṇa māe’ ga ghapāapaḍaṇoṇṇaāe dosu vi‘doṇhavi’ ga gha galiesu valaesu || 339 ||’ [atikopanāpi śvaśrū roditā gatapatikayā snaṣayā | pādapatanāvanatayā dvayorapi galitayorvalayayoḥ ||] aratirviṣayāntare yathā— ‘‘asamaṃto vi’ khaasamatto vi samappaï ‘apariaggahia’ ka, ‘aparigāhia’ khaapariggahialahuo paraguṇālāvo‘paraguṇālāo’ ka | tassa piāpaḍivaḍ̣dhā‘paḍivạdḥdhā’ ga gha ṇa samappaï raïsuhāsamattā vi kahā || 340 ||’ [asamāpto 'pi samāpyate 'parigṛhītalaghukaḥ paraguṇālāpaḥ | tasya priyāpratibaddhā na samāpyate ratisukhāsamāptāpi kathā ||] lajjāvisarjanaṃ yathā— ‘agaṇiasesajuāṇā‘sesajuaṇā’ ka, ‘sesajuāṇo’ kha bālaa volīṇaloamajjāā | aha sā bhamaï disāmuhapasāriacchī tuha kaeṇa || 341 ||’ [agaṇitāśeṣayuvakā bālaka vyatikrāntalokamaryādā | atha sā bhramati diśāmukhaprasāritākṣī tava kṛtena ||] vyādhiryathā— ‘aṇṇaha‘asāhaṇa’ kha ṇa tīraï ccia parivaḍḍhaṃtaa‘gaagaruasaṃtāpaṃ’ gha, ‘garuasaṃlāvaṃ’ ka kha, ‘garuaṃ piaamassa’ iti gāthāsapta॰garuasaṃtāvaṃ | maraṇaviṇoeṇa viṇā viramāveuṃ virahadukkham || 342 ||’ [anyathā na śakyata eva parivardhamānagurukasaṃtāpam | maraṇavinodena vinā viramayituṃ virahaduḥkham ||] unmādo yathā— ‘avalaṃbaha ‘māṃ saṃkaruṇarasagāha’ khasā saṃkaha ṇa imā gahalaṃghiā paribbhamaï | atthakkagajjiubbhaṃ‘gajjia uttanta’ ka khatahitthahiaā pahiajāā || 343 ||’ [avalambadhvaṃ mā śaṅkadhvaṃ neyaṃ grahalaṅghitā paribhramati | ākasmikagarjitodbhrāntatrastahṛdayā pathikajāyā ||] mūrcchā yathā— ‘jaṃ mucchiā ṇa a suo kalaṃbagaṃdheṇa taṃ guṇe paḍiaṃ | iaraha gajjiasaddo jīeṇa viṇā ṇa boliṃto || 344 ||’ [yanmūrcchitā na ca śrutaḥ kadambagandhena tadguṇe patitam | itarathā garjitaśabdo jīvena vinā na vyatikrāmet ||] maraṇaṃ yathā— ‘‘ajjaṃ pi’ ka kha gāthāsapta॰ajja vi tāva ekkaṃ ‘māsaṃ’ ka khamāmaṃ ‘bāreha’ ka, ‘dhāreha’ khavārehi piasahi ruaṃtim | kalliṃ ‘pahiūṇa’ ka kha, ‘jaï ṇa muā tā ṇa roissam’ gāthāsapta॰ | atratyasāhityācāryabhaṭṭamathurānāthaśāstriviracitāsu chāyāryāsu tu—‘adyeva tāvadekaṃ mā rudanīṃ nivārayasvāli | kalye gate tu tasmin na hi rodiṣyāmi yadi na mṛtā ||’uṇa tammi gae jaï ṇa marissaṃ ṇa roissam 345’ [adyāpi tāvadekaṃ mā māṃ vāraya priyasakhi rudantīm | kalye punastasmin gate yadi na mariṣyāmi na roṣyāmi ||] tā imā vipralambhajanmāno dvādaśāpi premapuṣṭibhūmayaḥ saṃbhogeṣu svānurūpāmeva premaprakarṣabhūmikāmāskandayanti || nāyakeṣu kathāvyāpī nāyako yathā— ‘guroḥ śāsanamatyetuṃ na śaśāka sa rāghavaḥ | yo rāvaṇaśiraśchedakāryabhāre 'pyaviklavaḥ || 346 ||’ pratināyako yathā— ‘jetāraṃ lokapālānāṃ ‘tairmukhaiḥ’ kasvamukhairarciteśvaram | rāmastulitakailāsamarātiṃ bahvamanyata || 347 ||’ upanāyako yathā— ‘sa hatvā vālinaṃ vīraṃ‘vīraḥ’ iti S. P. Pandit M. A. saṃpādite raghuvaṃśe tatpade cirakāṅkṣite | dhātoḥ sthāna ivādeśaṃ sugrīvaṃ saṃnyaveśayat || 348 ||’ anunāyako yathā— ‘‘sa mārutisamānīta’ iti mudrite raghuvaṃśesa mārutasutānītamahauṣadhihṛtavyathaḥ | laṅkāstrīṇāṃ punaścakre vilāpācāryakaṃ śaraiḥ || 349 ||’ kathāvyāpinī nāyikā yathā— ‘tīe savisesadūniasavattihiaāiṃ ‘ṇivvaraṇentasiṇehaṃ’ ka,‘ṇivvaraṇantasiṇetaṃ’ khaṇivvalaṃtasiṇehaṃ | piagaruiāi ṇimiaṃ sohaggaguṇāṇa aggabhūmīa paaṃ || 350 ||’ [tayā saviśeṣadūnitasapatnīhṛdayayā nirvartyamānasneham | priyagurūkṛtayā nirmitaṃ saubhāgyaguṇānāmagrabhūmyāṃ padam ||] pratināyikā yathā— ‘taṃ‘jaṃ’ kha tiasakusumadāmaṃ hariṇā ṇimmahiasurahigaṃdhāmoaṃ | appaṇaïaṃ pi dūmia‘dūmmia’ kapaṇaï‘paṇaï pi’ ka khaṇihiaeṇa ruppiṇīa ‘viaïṇṇaṃ’ gaviiṇṇam 351’ [tattridaśakusumadāma hariṇā nirgacchatsurabhigandhāmodam | ātmanānītamapi dūnitapraṇayinīhṛdayena rukmiṇyai vitīrṇam ||] upanāyikā yathā— ‘devīsvīkṛtamānasasya niyataṃ svapnāyamānasya me tadgotragrahaṇādiyaṃ suvadanā yāyātkathaṃ na vyathām | itthaṃ yantraṇayā kathaṃ kathamapi kṣīṇā niśā jāgrato dākṣiṇyopahatena sā priyatamā svapne 'pi nāsāditā 352’ anunāyikā yathā— ‘ślāghyānāṃ guṇināṃ dhuri sthitavati śreṣṭhānvavāyeDr. R. G. Bhandarkar saṃpādite mālatīmādhave tu ‘śreṣṭhānvaye ca tvayi’ iti pāṭhaḥ tvayi pratyastavyasane mahīyasi paraṃ prīto 'smi jāmātari | teneyaṃ madayantikādya bhavataḥ prītyai bhavatpreyase‘tava preyase’ mudrite mālatīmādhave mitrāya prathamānurāgaghaṭitāpyasmābhirutsṛjyate || 353 ||’ ābhāseṣu nāyakābhāso yathā— ‘‘kahaṇṇa mā jhijjaü’ ka, ‘kahaṃ ṇa hijjaü’ khakaha mā chijjaü majjho imīa kaṃdoṭṭadalasaricchehiṃ | acchīhiṃ jo ṇa dīsaï ghaṇathaṇahararuddhapasarehiṃ || 354 ||’ [kathaṃ mā kṣīyatāṃ madhya etasyā nīlotpaladalasadṛśābhyām | akṣibhyāṃ yo na dṛśyate ghanastanabhararuddhaprasarābhyām ||] nāyikābhāso yathā— ‘kṛtasītāparityāgaḥ sa ratnākaramekhalām | bubhuje pṛthivīpālaḥ pṛthivīmeva kevalām || 355 ||’ ubhayābhāso yathā— ‘avaūhiapubbadise samaaṃ‘samayaṃ’ ka joṇhāe seviapaosamuhe‘paosaṃ muhe’ ka kha | māi ṇa jhijjaü ‘araṇī’ ka kharaaṇī varadisāitapacchiammi miaṅke 356’ [avagūhitapūrvadiśe samakaṃ jyotsnayā sevitapradoṣamukhe | mātarna kṣīyate rajanī aparadiśābhimukhaprasthite mṛgāṅke ||] tiryagābhāso yathā— ‘orattapaṅkaamuhiṃ ‘bahmahaṇadiaṃ’ ka, ‘bahmaṇadiaṃ’ kha vammahaṇaḍiaṃ va salilasaaṇaṇisaṇṇaṃ | alliaï tīraṇaliṇiṃ vāāi gamei ‘sahavariṃ’ kasahacariṃ cakkāo‘vakkāo’ ka kha 357’ [uparaktapaṅkajamukhīṃ manmathanaṭitāmiva salilaśayananiṣaṇṇām | āliṅgati tīranalinīṃ vācā gamayati sahacarīṃ cakravākaḥ ||] nāyakeṣu sarvaguṇasaṃpadyogāduttamaḥ | sa yathā— ‘rāmo 'yaṃ jagatīha vikramaguṇairyātaḥ prasiddhiṃ parāmasmadbhāgyaviparyayādyadi paraṃ devo na jānāti tam | bandīvaiṣa yaśāṃsi gāyati marudyasyaikabāṇāhatiśreṇībhūtaviśālatālavivarodbhūtaiḥ svaraiḥ saptabhiḥ 358’ pādonaguṇasampadyogānmadhyamo yathā— ‘kiṃ no vyāptadiśāṃ prakampitabhuvāmakṣauhiṇīnāṃ phalaṃ kiṃ droṇena kimaṅgarājaviśikhairevaṃ yadi klāmyasi | ni. sā. mudrite veṇīsaṃhāre tu—‘bhīru bhrātṛśatasya yā bhujaghanacchāyā sukhopāsthitā’ iti pāṭhaḥjīvadbhrātṛśatasya me ‘bhujavanacchāyāṃ’ kabhujabalacchāyāṃ sukhāmāśritā tvaṃ duryodhanakesarīndragṛhiṇī śaṅkāspadaṃ kiṃ tava || 359 ||’ ardhaguṇasampadyogātkaniṣṭho yathā— ‘ekasmiñśayane mayā mayasutāmāliṅgya ‘nidrāśayāṃ’ khanidrālasā- munnidraṃ śayitena maccaraṇayoḥ saṃvāhanavyāpṛtā | pādāgreṇa tilottamā stanataṭe sasnehamāpīḍitā harṣāvegasamarpitāni pulakānyadyāpi no muñcati || 360 ||’ sattvapradhānaḥ sāttviko yathā— ‘śaktyā vakṣasi magnayā saha mayā mụ̄dhe plavaṅgādhipe nidrāṇeṣu ca vidravatsu kapiṣu prāptāvakāśe dviṣi | mā bhaiṣṭeti nirundhataḥ kapibhayaṃ tasyodbhaṭabhrūsthite- rmarmacchedavisaṃṣṭhulākṣarajaḍā vācastvayā na śrutāḥ 361’ rajaḥpradhāno rājaso yathā— ‘sāmantamaulimaṇirañjitaśāsanāṅka- mekātapattramavanerna tathā prabhutvam | asyāḥ sakhe caraṇayoradhigamya samya- gājñākaratvamahamadya yathā kṛtārthaḥ || 362 ||’ tamaḥpradhānastāmaso yathā— ‘tapo vā śastraṃ vā mudrite mahāvīracarite tu ‘vyavaharati’ iti pāṭhaḥvyapadiśati yaḥ kaścidiha vaḥ sa darpādu‘uddāmaṃ dviṣamasahamānaṃ’ ka, ‘uddāmastviṣamasahamānaḥ skhalayatu’ iti ca mudrite vīracariteddāmadviṣamasahamānaḥ kalayatu | arāmāṃ niḥsīradhvajadaśarathīkṛtya vasudhā‘jagatīṃ’ iti mudrite vīracarite- matṛptastatkulyānapi‘tatkulyāmapi’ ka, ‘tatkalpāmapi’ kha paraśurāmaḥ śamayati || 363 ||’ anekajātiḥ sādhāraṇo yathā— ‘snātā tiṣṭhati kuntaleśvarasutā vāro 'ṅgarājasvasu- rdyūtai rātririyaṃ jitā kamalayā devī prasādyādya ca | ityantaḥpurasundarī prati mayā vijñāya vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitaṃ nāḍikāḥ || 364 ||’ ananyajānirasādhāraṇo yathā— ‘āvivāhasamayādgṛhe vane śaiśave tadanu yauvane punaḥ | svāpahetura‘anupāśrito 'nyayā’ iti mudrita uttararāmacaritenupāsito 'nyayā rāmabāhurupadhānameṣa te || 365 ||’ ahaṃkārapradhāno dhīroddhato yathā— ‘cakraṃ vā madhuhā ‘kṛtāntagṛhiṇāṃ’ kha﻿kṛtāntagṛhiṇīdattāgrapañcāṅgulaṃ vajraṃ bhūdharapakṣaśoṇitasurāpānonmadaṃ vā vṛṣā | śūlaṃ ‘śūlaṃ cāsura’ khavāsuraraktabindunicitaṃ gṛhṇātu śūlāyudho dhṛṣṭadyumnamahaṃ nihanmi samare kaścitparitrāyatām || 366 ||’ ratyupacārapradhāno dhīralalito yathā— ‘ādhātuṃ vinayaṃ nirāgasi nare kupyantu nāmeśvarā- stena svāśayaśuddhireva sukarā prāyaḥ prabhūṇāṃ puraḥ | mithyāmānini manyase yadi tadā nityaṃ manovartinī dhyātā tāmarasākṣi citrapaṭake‘citraphalake’ ka, ‘cittaphalake’ kha kā vā tvadanyā mayā || 367 ||’ upaśamapradhāno ‘dhīraśānto’ ghadhīrapraśānto yathā— ‘kulamamalinaṃ bhadrā mūrtirmatiḥ śrutiśālinī bhujabalamalaṃ sphītā lakṣmīḥ prabhutvamakhaṇḍitam | prakṛtisubhagā hyete‘hyante’ kha bhāvā madasya ca hetavo vrajati puruṣo yairunmādaṃ ta eva tavāṅkuśāḥ‘navāṅkuśāḥ’ ka kha || 368 ||’ ‘viśravyodārakarmā’ ka, ‘visrabdhadārakarmā’ khavisrabdhodārakarmā dhīrodāttaḥ | sa yathā— ‘kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarapulakaṃ vaktrakamalam | muhuḥ paśyañśrṛṇvanrajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ || 369 ||’ kaitavapradhānaḥ śaṭho yathā— ‘dṛṣṭa‍vaikāsanasaṃsthite priyatame paścādupetyādarādekasyā nayane nimīlya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ | īṣadvakritakandharaḥ sapulakaḥ premollasanmānasāmantarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto 'parāṃ cumbati || 370 ||’ kṛtāparādho 'pyavilakṣo dhṛṣṭo yathā— ‘śataṃ vārānuktaḥ priyasakhi vacobhiḥ sa paruṣaiḥ sahasraṃ nirdhūtaḥ padanipatitaḥ pārṣṇihatibhiḥ | ‘kiyatkṛtvā’ khakiyatkṛtvo baddhāḥ punariha na vedmi bhrukuṭaya- stathāpi kliśyanmāṃ kṣaṇamapi na dhṛṣṭo viramati || 371 ||’ hṛdayaṃgamapravṛttiranukūlo yathā— ‘muñca kopama‘mānaṃ’ khanimittakopane sandhyayā praṇamito 'smi nānyayā | kiṃ na vetsi sahadharmacāriṇaṃ cakravākasamavṛttimātmanaḥ || 372 ||’ auparodhikapravṛttirdakṣiṇo yathā— anena kalyāṇi mṛṇālakomalaṃ vratena gātraṃ glapayasyakāraṇam | prasādamākāṅkṣati yastavotsukaḥ sa kiṃ tvayā dāsajanaḥ prasādyate ||’ nāyikāguṇeṣu sarvaguṇasaṃpadyogāduttamā yathā— hasiāiṃ samaṃsalakomalāiṃ vīsaṃbhakomalaṃ vaaṇaṃ | ‘sabbhāvakomalapulāiaṃ’ ka , ‘sabbhāva komacchapulāiaṃ va’ khasabbhāvakomalaṃ pulaïaṃ ca ṇamimo sumahilāṇaṃ || 374 ||’ [hasitāni samāṃsalakomalāni visrambhakomalaṃ vacanam | sadbhāvakomalaṃ pralokitaṃ ca namāmaḥ sumahilānām ||] pādonaguṇasaṃpadyogānmadhyamā yathā— ‘ṇiadaïadaṃsaṇukkhitta pahia aṇena vaccasu paheṇa | ‘gahavaïhahūā’ khagahavaïbahuā ‘dullaṅghivāurā haa iha ggāmo’ ka, ‘dullaṅghivāudāhaapa iha ggāmo’ khadullaṃghiavāurā iha ggāme‘ihaa ggāme’ gha || 375 ||’ ardhaguṇasaṃpadyogādadhamā yathā— ‘‘takiṃ khaṇa’ khataṃ kira khaṇā virajjasi taṃ kira ‘uvaharasi’ ghauvahasasi ‘alamahilāo’ ka khasaalamahilāo | ehehi vāravālii ‘aṃsūmaïmalaṃ’ ka khaaṃsū maïlaṃ samuppisimo‘samuppisio’ kha, ‘samuppusimo’ gha || 376 ||’ [tvaṃ kila kṣaṇādvirajyase tvaṃ kilopahasasi sakalamahilāḥ | ehyehi vārapālike aśru malinaṃ samutproñchāmaḥ ||] vayaḥkauśalābhyāmasaṃpūrṇā mugdhā yathā— ‘sahiāhiṁ bhaṇṇamāṇā thaṇae laggaṃ kusuṃbhapupphaṃ‘laggakumbhapupputi’ kha tti | ‘muddhabahūā’ khamuddhabahuā hasijjaï papphoḍaṃtī ṇahavaāiṃ || 377 ||’ [sakhībhirbhaṇyamānā stane lagnaṃ kusumbhapuṣpamiti | mugdhavadhūkā hasyate prasphoṭayantī nakhapadāni ||] vayasā paripūrṇā madhyamā yathā— ‘paḍivakkhamaṇṇuuṃje‘maṇṇupuñje’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘maṇṇuuḍe’ ka, ‘mattaüje’ kha lāvaṇṇaüḍe‘lāvasaüde’ kha aṇaṃgagaakumbhe‘aṇaṅgaakumbha’ kha | purisasaahiaadharie kīsa thaṇaṃtī thaṇe vahasi || 378 ||’ [pratipakṣamanyupuñjau lāvaṇyapuṭāvanaṅgagajakumbhau | puruṣaśatahṛdayadhṛtau kimiti stanantī stanau vahasi ||] vayaḥkauśalābhyāṃ saṃpūrṇā pragalbhā yathā— ‘‘khiṇṇassa ure païṇo ṭhatrei’ gāthāsapta॰khiṇṇassa ‘ṭhaveiü païṇo’ ka, ‘vaceira païṇo’ khaṭhavei ure païṇo gimhāvaraṇharamiassa‘gimhāvaraṇaharaṇamiassa’ kha | ollaṃ galantaüpphaṃ‘galantakusumaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ṇhaṇasuandhaṃ ciurabhāram || 379 ||’ [khinnasya sthāpayatyurasi patyurgrīṣmāparāhṇaramitasya | ārdre galatkusumaṃ snānasugandhaṃ cikurabhāram ||] yatnāpaneyamānā dhīrā yathā— ‘ṇa vi taha aṇālavaṃtī hiaaṃ dūnei māṇiṇī ahiam‘hiaam’ ka | ‘jaï’ ghajaha ‘dūre viamhia’ ka, ‘dūraviamhia’ ga gha, ‘dūre viamia’ khadūraviambhia‘garūa’ khagaruarosamajjhatthabhaṇiehiṃ || 380 ||’ [nāpi tathānālapantī hṛdayaṃ dunoti māninyadhikam | yathā dūravijṛmbhitakaroṣamadhyasthabhaṇitaiḥ ||] ‘yatnāpaneyamānā 'dhīrā’ gha, ‘ayatnāpaneyamānā dhīrā’ ga, ‘ayatnāpaneyamānā 'dhīrā’ ka kha, ‘apalāyane 'pamānā 'dhīrā’ iti, evaṃ prathame 'pi bhede 'palāyane 'pamānā dhīrā’ itiayatnāpaneyamānā 'dhīrā yathā— ‘avalaṃbiamāṇaparaṃmuhīa‘parammuhīe’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘ta etassa’ khaeṃtassa māṇiṇi piassa | ‘puṭṭha’ gāthāsapta॰ | ‘puṭhṭhi pulagāmo’ khapuṭṭhipulaüggamo tuha kahei ‘saṃmuhaṭhiaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰saṃmuhaṭṭhiaṃ hiaaṃ || 381 ||’ [avalambitamānaparāṅbhukhyā āgacchato mānini priyasya | pṛṣṭhapulakodgamaste kathayati saṃmukhasthitaṃ hṛdayam ||] ātmīyā svā yathā— ‘dhariṇīa‘ghariṇīe’ ka kha gāthāsapta॰ mahāṇasakammalaggamasimaliieṇa‘masimaïleṇa’ ka kha hattheṇa | chittaṃ muhaṃ hasijjaï caṃdāvatthaṃ gaaṃ païṇā‘gaa païṇa’ ka, ‘gaha païṇā’ kha || 382 ||’ [gṛhiṇyā mahānasakarmalagnamalinitena hastena | spṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ hasyate candrāvasthāṃ gataṃ patyā ||] parakīyānyadīyā yathā— ‘vaïvivaraṇiggaadalo eraṇḍo‘eraṇṇo’ ka, ‘eraṇo’ kha sāhaïvva‘sāhaïvva’ ka taruṇāṇaṃ | ettha ghare haliavahū eddahamettatthaṇī vasaï || 383 ||’ [vṛtivivaranirgatadala eraṇḍaḥ sādhayatīva taruṇebhyaḥ | atra gṛhe hālikavadhūretāvanmātrastanī vasati ||] pāṇigṛhītā ụ̄dhā yathā— ‘‘balattaṇa’ khabālattaṇadullaliāe ajja aṇajjaṃ kaaṃ ṇavavahūe | ‘ābhā (bhāā?) mi’ khabhāāmi ghare eāiṇitti‘eāiṇi vi’ kha ṇiṃto‘ṇitto’ ka kha paī ruddho || 384 ||’ [bālatvadurlalitayādya anārye kṛtaṃ navavadhvā | bibhemi gṛhe ekākinīti niryan patī ruddhaḥ ||] anụ̄dhā kumārī yathā— ‘kassa karo bahupuṇṇaphalekkataruṇo tuhaṃ ‘ṇisammihii’ ka kha, ‘ṇisimmihii’ ga gha, ‘visammihaï’ gāthāsapta॰visimmihii | thaṇapariṇāhe mammahaṇihāṇakalaso vva‘ṇihāṇakalasovva’ ga ‘pārohe’ ka kha ga gha, ‘nidhānakalasevva pāroho’ iti gāthāsapta॰ pāṭhaḥpāroho || 385 ||’ [kasya karo bahupuṇyaphalaikatarostava viśramiṣyati | stanapariṇāhe manmathanidhānakalśa iva prarohaḥ ||] prathamọdhā jyeṣṭhā yathā— ‘paṇaaṃ ‘upaṇaaṃ’ ka , ‘upaṇaaṃ paṇaaṃ’ khapaḍhamapiāe ‘rakkhina(u?) kāmo vi mahurerhi’ karakkhiukāmo vi ‘madhuramadhurerhi’ kha , ‘mahuramahurehi’ ga ghamahuramahurehiṃ | ‘ccheāvaro’ khacheavaro ‘viṇalijjaï’ ka khaviṇaḍijjaï ahiṇavabahu‘ahiṇavabahūā’ khaāvilāsehiṃ || 386 ||’ [praṇayaṃ prathamapriyāyā rakṣitukāmo 'pi madhuramadhuraiḥ | chekavaraḥ sukhāyate 'bhinavavadhūkāvilāsaiḥ ||] paścādụ̄dhā kanīyasī yathā— ‘mahārambhatthaṇae’ kha‘uṭṭhantamahārambhe thaṇae ‘iṭṭeṇa’ khadaṭṭhūṇa muddhavahuāe‘muddhabahūāe’ kha | ‘osiṇṇa’ ka, ‘osiṇa’ khaosaṇṇakavolāe ṇīsasiaṃ paḍhamaghariṇīe || 387 ||’ [uttiṣṭhanmahārambhau stanakau dṛṣṭa‍vā mugdhavadhvāḥ | avasannakapolayā niḥśvasitaṃ prathamagṛhiṇyā ||] ahaṃkārarddhiruddhatā yathā— ‘aṇṇamahilāpasaṃgaṃ de deva‘dai dekka’ ka, ‘de dekka’ kha, ‘de devva’ gha karesu amha daïassa‘daraassa’ ka | purisā ekkaṃtarasā‘ekatarassa’ kha ṇa hu dosaguṇe viāṇaṃti || 388 ||’ [anyamahilāprasaṅgaṃ he deva kurvasmākaṃ dayitasya | puruṣā ekāntarasā na khalu doṣaguṇau vijānanti ||] gūḍhamānarddhirudāttā yathā— ‘‘jāṇāi’ kajāṇaï jāṇāveuṃ ‘aṇuṇaaviddaviamāṇaparisesaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘anunayavidrāvitamānapariśeṣam’ iti cchāyā ca; ‘vihīṇarīamāṇaparisesaṃ’ kaaṇuṇaavihurīamāṇaparisesaṃ | ‘aïrikkami vi’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘vijane 'pi’ iti cchāyā ca | atha ca tatra 'païrikaśabdo 'tirikte païrikketi vijane deśīti kecit | tadā ‘païrikkami vi’ iti pāṭhaḥ | vijane 'pītyarthaḥ’ iti kulabāladevaḥraïvikkamammi viṇaāvalaṃbaṇaṃ sa ccia kuṇantī‘paṅkuṇantī’ ka || 389 ||’ [jānāti jñāpayitumanunayavidhuritamānapariśeṣam | rativikrame vinayāvalambanaṃ saiva kurvantī ||] nirvāṇamānā‘nirviṇṇamānā’ ka kha śāntā yathā— ‘jaïā pio ṇa dīsaï bhaṇaha halā kassa kīrae māṇo | aha diṭṭhammi‘diummi’ ka vi māṇo tā tassa piattaṇaṃ katto‘kaṃso’ ka, ‘kanto’ kha || 390 ||’ [yadā priyo na dṛśyate bhaṇata halā kasya kriyate mānaḥ | atha dṛṣṭe 'pi mānastattasya priyatvaṃ kutaḥ ||] ślāghanīyamānā lalitā yathā— ‘hasiehiṁ uvālaṃbhā ‘acchavaārehi’ khaaccuvaārehiṁ rūsiavvāiṃ | ‘asūi’ khaaṃsūhi ‘bhaṇḍāi’ kabhaṃḍaṇāhiṃ eso maggo ‘maṇṇe’ kasumahilāṇaṃ || 391 ||’ [hasitairupālambhā atyupacārai rūṣitavyāni | aśrubhiḥ kalahā eṣa mārgaḥ sumahilānām ||] aniyatānekopabhogyā sāmānyā yathā— ‘‘kaṃḍūe’ ka, ‘kaḍae’ khakaḍue ‘dhūmaṅghāre’ ka, ‘dhūmaghāre’ khadhūmaṃdhāre ‘adbhuttaṇamaggiṇo’ ka, ‘abbhuttaṇamāgāṇo’ khaabbhuttaṇamaggiṇo ‘samappahii’ ghasamappihii | muhakamalacuṃbaṇalehalammi ‘āsatthie’ ka khapāsaṭṭhie diare || 392 ||’ [kaṭuke dhūmāndhakāre 'bhyuttejanamagneḥ samāpsyate | mukhakamalacumbanābhilāṣiṇi pārśvasthite devare ||] patyantaraṃ prāptā punarpbhūryathā— ‘mayena nirmitāṃ padyametat ka nāsti | atha ca ‘taha sā jāṇaï’ ityādigāthātrodāharaṇatvena vartate ‘ātmacchandā svairiṇī yathā’ ityetadīyāvataraṇikāpi nāstyeva | ‘laṅkāṃ labdhvā’ khalabdhvā laṅkāṃ mandodarīmapi | reme mūrtāṃ daśagrīvalakṣmīmiva vibhīṣaṇaḥ || 393 ||’ ātmacchandā svairiṇī yathā— ‘taha sā jāṇaṃi ‘jārā’ khapāvā loe ‘pacchaṇṇām’ khapacchaṇṇamaviṇaaṃ kāum‘kāram’ kha | jaha paḍhamaṃ cia saccia‘saccia’ kha nāsti ‘lii’ kalikkhaï majjhe carittavaṃtīṇa || 394 ||’ [tathā sā jānāti pāpā loke pracchannamavinayaṃ kartum | yathā prathamameva saiva lekhyate madhye caritravatīnām‘carittavattīṇa’ ka, ‘carittavatīṇa’ kha ||] kalācatuḥṣaṣṭivid gaṇikā yathā— ‘sachandaramaṇadaṃsaṇarasavaḍ̣dhiagaruavammahavilāsaṃ | ‘suviạdhḍhasavevita’ ka, ‘suviaṭṭhavesavāṇi’ khasuviaḍḍhavesavaṇiāramiaṃ ko vaṇṇiuṃ taraï || 395 ||’ [svacchandaramaṇadarśanarasavardhitagurukamanmathavilāsam | suvidagdhaveṣavanitāramitaṃ ko varṇituṃ śaknoti ||] rūpayauvanamātropajīvinī rūpājīvā yathā— ‘ayameva dahyamānasmaranirgatadhūmavartikākāraḥ | cikurabharastava sundari kāmijanaṃ rkikarīkurute || 396 ||’ kuṭṭamitādīnāṃ kartrī vilāsinī yathā— ‘sāmaṇṇasundarīṇaṃ vibbhamamāvahaï aviṇao ccea | dhūma ccia pajjaliāṇaṃ bahu mao surahidārūṇa || 397 ||’ [sāmānyasundarīṇāṃ vibhramamāvahatyavinaya eva | dhūṃma eva prajvālitānāṃ bahu mataḥ surabhidārūṇām ||] yathoktalakṣaṇāsu khaṇḍitā yathā— ‘‘paccūsāgaa raṃjitadeha piāloa loaṇāṇaṃda’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘pratyūṣāgata rañjitadeha priyāloka locanānanda’ iti cchāyā ca | atha ‘pratyūṣāgatto dvīpāntarāt, pakṣe mahilāntarāvasathāt | anuraktadehaḥ svabhāvataḥ, pakṣe tadaṅgasaṃgatakuṅgumādinā | trailokyalocanānanda, atha ca strīlokalocanānanda | anyatra dvīpāntare, pakṣe nāyikāntaragṛhe kṣapitaśarvarīka | nabhobhūṣaṇa, pakṣe parastrīdattanakhabhūṣaṇa | bhāsvāniva dūrādevābhivandanīyastvaṃ na tvabhigamya iti ṭīkānirgalitārthaḥ | ‘paccasāgaaṇuravāavattaṃ taïloaloaṇāṇandam’ ka , ‘paccasāgaaṇuratāavattaṃ taïloaloṇāṇanda’ khapaccūsāgaaṇurattadeha taïloaloṇāṇanda | aṇṇatthakhaviasavvaria ṇahabhūsaṇa diṇavaï‘vaï’ kha ṇamo de || 398 ||’ [pratyūṣāgatānuraktadeha trailokyalocanānanda | anyatrakṣapitaśarvarīka nabhobhūṣaṇa dinapate namaste ||] kalahāntaritā yathā— ‘aha so vilakkhahiao mae ‘ahavvāeṁ agahiāṇuṇao’ gāthāsapta॰ ‘abhavyayā agṛhītānunayaḥ’ iti cchāyā ca, ‘ahavāi’ ga ghaahavvāi agaṇiappaṇao | paravajjaṇaccirīhiṁ tumhehiṁ uvekkhio jaṃ(jeṃ)to‘ṇeṃto’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘niryan’ iti cchāyā ca, ‘janto’ ka, ‘jeto’ kha || 399 ||’ [atha sa vilakṣahṛdayo mayā bhavyayāgaṇitapraṇayaḥ | paravādyanartanaśīlābhiryuṣmābhirupekṣito gacchan ||] vipralabdhā yathā— ‘aha sā tahiṃ tahiṃ vvia‘cia’ ka ga gha, ‘via’ kha, ‘vvia’ iti gāthāsapta॰ vāṇīravaṇammi ‘cukkasaṃkeo’ kacukkasaṃkeā | tuha daṃsaṇaṃ vimaggaï‘viaggaï’ ka, ‘vimāgaï’ kha pabbhaṭṭhaṇihāṇaṭhāṇaṃ va‘nihaṇaṭāṇava’ ka, ‘nihāṃṇaṭhāṇāvva’ kha || 400 ||’ [atha sā tatra tatraiva vānīravane vismṛtasaṃketā | tava darśanaṃ vimārgati prabhraṣṭanidhānasthānamiva ||] vāsakasajjā yathā— ‘ehii pio tti ṇimisaṃ va jaggiaṃ jāmiṇīa paḍhamaddhaṃ | sesaṃ saṃtāvaparavvasāe barisaṃ ba bolīṇam || 401 ||’ [eṣyati priya iti nimiṣamiva jāgṛtaṃ yāminyāḥ prathamārdham | śeṣaṃ saṃtāpaparavaśayā varṣamiva vyatikrāntam ||] svādhīnapatikā yatha— ‘sāloe ccia‘vvia’ iti gāthāsapta॰ sūre ghariṇī gharasāmiassa ghettūṇa | ṇecchaṃtassa vi pāe dhuaï‘dhuaï’ ka kha hasaṃtī hasaṃtassa || 402 ||’ [sāloka eva sūrye gṛhiṇī gṛhasvāmino gṛhītvā | necchato 'pi pādau dhāvati hasantī hasataḥ ||] abhisārikā yathā— ‘gammihisi ‘gammahisi’ ka, ‘rammihisi tassa ṇaṃ saṃmāra sūrasu’ khatassa pāsaṃ mā ‘jhūrasu’ ka, ‘sundari mā turaa’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘sundarimā tvarasva’ iti ca cchāyājūrasu taruṇi vaḍḍhaü‘vaṭṭhaü’ kha miaṃko | ‘ule duddhammi vaha’ khaduddhe duddhambhiva‘mia’ iti hāthāsapta॰ caṃdiāe‘candiāi’ gāthāsapta॰ ko pecchaï‘pecchāi’ ka muhaṃ de || 403 ||’ [gamiṣyasi tasya pārśvaṃ mā khidyasva taruṇi vardhatāṃ mṛgāṅka | dugdhe dugdhamiva candrikāyāṃ kaḥ prekṣate mukhaṃ te ||] proṣitabhartṛkā yathā— ‘gimhe ‘davagga’ ga ghadavaggimasimaïliāiṁ dīsaṃti ‘vijjha’ gāthāsapta॰viṃjhasiharāiṃ | ‘āsaü’ ka khaāsasu paütthavaïe ṇa hoṃti ṇavapāusabbhāiṃ || 404 ||’ [griṣme dāvāgnimaṣīmalinitāni dṛśyante vindhyaśikharāṇi | āśvasihi proṣitapatike na bhavanti navaprāvṛḍabhrāṇi ||] virahotkaṇṭhitā yathā— ‘asmin varṣamahe na vartata idaṃ yatkāmadevotsave stheyaṃ putri nirannayā tadadhunā kiṃcinmukhe dīyatām | ityuke jaratījanena kathamapyadhvanyavadhvā tataḥ paryaste 'hani kalpitaśca kavalo dhautaśva ‘dhārāmbubhiḥ’ ka khadhārāśrubhiḥ || 405 ||’ hīnapātreṣu śakāro yathā— ‘‘jadicchaśe’ iti Bombay Sanskrit Series mudrite mṛcchakaṭike | ‘paliśca le’ gā, ‘paliṃśca le’ ghapalicca le ‘lambadaśāviśālaṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭikelaṃbadaśākalāaṃ pāvālaaṃ ‘śuttaśadehiṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭikeśuttaśadeṇa ‘juttaṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike, ‘chatram’ ka khachattaṃ | maṃśaṃ ca khāduṃ‘khāduṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike kha ‘taha tuṣṭi kāduṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike, ‘tuha tuṭṭi kāduṃ’ khatuha oṭṭhakāṃhiṁ cuṃkuścakuścucukuścukuṃti‘cuhū cuhū cukku cuhū cuhūtti’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike || 406 ||’ [pratīccha re lambadaśākalāpaṃ pravārakaṃ sūtraśatena channam | māṃsaṃ ca khādituṃ tava oṣṭhakābhyāṃ cukuścukuścukkucukuścukuṃti ||] lalako yathā— ‘‘kaṃbalivāṇṇie’ ka, ‘kaṃbalavāṇie’ kha, kaṃbalavālie’ vakaṃbalivālie kaṃtti‘katti’ ka kha ‘kuṭṭaṃmaladanti’ ka khakuḍammaladanti dhiddhiluddhie‘tuddhie’ ka kha maïveālasi | lattiṃsovari ‘jaggirikka’ ka khajaggiri tuma sahiṃ kharāvidupopphali‘pupphali’ kha ṇa lekīsi‘lokī’ ka kha ṇa āgasi || 407 ||’ [. . . . . . . . . . . . . | . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . ||] amātyādirādirāsanārhaḥ pāṣaṇḍādirvā pīṭhamardaḥ | tayoramātyeṣu mālyavān yathā— ‘hā vatsāḥ kharadūṣaṇatriśiraso vadhyāḥ stha pāpasya me hā hā vatsa vibhīṣaṇa tvamapi me kāryeṇa heyaḥ ‘sthiteḥ’ iti mudrite mahāvīracaritesthitaḥ | hā madvatsala vatsa rāvaṇa mahatpaśyāmi te saṃkaṭaṃ vatse kaikasi‘naikaśi’ ka, ‘naikaṣi’ ga, ‘naikapi’ gha hā hatāsi ‘na cirāt’ iti mudrite vīracaritena ciraṃ trīnputrakāndrakṣyasi 408’ pāṣaṇḍeṣu bhairavānando yathā— ‘daṃsemi taṃ pi ‘dasiṇaṃ’ khasasiṇaṃ vasuhāvaïṇṇaṃ‘vasuhāvaīṇaṃ’ kha thambhemi tassa vi raïssa‘radassa gaī’ ka kha, ‘ravissa rahaṃ’ iti ca kāvyamālāmudritakarpūramañjaryām rahaṃ ṇahaddhe | āṇemi jakkhasurasiddhagaṇaṃgaṇāo taṃ ṇatthi bhūmivalae‘bhūmivalaye’ ka maha jaṃ ṇa ‘sajjam’ ka kha mudritakarpūramañjaryāṃ casajjham || 409 ||’ [darśayāmi tamapi śaśinaṃ vasudhāvatīrṇaṃ stabhnāmi tasyāpi rave rathaṃ nabho 'rdhe | ānayāmi yakṣasurasiddhagaṇāṅganāstannāsti bhūmivalaye mama yanna sādhyam ||] vaihāsikaḥ krīḍanako viśvāsyaśca vidūṣakaḥ | yathā— ‘phullukkaraṃ kalamakūrasamaṃ vahaṃti je siṃduvāraviḍavā maha vallahā de | je gālidassa mahisīdahiṇo saricchā ‘te kiṃ ca’ Harvard Oriental Series mudritāyāṃ karpūramañjaryām, kāvyamālāmudritāyāṃ caruccaṃti muddhaviaïllapasūṇapuṃjā || 410 ||’ [puṣpotkaraṃ kalamabhaktasamaṃ vahanti ye sinduvāraviṭapā mama vallabhāste | ye gālitasya mahiṣīdadhnaḥ sadṛkṣā rocante mugdhavicakilaprasūnapuñjāḥ ||] mānyaḥ kalatravānbhuktavibhavo guṇavānviṭaḥ || 170 || sa yathā— ‘śakāra kiṃ prārthanayā prāvāreṇāmiṣeṇa vā‘prāvāreṇa miṣeṇa vā’ ka, ‘prāvāreṇāmiṣeṇa vā’ gha | ‘ākāryavarjaṃ’ gaakāryavarjaṃ me brūhi kimabhīṣṭaṃ ‘karoti’ ga karomi te || 411 ||’ dhātreyakādiśceṭo yathā— ‘candrāpīḍo 'tha saṃjātapīḍaḥ kādambarīṃ prati | prāhiṇotsrastakeyūraḥ keyūrakamupasthitam || 412 ||’ patākāsu— svātmopayoginyanyopayoginyanupayoginī | patāketyāpatāketi prakarīti prakīrtyate || 171 || tāsu patākā hanūmān yathā— ‘diṣṭyā so 'yaṃ mahābāhurañjanānandavardhanaḥ | yasya vīryeṇa kṛtino vayaṃ ca bhuvanāni ca || 413 ||’ āpatākāprakaryau mārīcajaṭāyuṣau yathā— ‘rakṣasā mṛgarūpeṇa vañcayitvā sa rāghavau | jahāra sītāṃ pakṣīndraprayāsakṣaṇavighnitaḥ || 414 ||’ sahajā pūrvajāgantuḥ sakhīha trividhocyate | tāsu lavāṅgikādiḥ sahajā yathā— ‘ujjvalālokayā snigdhā tvayā tyaktā na rājate | malīmasamukhī vartiḥ pradīpaśikhayā yathā || 415 ||’ kāmandakyādiḥ pūrvajā yathā— ‘tathā vinayanamrāpi ‘yathā’ khamayā mālatyupāyataḥ | nītā ‘katipayāhena’ Dr, R. G. Bhandarkar mudrite mālatīmādhavekatipayāhobhiḥ sakhī visrambhasevyatām || 416 ||’ trijaṭādirāganturyathā— ‘jāṇaï siṇehabhaṇiaṃ mā raaṇiaritti me ‘jaüchase’ ghajuucchasu vaaṇam | ujjāṇammi ‘vaṇimmi’ kavaṇammi a jaṃ surahiṃ taṃ laāṇa ‘geṇhaï’ kāvyamālāmudrite setubandhegheppaï kusumaṃ 417’ [jānaki snehabhaṇitaṃ mā rajanīcarīti me jugupsasva vacanam | udyāne vane ca yatsurabhi tallatānāṃ gṛhyate kusumam ||] nāyakaguṇeṣu mahākulīnatvaṃ puṃso yathā— ‘vāsiṣṭhaiḥ sukṛtonadbhavo 'dhvaraśatairastyagnikuṇḍodbhavo bhūpālaḥ paramāra ityadhipatiḥ saptābdhikāñcerbhuvaḥ | adyāpyadbhutaharṣagadgadagiro gāyanti yasyedbhaṭaṃ viśvāmitrajayorjitasya bhujayorvisphūrjitaṃ gurjarāḥ‘gūrjarāḥ’ ga gha || 418 ||’ audāryaṃ yathā— ‘diṅmātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate siddhā ‘sātha’ ga ghasāpi vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paśyata | viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo yasmādāvirabhūtkathādbhutamidaṃ yatraiva‘yannaiva’ ka cāstaṃ gatam || 419 ||’ mahābhāgyaṃ yathā— ‘‘drāṅ’ mudrite mahāvīracaritedorniṣpeṣaviśīrṇavajraśakalapratyuptarūḍhavraṇa- granthyudbhāsini bhagnamoghamaghavanmātaṅgadantodyame | bharturnandanadevatāviracitasragdāmni bhūmeḥ sutā vīraśrīriva tasya vakṣasi jagadvīrasya viśrāmyatu || 420 ||’ kṛtajñatā yathā— ‘kṛtakakupitairbāṣpāmbhobhiḥ sadainyavilokitai- rvanamasi gatā yasya prītyā dhṛtāpi tathāmbayā | navajalasadharaśyāmāḥ paśyandiśo bhavatīṃ vinā kaṭhinahṛdayo jīvatyeva priye sa kava priyaḥ || 421 ||’ rūpasaṃpad yathā— ‘vyụ̄dhorasko vṛṣaskandhaḥ śālaprāṃśurmahābhujaḥ | ātmakarmakṣamaṃ dehaṃ kṣāttro dharma ivāśritaḥ‘ivāsthitaḥ’ ga || 422 ||’ yauvanasaṃpad yathā— ‘mahokṣatāṃ vatsataraḥ spṛśānniva dvipendrabhāvaṃ kalabhaḥ śrayanniva | raghuḥ kramādyauvanabhinnaśaiśavaḥ pupoṣa gambhīramanoharaṃ vapuḥ || 423 ||’ vaidagdhyasaṃpad yathā— ‘ko 'yaṃ bhāmini bhūṣaṇaṃ kitava te śoṇaḥ kathaṃ kuṅkumā- tkūrpāsāntaritaḥ priye vinimayaḥ paśyāparaṃ ‘kāsti’ khakvāsti me | paśyāmītyabhidhāya sāndrapulakau mṛdnanmṛḍānyāḥ stanau hastena pratinirjitenduravatādda‍yūte hasanvo haraḥ || 424 ||’ śīlasaṃpad yathā— ‘kā tvaṃ śubhe kasya parigraho vā kiṃ vā madabhyāgamakāraṇaṃ te | ācakṣva matvā vaśināṃ raghūṇāṃ manaḥ parastrīvimukhapravṛtti || 425 ||’ saubhāgyasaṃpad yathā— ‘asau vidyādhāraḥ śiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanādihāyātaḥ saṃpratyavikalaśaraccandramadhuraḥ | yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva || 426 ||’ mānitā yathā— ‘yadāttha kāmaṃ bhavatā sa yācyatā- miti kṣamaṃ naitadanalpacetasām | kathaṃ prasahyāharaṇaiṣiṇāṃ priyāḥ ‘parānavatyā’ śrīmatpitṛcaraṇasaṃpādite kirātārjunīyeparānuvṛttyā malinīkṛtāḥ śriyaḥ || 427 ||’ udāravākyatvaṃ yathā— ‘‘jñātā’ mudrite mahāvīracaritekhyātā eva vayaṃ jagatsu caritairvāgbhiḥ kimākhyāyate saṃyatto bhava ‘satyamasti’ mudrite vīracariteśaktirasti bhavataḥ satyaṃ manuṣyo bhavān | śastrairavyavadhīyamānayaśasaḥ‘vijayāḥ’ mudrite vīracarite prāyo vayaṃ teṣu ce- tprāhuste nanu santi‘grāhaste sukhamāśvasanti’ mudrite vīracarite te 'pi girayo yairvānarāḥ śastriṇaḥ || 428’ sthirānurāgitā yathā— ‘tataḥ kairapyukte pariṇayavidhau kāṣṭhamunibhiḥ purāṇairataṅkaglapitahṛdayena kṣitibhṛtā | vinā vācaṃ naitatkṣamamiti‘kṣapayati’ kha nidhāyānanamadhaḥ patadbāṣpāmbhobhirnikhilamiva dattaṃ prativacaḥ || 429 ||’ nāyikāguṇeṣu striyā mahākulinatā yathā— ‘‘mānuṣībhyaḥ’ khamānuṣīṣu kathaṃ vā syādasya rūpasya saṃbhavaḥ | na prabhātaralaṃ jyotirudeti vasudhātalāt || 430 ||’ audāryaṃ yathā— ‘‘bhrabhaṅge’ mudritaratnāvalyāmbhrūbhede sahasodgate 'pi‘sahasā kṛte 'pi’ ka vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā- mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram | antarbāṣpajalīkṛtaṃ‘antarbāṣpajaḍīkṛtaṃ’ kha, mudritaratnāvalyāṃ ca prabhutayā cakṣurna visphāritaṃ kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā muktaśca na ‘pratyayaḥ’ khapratyayaḥ || 431 ||’ mahābhāgyaṃ yathā— ‘tāṃ nāradaḥ kāmacaraḥ kadācitkanyāṃ kila prekṣya pituḥ samīpe | samādideśaikavadhūṃ bhavitrīṃ premṇā śarīrārdhaharāṃ harasya || 432 ||’ kṛtajñatā yathā— ‘purisasarisaṃ tuha imaṃ rakkhasasarisaṃ ‘kiaṃ’ ghakaaṃ ṇisāaravaïṇā | kaha tā ‘ācintijjaṃ’ ka khaciṃtijjaṃtaṃ‘cintiasulahaṃ’ iti kāvyamālāmudrite setubandhe mahilāsarisaṃ ṇa saṃpaḍaï me maraṇaṃ || 433 ||’ [puruṣasadṛśaṃ tavedaṃ rākṣasasadṛśaṃ kṛtaṃ niśācarapatinā | kathaṃ tāvaccintitasulabhaṃ mahilāsadṛśaṃ na saṃpadyate me maraṇam ||] rūpasaṃpad yathā— ‘ābharaṇasyābharaṇaṃ prasādhanavidheḥ prasādhanaviśeṣaḥ | upamānasyāpi sakhe pratyupamānaṃ vapustasyāḥ || 434 ||’ yauvanasaṃpad yathā— ‘unmīlitaṃ tūlikayeva citraṃ sūryāṃśubhirbhinnamivāravindam | babhūva tasyāścaturasraśobhi vapurvibhaktaṃ navayauvanena || 435 ||’ vaidagdhyasaṃpad yathā— ‘ekatrāsanasaṃsthitiḥ parihṛtā pratyudgamāddūrata- ‘tāmbūlāharaṇacchalena’ gha, kāvyamālāmudrite 'maruśatake castāmbūlānayanacchalena rabhasāśleṣo 'pi saṃvighnitaḥ | ālāpo 'pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayantyāntike kāntaṃ ‘pratyupakārataḥ’ khapratyupacārataścaturayā kopaḥ kṛtārthīkṛtaḥ || 436 ||’ śīlasampad yathā— ‘‘caturaghariṇī’ ka kha, ‘catvaraghariṇī’ ga, ‘catvaragharaṇī’ gha, ‘cattaraghariṇī’ ca gāthāsapta॰cattaraghariṇī piadaṃsaṇā a ‘taruṇī’ gāthāsapta॰bālā paütthavaïā‘paütthapaïā’ gāthāsapta॰ a | ‘asaïsaaṇṇaā’ ka, ‘asara(i)saajjiā’ kha, ‘asaīsapajjiā' gāthāsapta॰asaī saajjhiā duggaā a ṇa hu khaṃḍiaṃ sīlam || 437 ||’ [catvaragṛhiṇī priyadarśanā ca bālā proṣitapatikā ca | asatī prativeśinī durgatā ca na khalu khaṇḍitaṃ śīlam ||] saubhāgyasampad yathā— ‘saṃcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā | narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ || 438 ||’ mānitā yathā— ‘śailātmajāpi piturucchiraso 'bhilāṣaṃ vyarthaṃ samarthya lalitaṃ vapurātmanaśca | sakhyoḥ samakṣamiti cādhikajātalajjā śūnyā jagāma bhavanābhimukhaṃ kathaṃcit || 439 ||’ udāravākyatvaṃ yathā— ‘yathā śrutaṃ vedavidāṃ vara tvayā jano 'yamuccaiḥ padalaṅghanotsukaḥ | tapaḥ kiledaṃ tadavāptisādhanaṃ manorathānāmagatirna vidyate || 440 ||’ sthirānurāgitā yathā— ‘alaṃ vivādena yathā śrutaṃ tvayā‘śrutastvayā’ iti mudrite kumārasaṃbhave tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ | mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate || 441 ||’ pākabhaktiṣu ādāvasvādu, ante svādu mṛdvīkāpākaṃ yathā— ‘prākkāmaṃ dahatā kṛtaḥ paribhavo yenātha ‘saṃdhyānataḥ’ khasaṃdhyāvatau serṣyā vo 'vatu caṇḍikā caraṇayostaṃ pātayantī patim | ‘kurvantyabhyadhikaṃ’ khakurvantyābhyadhikaṃ kṛte pratikṛtaṃ muktena maulau muhu- ‘bāṣpeṇādṛtakajjalena’ itirbāṣpeṇāhṛtakajjalena likhitaṃ lakṣmeva candre yathā || 442’ || ādyantayoḥ svādu nārikelīpākaṃ‘nārikelīrītipāko’ ka, ‘nārikelīpākaṃ’ gha yathā— ‘jaha icchā taha ramiaṃ jāā pattā ‘padaṃ’ khapaïṃ gaā dhūā | gharasāmiassa‘gharasāmiassa assa’ kha ajja vi ‘sokoūhachāi aïm' ka, ‘sokouhacchāi acchīi’ kha sakouhallāiṁ acchīiṃ || 443 ||’ [yathecchā tathā ramitaṃ jāyā prāptā patiṃ gatā duhitā | gṛhasvāmino 'dyāpi sakautūhalānyakṣīṇi ||] ādimadhyānteṣu svādu svādutaraṃ svādutamamityāmrapākaṃ yathā— ‘śāpādasi pratihatā smṛtiloparūkṣe‘smṛtirodharūkṣe’ iti mudrite śākuntale bhartaryapetatamasi‘bharturvyapetatamasi’ ka prabhutā tavaiva | chāyā na mūrcchati malopahataprasāde śuddhe tu darpaṇatale sulabhāvakāśā || 444 ||’ yannāpaiti na cātiśobhate tannīlīrāgaṃ yathā— ‘‘sītāṃ hitvā’ S. P. Pandit M. A. saṃpādite raghuvaṃśehītvā sītāṃ daśamukharipurnopayeme yadanyāṃ tasyā evaṃ pratikṛtisakho yatkratūnājahāra | vṛttāntena śravaṇaviṣayaprāpiṇā tena bhartuḥ sā ‘durvāraṃ kathamapi’ kha mudrite raghuvaṃśe cadurvāravyathamapi parityāgaduḥkhaṃ viṣehe || 445 ||’ ‘yadapaiti na ca śobhate ca’ kayadapaiti ca śobhate ca tatkusumbharāgaṃ yathā— ‘vahuvallahassa jā hoi vallahā kaha vi paṃcadiahāiṃ | sā kiṃ chaṭṭhaṃ ‘maggaī’ gāthāsapta॰maggaï katto ‘miṭhṭhaṃ a’ iti gāthāsapta॰miṭṭhaṃ ca bahuaṃ ca‘bahuaa’ iti gāthāsapta॰ || 446 ||’ [bahuvallabhasya yā bhavati vallabhā kathaṃ kathamapi paścadivasāni | sā kiṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ mārgate kuto mṛṣṭaṃ ca bahukaṃ ca ||] ‘yannāpaiti api ca śobhate’ khayannāpaityati ca śobhate tanmañjiṣṭhārāgaṃ yathā— ‘vevaï jassa saviḍiaṃ valiuṃ mahaï pulaāiatthaṇaalasaṃ | pemmasahāvavimuhiaṃ ‘vīāvāsagamaṇūsuaṃ’ iti kāvyamālāmudrite setubandhe, ‘dvitīyāvakāśagamanotsukaṃ iti cchāyā cavīovāsagamaṇūsuaṃ vāmaddham || 447 ||’ [vepate yasya savrīḍaṃ valituṃ vāñchati pulakāñcitastanakalaśam | premasvabhāvavimuktaṃ dvitīyapārśvagamanotsukaṃ vāmārdham ||] gūḍhavyalīkamantarvyājaṃ yathā— ‘pratyagrojjhitagokulasya śayanādutsvapnamūḍhasya me sā gotraskhalanādapaitu ca divā rādheti bhīroriti | rātrāvasvapato divā ca vijane ‘nāmeti cābhyasyatā rādhāṃ॰’ kalakṣmīti cābhyasyato rādhāṃ prasmarataḥ śriyaṃ ramayataḥ khedo hareḥ pātu vaḥ 448’ agūḍhavyalīkaṃ bahirvyājaṃ yathā— ‘cakṣuryasya tavānanādapagataṃ nābhūtkvacinnirvṛtaṃ yenaiṣā satataṃ tvadekaśayanaṃ vakṣaḥsthalī kalpitā | yenoktāsi vinā tvayā mama jagacchūnyaṃ kṣaṇājjāyate so 'yaṃ dambhadhṛtavrataḥ priyatamaḥ kartuṃ kimapyudyataḥ‘kimabhyudyataḥ’ ka kha || 449 ||’ ‘avyalīkanirvyājaṃ yathā’ kaavyalīkaṃ nirvyājaṃ yathā— ‘kiṃ kaṇṭhe śithilīkṛto bhujalatāpāśaḥ pramādānmayā ‘nidrocchedavivartaneṣu’ ka khanidrācchedavivartaneṣvabhimukhī nādyāpi saṃbhāvitā‘saṃbhāṣitā’ ka kha | anyastrījanasaṃkathālaghurahaṃ svapne tvayā lakṣito‘vīkṣito’ ka kha doṣaṃ paśyasi kaṃ‘kim’ ka kha priye parijanopālambhayogye mayi || 450 ||’ dharmānubandhi ‘dharmodakaṃ’ ghadharmodarkaṃ yathā— ‘atha sa viṣayavyāvṛttātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpatikakudaṃ datvā yūne sitātapavāraṇam | munivanatarucchāyāṃ devyā tayā saha śiśriye galitavayasāmikṣvākūṇāmidaṃ hi kulavratam || 451 ||’ arthānubandhi arthodarkaṃ yathā— ‘bhūtvā cirāya caturantamahīsapatnī‘sadigantamahīsapatnī’ kha ‘dauṣṣantim’ khadauṣyantimapratirathaṃ tanayaṃ prasūya‘niveśya’ iti mudrite śākuntale | ‘tatsaṃniveśitabhareṇa sahaiva bhartrā’ ka khamartrā tadarpitakuṭumbabhareṇa sārdhaṃ śānte kariṣyasi padaṃ punarāśrame 'smin || 452 ||’ yatpunaḥ kāmamevānubadhnāti tatkāmodarkaṃ yathā— ‘advaitaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranuguṇaṃ‘anugataṃ’ iti mudrita uttararāmacarite sarvāsvavasthāsu ya- dvisrambho‘viśrāmo’ ka kha mudrita uttararāmacarite ca hṛdayasya yatra jarasā yasminnahāryo rasaḥ | kālenāvaraṇātyayā‘pariṇateryat’ kha gatpariṇate yatsnehasāre‘premasāre’ iti mudrita uttararāmacarite sthitaṃ ‘bhadre’ gha, ‘bhadra’ (dre vā draṃ?)gabhadraṃ tasya sumānuṣasya kathamapyekaṃ hi yatprāpyate‘tatprārthyate’ ka mudrita uttararāmacarite ca | ‘yatprārthyate’ kha || 453 ||’ ‘nānālaṃkārasaṃsṛṣṭeḥ ‘prakārāśca’ ghaprakārāśca rasoktayaḥ | ityuktaṃ tatra ‘alaṃkārasaṃsṛṣṭeḥ’ itīyatyeva‘ityeva’ ka kha vaktavye nānālaṃkāragrahaṇaṃ‘nānālaṅkāragrahaṇaṃ’ kha guṇarasānāmupasaṃgrahārtham | teṣāmapi hi kāvyaśobhākaratvenālaṃkāratvāt || yadāha— kāvyaśobhākarāndharmānalaṃkārānpracakṣate | te cādyāpi vikalpyante kastānkārtsnyena vakṣyati || kāścinmārgavibhāgārthamuktāḥ prāgapyalaṃkriyāḥ | sādhāraṇamalaṃkārajā‘alaṅkāraṃ jātamanyat’ khatamanyat pradarśyate || tatra ‘kāvyaśobhākarān’ ityanena śleṣopamādivadguṇarasabhāvatadābhāsapraśamā‘prasādādīn’ khadīnapyupagṛhṇāti‘anuguhṇāti’ ka | mārgavibhāgaṃkṛdguṇānāmalaṃkriyopadeśena śleṣādīnāṃ guṇatvamivālaṃkāratvamapi jñāpayati— śleṣaḥ prasādaḥ samatā mādhuryaṃ sukumāratā | arthavyaktirudāratvamojaḥkāntisamādhayaḥ || iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ | teṣāṃ viparyayaḥ prāyo ‘gauḍavartmani lakṣyate’ kalakṣyate gauḍavartmani || iti śleṣādīnāṃ daśānāmeva ‘mārgapratibhākāritāṃ’ kamārgapravibhāgakāritāṃ bruvankāvyaśobhākaratvena guṇāntarāṇāmapyalaṃkāratvamupakalpayati || tadāha, ‘kastānkārtsnyena ‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ kavakṣyati’ | yuktamidamuktam | ayuktaṃ tvidamuktaṃ rasānāmalaṃkārateti || teṣāṃ guṇānāmivālaṃkāravyapadeśābhāvāt | nāyuktam | ‘uktotkarṣāṇām’ khayuktotkarṣāṇāmūrjasvirasava‘preyānāmupadeśena’ katpreyasāmalaṃkāreṣūpadeśāt | tad yathā— preyaḥ priyatarākhyānaṃ rasavad rasapeśalam | ūrjasvi rụ̄dhāhaṃkāraṃ yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tattrayam || 172 || tatrorjasvi rụ̄dhāhaṃkāramityanena ātmaviśeṣaniṣṭhasyotkṛṣṭā‘utkṛṣṭajanmano’ khadṛṣṭajanmano 'nekajanmānubhava‘saṃskārā hi taddrạdhimnaḥ’ khasaṃskārāhitadrạdhimnaḥ ‘saṃgrāmeṇa sampadutpādātiśayahetoḥ’ kasaṃgrāme guṇasaṃpadutpādātiśayahetoralaṃkāra‘alaṃkāraviśeṣasya’ ityasya sthāne ‘viśeṣasya’ khaviśeṣasyopasaṃgrahādahaṃkārābhimānaśrṛṅgārāparanāmno rasasya mānamayavikārarūpeṇābhimānināṃ manasi jāgrataḥ parāṃ koṭimupavarṇayati | rasa- vadrasapeśalamityanena vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisāttvikasaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiriti ratyādirūpeṇānekadhāvirbhavato 'bhivardhamānasya‘vivardhamānasya’ ga paraprakarṣagāminaḥ śrṛṅgārasya ‘madhyamāvasthām’ ka khamadhyāvasthāṃ sūcayati | preyaḥ ‘pre[yaḥ pri ?]yatarākhyānam’ ka, kha pustake ‘priyaḥ’ nāstipriyatarākhyānamityanena samastabhāvamūrdhābhiṣiktāyā rateḥ ‘paraprakarṣādhigamāt’ ityasya sthāne ‘prakarṣādhigamāt’ khaparaprakarṣādhigamād ‘bhāvanābhigame’ ka khabhāvanādhigame bhāvarūpatāmullaṅghya premarūpeṇa ‘pariṇatāyāmupādānāt’ ka, ‘pariṇatā [yā] upādānāt’ gapariṇatāyā upādānād bhāvāntarāṇāmapi paraprakarṣādhigame rasarūpeṇa pariṇatiriti ‘jñāpayannalaṅkārasyottarāṃ’ kha jñāpayannahaṃkārasyottarāṃ koṭimupalakṣayati | sarveṣāmapi hi ratyādiprakarṣāṇāṃ ratipriyo raṇapriyaḥ parihāsapriyo 'marṣapriya iti ‘premaṇyeba’ ka, ‘premṇaeva’ kha premṇayeva paryavasānaṃ bhavati | yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tat trayamityanenāyuktotkarṣāṇāṃ trayāṇāmapyūrjasviprabhṛtīnāṃ guṇatvameva nālaṃkāratvamityavasthāpayati | tathā hi—aurjityaṃ bhāvikatvaṃ bhāvikaṃ preya’ ka kha preya iti guṇeṣūpadiśyate,‘guṇeṣu bhaṇyate’ ka kha kutaḥ punaridamekadorjasvi—rasavat—preyasāmalaṃkāratvamanyadā guṇatvam‘anyadā guṇatvam’ ka | ucyate— bhūmanindāpraśaṃsāsu nityayoge 'tiśāyane | saṃsarge 'stivivakṣāyāṃ bhavanti matubādayaḥ || yathā gomān deśaḥ, vācālo baṭuḥ, vāgmī vipaścit, ‘phalino vṛkṣāḥ’ kakṣīriṇo vṛkṣāḥ, balavān mallaḥ‘mando’ ka daṇḍī, gomatī ‘śoṇeti’ kaśāleti | tatrorjasvirasavatoralaṃkāratvavivakṣāyāmatiśāyane‘atiśāyane vā’ ka kha bhūmni vā ‘matubarthīyaḥ’ ka khamatvarthīyaḥ | guṇatvavivakṣāyāṃ tu praśaṃsānityayoriti yogayoriti draṣṭavyam | nityo hi kāvye guṇayoga iva rasādiyogaḥ | guṇavato rasavataśca niścitaivāsya praśaṃsā | saṃsargastu guṇānāmavaśyamupādāneṣu | nindā punardoṣahānernāvatarati‘doṣahānerna’ vitarati’ ka, ‘doṣahānena vitarati’ kha | guṇeṣu ‘prema iti’ khapreya iti rūpābhedāt kathamalaṃkāratve tadutkarṣapratītiḥ | yathā ‘yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śreṣṭhatamaḥ kurūṇām’ iti tatrātiśāyikāntareṇa‘tatrātiśāyiguṇāntareṇa’ ka kha tadavagatiriti cet ihāpi ‘yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tattrayam’ iti vākyāntareṇa bhaviṣyati | na cātiśāyikā svārthātiriktaṃ kimapi bruvate, api tu prakṛtyupāttameva prakarṣādikaṃ gamayanti | svārthikeṣu hyete vidhīyante | evamavasthāpite guṇarasānāmalaṃkāratve ‘ṣaṭprakārako’ kaṣaṭprakāro rasālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ saṃbhavati—guṇasaṃkaraḥ, alaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, guṇālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, rasasaṃkaraḥ, rasaguṇasaṃkaraḥ, ‘rasālaṃkārasaṃkaraśceti’ ka kharasālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ iti | ‘nanvatra’ ka khananu ca guṇānāṃ saṃkaravyavahāro nopapadyate bahuṣvapi guṇeṣu guṇavadityeva vyapadeśāt | maivam | trividhā guṇāḥ—śabdaguṇāḥ, arthaguṇāḥ, doṣaguṇāśca | te tu pratyekaṃ dvidhā—ullekhavantaḥ, nirullekhāśca | tatra śabdaguṇeṣu samādhimādhuryaudāryagāmbhīryādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, śleṣaprasādasamatā‘saukumāryādayo’ ka khamādhuryādayo nirullekhāḥ | arthaguṇeṣu prasādarītikāntyādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, arthavyaktisaukṣmya‘gāmbhīryādayo’ khagāmbhīryasaṃmitatvādayo nirullekhāḥ | doṣaguṇeṣu grāmyapunaruktāpārthānyārthādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, śabdahīnasaṃbhramāpakramaviṃsandhyādayo nirullekhāḥ | tatra sajātīyānāṃ sollekhānāmevaṃ, ‘vijātīyānāṃ vijātīyānāṃ tu’ ghavijātīyānāṃ tu nirullekhānāmapi saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartate || sajātīyānāṃ śabdaguṇeṣu samādhyādīnāṃ yathā— ‘ṇavapallavesu lolaï gholaï ‘vilavesu’ ka kha gaviḍavesu valaï siharesu | thavaï thavaesu a ‘mahā’ katahā vasaṃtalacchī asoassa || 455 ||’ [navapallaveṣu lolati ghūrṇate viṭapeṣu valate śikhareṣu | sthagati stabakeṣu ca tathā vasantalakṣmīraśokasya ||] atrānyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ pṛthakpadatā mādhuryaṃ, ‘bandhavigūḍhatvam’ khabandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ‘ 'dhvanimattā’ ghadhvanimattā, gāmbhīryamiti sajātīyāḥ saṃkīryante | yato vasantalakṣmīraśokasyeti padayoḥ śabdadhvanirapi parisphurati | yathā kasyacidaśokasya mānino 'ṅgeṣu priyāṅganā savilāsaṃ ceṣṭate tathāsyeyamiti || ‘anyārthaguṇeṣu’ kaarthaguṇeṣu śleṣādīnāṃ yathā— ‘janaḥ puṇyairyāyājjaladhijalabhāvaṃ jalamuca- stathāvasthaṃ cainaṃ nidadhatu ‘śubhe’ kaśubhaiḥ śuktivadane | tatastāṃ śreyobhiḥ pariṇatimasau vindatu ‘yathā’ ka khayayā ruciṃ tanvanpīnastani hṛdi tavāyaṃ viluṭhati || 456 ||’ atra ‘saṃvidhāneṣu sūtratā’ khasaṃvidhāne susūtratā śleṣaḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, utpattyādikriyākramo rītiḥ dīptarasatvaṃ kāntirityarthaguṇāḥ sajātīyāḥ saṃkīryante || doṣaguṇeṣu ‘śramādīnāṃ’ kagrāmyādīnāṃ yathā— ‘hanyate sā varārohā smareṇākāṇḍavairiṇā | hanyate cārusarvāṅgī hanyate mañjubhāṣiṇī || 457 ||’ atra hanyata ‘ityasaṅgatārtham’ khaityamaṅgalārtham, varārohetyaślīlārtham, ‘hanyate’ ka khahanyate hanyata iti punaruktam, cārusarvāṅgītyuktvā ‘uktau’ ka khavarāroheti vyartham, ta ete sajātīyāścatvāro 'pi doṣaguṇāḥ saṃkīryamāṇāḥ kasyacidunmattabhāṣiṇo 'nukampādyatiśayavivakṣāyāmabhyanujñāyante || yadāha— ‘anukampādyatiśayaṃ’ khaanukampādyatiśayo yadi kaścidvivakṣyate‘vivakṣate’ kha | na doṣaḥ punaruktādau pratyuteyamalaṃkriyā || ‘atha sajātīyām’ kha ghaarthāsajātīyānāṃ śabdaguṇānāmarthaguṇānāṃ ca saṃkaro yathā— ‘ko nāma nodayati nāstamupaiti ko vā lokottaraḥ punarayaṃ savitā jagatsu | yatrodayāstamayabhāji rucāṃ nidhāne dvedhā bhavatyahariti kṣaṇadeti kālaḥ || 458 ||’ atra yāvadarthapadatā ‘sasmitatvam’ khasaṃmitatvam, samyagbandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ‘ślāghyaviśeṣaguṇayoga’ ityasya sthāne ‘viśeṣaguṇayoga’ ka khaślādhyaviśeṣaguṇayoga udāttatvamiti śabdaguṇāḥ, uktārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhiḥ, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, rụ̄dhāhaṃkārataurjityamityarthaguṇāḥ saṃkīryante || śabdaguṇānāṃ doṣaguṇānāṃ ca yathā— ‘ehyehi vatsa raghunandana pūrṇacandra cumbāmi mūrdhani ‘cirāya’ ka kha mudrite mahāravīracarite caciraṃ ca pariṣvaje tvām | āropya vā hṛdi divāniśamudvahāmi vande 'thavā caraṇapuṣkarakadvayaṃ te || 459 || atra bhāvato ‘vākpratipattiḥ’ ka khavākpravṛttirbhāvikatvam, prasiddhārthapadatā prasādaḥ, ‘priyārthapadopādānam’ ka khapriyārthapadopādānaṃ preya iti śabdaguṇāḥ, ehyehīti punaruktam, vatse-tyuktvā tvatpādābjadvayaṃ vanda iti viruddham, mūrdhni cumbāmi hṛdi vahāmītyādau vanda iti kriyāsvanupayogāt ‘pūrṇacandranidarśanādi—’ khapūrṇacandretidarśanādikriyopayogi vyarthaṃ ceti ‘doṣaguṇāḥ parasparaṃ saṃkīryante’ ka khadoṣaguṇāḥ saṃkīryante | rasākṣiptacittādau hi punaruktādayo ‘na’ ga nāstina duṣyanti || arthaguṇānāṃ doṣaguṇānāṃ yathā— ‘kiṃ dvāri daivahatike sahakārakeṇa saṃvardhitena viṣapādapa eṣa pāpaḥ | asminmanāgapi vikāsavikārabhāji bhīmā bhavanti madanajvarasaṃnipātāḥ || 460 ||’ atra dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiḥ, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, uktārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhirityarthaguṇāḥ, daivahatike viṣapādapo 'yaṃ pāpa ityamaṅgalārthaṃ grāmyaṃ, kimanena saṃvardhitenetyatra madanajvarasaṃnipātā ityatra ca kṛtyaprayojanādervirahiṇo draṣṭurityādeścādhyāhārādasaṃpūrṇavākyatāyāmarthavyaktiviparyayaḥ | asminvikāsavikārabhājīti vikāsaśabdasya puṣpaviṣayatvādvṛkṣe 'pi prayogo 'vācakatvādasamartha iti doṣaguṇā mithaḥ saṃkīryante | yato rasākṣepātparihāsaleśoktyāmaṅgalam, praviśa piṇḍīṃ dvāraṃ bhakṣaya iti nyāyātprasiddhādhyāhāraḥ, ‘darī vadati, mañcāḥ krośantī’ ti prayogadarśanādādhārādheyayorabhedopacāraśca viruddhalakṣaṇādibhiḥ prayujyamāno na doṣāyeti || athālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ | sa yadyapi vyaktāvyaktobhayātmatayā tilataṇḍulakādibhedaiḥ pradhānāṅgabhāvasamakakṣatābhyāṃ purastāduktaḥ tathāpi teṣāṃ guṇādisaṃkarāsādhāraṇa-tvātsaṃprati sādhāraṇaḥ prakāra ucyate | sa ṣọdhā śabdālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, arthālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, ubhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ śabdārthālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, ‘śabdobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ’ khaśabdārthobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, arthobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraścaatra ‘ca’ ityadhikaṃ ka kha | teṣu śabdālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā— ‘haṃsānāmālī paṅktiḥ | ambaramākāśamaramatyantamārụ̄dhā | kiṃbhūtā |’ bhayena cañcalā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | sarasā rasasahitā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | sarāsāḥ saśabdā ye sārasāsteṣāṃ rāsaḥ krīḍā yasyāstathā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | ārāse śabde yo rasastatsahitā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | sarasaṃ saraḥ gamanaṃ tenāsyate kṣipyate sarāsaḥ | sarasi bhavaḥ sārasaḥ | sa cāsau sa ca | evaṃvidho rāsaḥ krīḍā yasyāstatheti’ gha pustakasyāyuṣi ṭippaṇīhaṃsālī bhayataralā sārā sarasā sarāsasārasarāsā‘sarāsusā’ ka | ‘ambaramārụ̄dhā’ ka, ‘ambarasārarụ̄dhā’ khaambaramaramārụ̄dhā sārāsarasā sarāsasārasarāsā || atra saṃskṛtaprākṛtabhāṣāsaṃśleṣaḥ, gatapratyāgataṃ citraṃ, ‘pādāvṛttiyamakam’ ka khapadāvṛttiyamakaṃ, varṇānuprāsaśceti catvāraḥ ‘śabdālaṃkārāḥ’ ka khaśabdālaṃkārāḥ saṃkīryante || arthālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā— ‘vāsāvasthitatāmracūḍavayasāmāyāmibhiḥ kūjitairdūrādapyanumīyamānavasatirgrāmo 'yamantarvaṇam | yatroddīptakukūla‘sṛgālakūlavisaradhūmyāndhanaṃ’ ka, ‘kukūlakūṭabisaraddhūmyāghanaṃ’ khakūṭavisarajjhampāghanaṃ ghūrṇate sandhyāntollasadacchabhallapaṭalacchāyājaṭālaṃ tamaḥ || 461 ||’ atra tāmracūḍavayasāṃ kūjitairityanumānam, yatra tamo ghūrṇata iti jñāpakahetuḥ, kukūlakūṭavisarajjhampāghanamiti sandhyāntollasadacchabhallapaṭa- lacchāyājaṭālamiti ca kārakahetuḥ, jāyamānapadārthasvarūpābhidhānaṃ jātirityarthālaṃkārāścatvāro mithaḥ saṃkīryante || ubhayālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā— ‘ṇa hu ṇavaraṃ dīvasihāsāricchaṃ‘saricchaṃ’ kha caṃpaehiṃ‘campaehi’ kha paḍivaṇṇam | kajjalakajjaṃ ri ‘kajjammi’ kakaaṃ ‘ābhamantehi bhamalehi’ khauari bhamantehiṁ bhamarehiṁ || 462 ||’ [na khalu kevalaṃ dīpaśikhāsādṛśyaṃ campakaiḥ pratipannam | kajjalakāryamapi kṛtamupari bhramadbhirbhramaraiḥ ||] atra campakādīnāṃ pradīpaśikhābhirākārakāntibhyāmupamā,‘ākārakāntimupamāṃ’ ka virahiṇīhṛdayadāhodyā‘virahiṇīhṛdayadāhodyamadyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ’ ka, ‘virahiṇīhṛdayadāhapradyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ’ khanadyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ sāmyaṃ, ‘kajjalapaṭalānāmivopari’ ka, ’kajjalapaṭalānāmupari’ khakajjalapaṭalānāmiva bhramarapaṭalānāmupari melanānmelitaṃ, campakadīpakalikayoriva bhramarakajjalapaṭalayoraupamyādisaṃbandhātsamuccaya ityubhayālaṃkārāścatvāro‘catvāro mithaḥ saṃkīryante’ ka, ‘catvāro 'pi saṃkīryante’ kha mithaḥ saṃkīryamāṇā upalabhyante || śabdārthālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā— ‘sarvāśārudhi ‘dagdhavīradhi’ kadagdhavīrudhi ‘ruṣā’ kasadā sāraṅgabaddhakrudhi kṣāmakṣmāruhi mandamunmadhulihi svacchandakandadruhi’svacchandakundadruhi’ ka kha | śuṣyatsrotasi ‘taptabhūrirajasi jvālāyamānārṇasi’ ka khataptabhūmirajasi jvālāyamānāmbhasi ‘jyeṣṭhe’ khagrīṣme māsi kharārkatejasi kathaṃ pāntha vrajañjīvasi || 463 ||’ atrāvantikā rītiḥ, padamudrā, vibhaktimudrā, anuprāsaśceti śabdā-laṃkārāḥ, jātiḥ, ‘jñāpakakārakahetū’ kakārakajñāpakau hetū, citrahetuścetyarthālaṃkārā ‘mithaḥ śabde saṃkīryante’ khamithaḥ saṃkīryante | ‘evamubhayālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā’ kaśabdobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā— ‘stokastokamamūbhirambaratale tārābhirastaṃ gataṃ gacchatyastagireḥ śirastadanu ca cchāyādaridraḥ śaśī | pratyāsannatarodayasya taraṇerbimbāruṇimnā tato mañjiṣṭhārasalohinī digapi ca prācī samunmīlati || 464 ||’ atra samunmīlatīti vibhaktimudrā, stokastokamastaṃ gataṃ‘astaṃ gacchatītyādiḥ’ kha gacchatītyādiranuprāsaśca śabdālaṃkārāḥ, hetūpamā, samādhiḥ, anukramaḥ, samuccayoktiścetyubhayālaṃkārā mithaḥ saṃkīryante || arthobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā— ‘khaṃ vaste kalaviṅkakaṇṭhamalinaṃ kādambinīkambalaṃ ‘carcā’ ka gacarcāṃ pārayatīva dardurakulaṃ kolāhalairunmadam | gandhaṃ muñcati siktalā‘siktajālasurabhi’ ka, ‘siktalājasurabhiḥ’ khajasurabhiṃ varṣeṇa dagdhā sthalī durlakṣyo 'pi vibhāvyate kamalinīhāsena bhāsāṃ patiḥ || 465 ||’ atra jātiḥ, anumānam, kārakajñāpakahetū cetyarthālaṃkārāḥ, rūpakopamā, hetūpamā, utprekṣopameti ‘ceti ubhayālaṃkārāḥ’ ka khacobhayālaṃkārā mithaḥ saṃkīryante || etena guṇālaṃkārasaṃkaro 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | ‘ato’ ka khayato yadyapi guṇavatyeva vākye 'laṃkā‘saṃkarayogaḥ’ ka kharayogastathāpi kvacid guṇasya prādhānyaṃ kvacidalaṃkārasyeti pradhānāṅgabhāvena guṇālaṃkārayoḥ saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartate | sa ṣọdhā—śabda-guṇapradhānaḥ, arthaguṇapradhānaḥ, ‘doṣālaṃkārapradhānaḥ’ kadoṣaguṇapradhānaḥ, śabdālaṃkārapradhānaḥ, arthālaṃkārapradhānaḥ, ubhayālaṃkārapradhānaśca‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ ka kha || teṣu śabdaguṇapradhāno yathā— ‘prāptaśrīreṣa kasmātpunarapi ‘mathituṃ mandaraṃ vā’ kha | padyametad dhvanyāloke (2|30) 'pyudāhṛtammayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyānnidrāmapyasya pūrvāmanalasamanaso naiva‘nāpyahaṃ tarkayāmi’ ka saṃbhāvayāmi | setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kimiti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyātastvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata‘vidadhati’ ka ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ 466’ atra hetūtprekṣābhidhāne tvayītyādau pade viṣṇoḥ svarūpādhyāsena tadbhāvāpattau samādheriha prādhānyaṃ‘samādheḥ prādhānyamiha’ ka kha pratīyate | nanu cāyamarthasya prākaṭyātprasādo 'rthaguṇaḥ kasmānna bhavati | asminnapi tavdyapadeśena śabdaśakterādhikyāt | nanu ca tvayi iti, eṣa iti, asya iti, ‘yuṣmadetadidamadaḥ’ ka, ‘yuṣmadasmadidamāṃ’ ghayuṣmadetadidamāṃ na kaścana‘kaścinna viṣṇuvācī’ ka viṣṇuvācī ‘sa kathaṃ varṇanīye vastuni tamarthamabhidadhyāt’ ka khasa kathaṃ varṇanīye nyastastaṃ tamarthamabhidadhīta | ucyate, sarvanāmatvenaiṣāṃ sarvavācitvāt | sarvanāmāni hi ‘sarvanāmābhidhāyīnyapi’ ka khasarvābhidhāyīnyapi ‘prakaraṇādigamyaṃ viśeṣamarthaṃ ca bruvate’ ka, ‘prakaraṇādigamyaviśeṣamiva bruvate’ khaprakaraṇādigamyaṃ viśeṣameva bruvate sa ca iha prāptaśrīrityevamādimirabhivyakta‘abhivyaktamevābhigamyate iti’ ka, ‘abhivyakta evābhigamyate iti’ khamevāvagamyata iti || arthaguṇapradhāno yathā— ‘lakṣmīvaśīkaraṇacūrṇasahodarāṇi tvatpādapaṅkajarajāṃsi ciraṃ jayanti | yāni praṇāmamilitāni nṛṇāṃ lalāṭe ‘limpanti’ gha lumpanti daivalikhitāni durakṣarāṇi || 467 || ‘atra hetuvākyaübhayālaṃkāraprādhānyenārdhaprākaṭayamarthaguṇaḥ pratīyate’ kaatra hetusāmyobhayālaṃkārābhidhāne 'pi prādhānyenārthaprākaṭyamarthaguṇaḥ pratīyate || doṣaguṇapradhāno yathā— ‘yenāpaviddhasalilasphuṭanāgasadmā devāsurairamṛtamambunidhirmamanthe | vyāvartanairahipaterayamāhitāṅkaḥ khaṃ vyālikhanniva vibhāti sa mandarādriḥ || 468 ||’ atra ‘vyāvartanairahipaterayamāhitāṅkaḥ’ iti jñāpakahetoḥ ‘khaṃ vyālikhanniva’ iti utprekṣāvayavācca, devāsurairiti ‘nityavivakṣāyāma’ khanityavairāvivakṣāyāṃ bahuvacanam, ‘amṛtamambunidhirmamanthe’ iti dvikarmakeṣvapi mathiprabhṛtīnāmupasaṃkhyānamiti amṛtaśabdāddvitīyā iti doṣaguṇayoḥ prādhānyaṃ pratīyate | nanu cātrārthasya ‘prādhānyaṃ na bhavati’ ka khaprādhānyaṃ kathaṃ bhavati tadviṣayasya jñāpakahetunāpahṛtatvātso 'pyarthālaṃkāra eva | guṇālaṃkārayośca tulyakakṣatāyāmalaṃkāraḥ pradhānaṃ bhavati na guṇaḥ | guṇairhi guṇabhūtairevālaṃkārāḥ prāya ārabhyante | tadyathā— ‘aspṛṣṭā doṣamātrābhiḥ samagraguṇagumphitā | vipañcīsvarasaubhāgyā vaidarbhī rītiripyate | ‘samastetyutkaṭapadām’ ka, ‘samastātyutkaṭapadām’ khasamastātyudbhaṭapadāmojaḥkāntisamanvitām | ‘gauḍīyāṃ tāṃ’ ka khagauḍīyeti vijānanti rītiṃ rītivicakṣaṇāḥ || āśliṣṭaṃ ślathabhāvāṃ tu purāṇacchāyamāśritām | madhurāṃ ‘sukumārīṃ ca’ khasukumārāṃ ca pāñcālīṃ kavayo viduḥ || mādhuryamapi vāñchanta; prasādaṃ ca subhedhasaḥ | samāsavanti bhūyāṃsi na padāni prayuñjate || lāṭīyāvantyayo rītyormāgadhyāṃ ca kvacitkvacit | kecidojo 'bhidhitsantaḥ samasyanti bahūnyapi || pratītaśabdamojasvi ‘suśliṣṭapadasaṃghitā’ ka, ‘suśliṣṭapadasaṃdhimatta’ khasuśliṣṭapadasaṃdhi ca | prasādi svabhidhānaṃ ca yamakaṃ kṛtinā matamcāyāmakaṃ kṛtināṃ matam’ ka kha ||’ iti | mā bhūdalaṃkāratulyakakṣatayā arthasya prādhānyaṃ‘arthapradhānodāraguṇasya’ kha śabdaguṇasya tu ślāghyaviśeṣaguṇayoga udāttamityādeḥ kimiti prādhānyaṃ na bhavati doṣaguṇānāmatīvollekhavattvena‘matīvollekhavidhitvena’ ka kha prādhānyāt‘pra(prā)dhānyāt’ ka || atra ‘yathā—’ ityadhikaṃ kasā vāmanaprasiddhirlaṅghitanabhaso balidviṣo 'dyāpi | matsariṇaḥ khalu lokā marmāṇyevānubadhnanti || doṣasya yo guṇībhāvaḥ sa tato 'pyadhikaṃ prakāśata iti || śabdālaṃkāraprādhāno yathā— ‘yaccandrakoṭikarakorakabhārabhāji‘korakabhārabhāji’ ka, ‘korakahārabhāji’ kha babhrāma babhruṇi jaṭāpaṭale harasya | tadvaḥ punātu himaśailaśilānikuñjajhā- ‘ṭāṅkāraḍambaravirāvi’ ka, ‘prākāraḍambaravirāvi’ khatkāraḍambaravirāvi surāpagāmbhaḥ || 469 ||’ atrārthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ vibhavotkarṣa udāttatā mṛduprasphuṭonmiśravarṇānāmavaiṣamyaṃ samatā, bandhagāḍhatā, aurjityamityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ prādhānyena śabdālaṃkārānuprāsaḥ pratīyate || arthālaṃkārapradhāno yathā— ‘āśleṣiṇaḥ ‘pṛthurataklama’ ka khapṛthutaraklamapītaśītamāyāvinīrghanamudo rajanīryuvānaḥ | ‘kaṇṭhaiḥ’ khaūrdhvormuhurvalanabandhanasandhilolapādāntasaṃvalitatūlapaṭāḥ‘lolapaṭāḥ’ ka kha svapanti || 470 ||’ atra bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ślādhyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvam‘udāttatā’ ka kha, vibhavotkarṣa audāryam, dīptarasatvam, kāntirityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ prādhānyena jātirarthālaṃkāraḥ pratīyate | ubhayālaṃkārapradhāno yathā— ‘‘abhyudgatā’ khaabhyuddhṛtā vasumatī dalitaṃ ripūraḥ kroḍīkṛtā balavatā balirājalakṣmīḥ | atraikajanmani kṛtaṃ yadanena yūnā janmatraye tadakarotpuruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ || 471 ||’ atroktiparipāṭīḥ‘uktiparipākaḥ’ ka praụdhiḥ, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, āśayotkarṣa udāttatvam, arthaprākaṭyaṃ, prasādaḥ—ityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ śleṣopasarjanā viśeṣoktirubhayālaṃkāraḥ prādhānyena pratīyate || rasasaṃkaro 'pi cālaṃkārasaṃkaravadeva | bhāvarasābhāsapraśamānāṃ tilataṇḍulādiprakāreṇa saṃkaraḥ ‘ṣaṭprakāro’ ka khaṣaṭprakārako bhavati | tatra bhāvānāṃ tilataṇḍulaprakāro yathā— ‘nyakkāro hṛdi vajrakīla iva me tīvraḥ parispandate ghīrāndhe tamasīva majjati manaḥ saṃmīlitaṃ lajjayā | ‘tātavipattijo’ kha, ‘tārkṣyasajātīyatvāt tārkṣyo 'tra jaṭāyurabhidhīyate’ gha pustakasyāyuṣi ṭippaṇīśokastārkṣyavipattito ‘dahati yannāstyeva’ kadahati māṃ nāstyeva yasminkriyā ‘marmāṇīva’ khamarmāṇyeva punaśchinatti karuṇā sītāṃ varākīṃ prati || 472 ||’ atrāmarṣalajjāśokānukampāḥ samakakṣatayā mithastilataṇḍulavatsaṃkīryamāṇā rāmasya virahiṇo vāgārambhānubhā‘anurāgoktiparatayā’ ka khavoktiparatayā pratīyante || kṣīranīraprakāro yathā— ‘mānonnatetyasahanetyatipaṇḍiteti mayyeva dhikkṛtiranekamukhī sakhīnām | dākṣiṇyamātramasṛṇena viceṣṭitena dhūrtasya tasya hi guṇā nu paraṃ jayanti || 473 ||’ atra sakhīṣu roṣaḥ priyaguṇeṣu cāsūyā, kṣīranīravanmithaḥ ‘saṃkīryamāṇau’ ka, ‘saṃkīryamāṇe’ khasaṃkīryamāṇau māninīvāgārambhaparatayā ‘pratīyete’ ka khapratīyete || chāyādarśaprakāro yathā ‘āḥ sīte patigarvavibhramabharabhrā‘prānta’ kantabhramadbāndhavapradhvaṃsasmitakāntimattava tadā jātaṃ yadetanmukham | saṃpratyeva haṭhāttadeṣa‘tadeva’ ka kha kurute ‘keśoccayotkarṣaṇa’ ka khakeśoccayākarṣaṇatrāsottānitalolalocanapatadbāṣpaplutaṃ rāvaṇaḥ || 474 ||’ atra krodhābhāse chāyādarśanyāyena ratyābhāsaḥ ‘saṃkīryate’ ka khasaṃkīryamāṇa upalabhyate || ‘narasiṃhavad yathā—’ kanarasiṃhaprakāro yathā— ‘kiṃ dvāri daivahatike sahakārakeṇa saṃvardhitena viṣapādapa eṣa pāpaḥ | asminmanāgapi ‘vikāsavikārabhāji’ kavikāśavikārabhāji bhīmā bhavanti madanajvarasaṃnipātāḥ || 475 ||’ atra narasiṃhajātāviva siṃhanaraśarīrabhāgausiṃhanaraśarīravāgārambhānusāreṇa’ ka kha sahakāravarṇanāvāgārambhānusāreṇa sakhīviṣayānukampā sahakāraviṣayā ca kutsā mithaḥ saṃkīryete | tathā hi ‘daivahatikeśabdena’ ka khadaivahatike itiśabdena labdhāyāṃ niyatyupādhau sarvathaivānukampyamānatāyāṃ sahakārasaṃvardhananibandhanatvamevāsyāḥ kalā dyotyate | evaṃ nāma tvaṃ daivopahatāsi yatsahakārachadmānaṃ viṣapādapaṃ‘sahakāraviṣapādapaṃ’ ka kha dvāri saṃvardhayasīti‘iti’ ka kha nāsti | viṣapādapaśabdena ca‘ca’ ka kha labdhāyāṃ sahakārasya sarvathaiva kutsāyāṃ ‘vikāsakāla’ ka ghavikāsakāle kāminīnāmasahyasmarajvarasaṃnipātahetukatvamevāsyāḥ kapratyayena‘kanpratyayena’ ka pratyāyyate || taduktam— kutsitatvena kutsāvānsamyagvāpi hi kutsitaḥ | svaśabdābhihite kena viśiṣṭo 'rthaḥ pratīyate || na ca sāṃpratikī kutsā śabdabhede pratīyate | ‘yujyate’ khapūjyate kutsitatve 'pi praśastatve 'pi kutsyate‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ ka || tad yathā— ‘eka iha jīvaloke jīvatirūpaṃ nṛrūpapaśurūpaḥ‘nṛrūpapaśurūpaḥ’ iti ka pāṭhastruṭitaḥ | ‘na rūpamabhyudaye’ iti kha pāṭhaḥ | yaḥ ‘premamātrapāśe’ ka, ‘yaḥ premamāśayāśe’ khapremapāśapāśe ‘mṛgavanna mṛgīdṛśāṃ’ khamṛga iva na mṛgīdṛśāṃ patita || 476 ||’ pāṃsūdakaprakāro‘pāṃśūdakaprakāro yathā’ ga yathā— ‘mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti | anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanamīdṛśānāṃ vairī na cedbhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ || 477 ||’ atra svasaubhāgyavarṇanā mṛtpiṇḍe ‘pāṃśūdakayoriva’ gapāṃsūdakayorivāvibhāgamāpādyamānayorasūyāgarvayoḥ saṃkara upalabhyate‘upapadyate’ ka kha || citravarṇaprakāro yathā— ‘virodho viśrāntaḥ prasarati raso nirvṛtighana- stadauddhatya kvāpi vrajati vinayaḥ prahvayati mām | jhaṭityasmindṛṣṭe kimapi paravānasmi yadi vā mahārghastīrthānāmiva‘kimiha mahatāṃ’ ka hi mahatāṃ ko 'pyatiśayaḥ || 478 ||’ atra vīrauddhatyasvātantryavyarasānāmānandapraśamapāravaśyarasaistiraskriyamāṇānāṃ ‘paṭavarṇanīlādibhiḥ’ ka, ‘paṭanīlādibhiḥ’ khapaṭa iva nīlādibhiḥ ‘sitādīnāṃ’ kasītādīnāṃ praśamā rāmadarśanaprabhāvodbhave-lavasya vismayātiśayapraśamajanmani ‘vāgārambhānubhāvopamādbhavedetaccitravarṇavat’ ka, ‘vāgārambhānubhāvopamodbhavecitravarṇavat’ khavāgārambhānubhāvopamāpade citravarṇavatsaṃkīryamāṇāḥ samupalabhyante || atha ‘atha ko 'yaṃ guṇasaṃkaraḥ’ karasaguṇasaṃkaraḥ | nanu ca ‘nanu doṣahāniriva’ kha , ‘doṣahāni namiva’ ca ghadoṣahānamiva guṇopādānamapi niyamanirvartyam‘niyamanivartyam’ ka | alaṃkārayoga iva rasāviyogo 'pyavaśyaṃ vidheyaḥ | kadācidalaṃkārayogo 'pi tyajyate ‘nanu rasādivyabhicaritasaṃbandhāviti’ ka ga pustake ca ‘natu’ ityasya sthāne ‘nanu’ iti vartatena tu rasāviyogo guṇayogaśca vyabhicaritasaṃbandhāviti | atrocyate | yatra citra‘varṇavat’ gavarṇavannarasiṃhavatpāṃsūdakava‘pāśūdakavacca’ ga ccāvayavāvayavinyāyena jātivyaktinyāyena ‘vāpṛthak’ ka cāpṛthakprayatnanirvartyānāṃ‘prayatnānirbartyānāṃ’ ka guṇarasānāṃ vākye saṃniveśastatra saṃkaravyavahāro na pravartate || tad yathā— madhuraṃ rasavadvāci vastunyapi rasasthitiḥ | yena mādyanti dhīmanto madhuneva madhuvratāḥ || kāmaṃ sarvo 'pyalaṃkāro rasamarthe niṣiñcati | tathāpyagrāmyataivainaṃ bhāraṃ vahati bhūyasā || śṛṅgāra eva ‘sarveṣu’ kamadhuraḥ paraprahlādano rasaḥ‘paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ’ iti dhvanyāloke (2|8) | tanmayaṃ kāvyamāśritya mādhuryaṃ pratitiṣṭhati || śṛṅgāre vipralambhākhye karuṇe ca prakarṣavat | mādhuryamārdratāṃ yāti yatastatrādhikaṃ manaḥ || raudrādayo rasā dīptyā lakṣyante ‘kāryavartinaḥ’ kakāvyavartinaḥ | ‘tadva‍yaktihetū śabdāthāṃvojo 'dhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhati’ ka, dhvanyāloke tu ‘tadva‍yaktihetū śabdārthāvāśrityojo vyavasthitam |’ iti pāṭhaḥtavdyaktihetū śabdārthāvojodhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhati || ‘samarpakatvaṃ vāpyasya’ ka, dhvanyāloke tu 'samarpakatvaṃ kāvyasya’ itisamarthakatvaṃ vākyasya yattu sarvarasānprati | sa prasādo guṇo jñeyaḥ sarvasādhāraṇakriyaḥ ||’ seyaṃ guṇānāṃ rasārambhakatve saṃkarāprasiddhiḥ | evaṃ rasānāṃ guṇārambhakatve 'pi | tadyathā—rụ̄dhāhaṃkārataurjityam, ‘bhāvato vāk‌pravṛttiḥ’ ka, ‘bhāvayato vākyavṛttiḥ’ khabhāvato vāk‌pravṛttirbhāvikatvam, ‘krodhādāvapyasya tīvratvaṃ’ ka, ‘krodhādāvapi tīvratā’ khakrodhādāvapyatīvratā, mādhuryam, āśayotkarṣaḥ, udāttatvam, arthasyābhīṣṭatamatā, ‘arthasyābhīṣṭatanmayatā’ khapreyaḥ, dīptarasatvaṃ, kāntiriti | yatra tu tilatandulavat‘tilataṇḍulavat’ ka kha kṣīranīravacchāyādarśavat tulyakakṣatayaiva guṇarasānāṃ ‘vākye pṛthak prayatna’ ka khavākye 'pṛthakprayatnanirvartyānāṃ viniveśastatra saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartata eva | sa ṣọdhā—guṇapradhānaḥ—rasapradhānaḥ, ubhayapradhānaḥ, ubhayāpradhānaḥ, guṇādhikaḥ, rasādhika iti || teṣu guṇapradhāno yathā— ‘atrāntare lalitahāralatānitambasaṃvāhanaskhalitavegataraṅgitāṅgī | devī vyapāsya śayanaṃ dhṛtamānatanturantaḥpuraṃ gatavatī saha sauvidallaiḥ || 479 ||’ atrārthaprākaṭyaudāryayorarthaśabdaguṇayoḥ ‘prādhānyaṃ na ratikrodhayoḥ’ ga nāstiprādhānyaṃ ‘na bhavati krodhayoḥ’ khana ratikrodhayoriti guṇapradhānaḥ || rasapradhāno yathā— ‘asminnagṛhyata pinākabhṛtā salīla- mārabdhavepathuradhīravilocanāyāḥ | vinyastamaṅgalamahauṣadhirīśvarāyāḥ srastoragapratisareṇa kareṇa pāṇiḥ || 480 ||’ atra ślādhvaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvam, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiriti guṇāḥ sādhvasavilāsānurāgasaṃgamarasairatiśayyanta iti rasapradhānaḥ || ubhayapradhāno yathā— ‘āpātamātrarasike sarasīruhasya kiṃ bījamarpayitumicchasi vāpikāyām | kālaḥ kalirjagadidaṃ na kṛtajñamajñe sthitvā hariṣyati tavaiva mukhasya śobhām || 481 ||’ atra bhaṇitiviśeṣa uktiḥ saṃvidhāne ‘svasūtratā’ khasusūtratā śleṣa iti śabdaguṇayorlāvaṇyavilāsavarṇanīyarasayośca tulyakakṣatayā nirdeśa‘nirdiśatyubhayapradhānaḥ’ ka ityubhayapradhānaḥ || ubhayāpradhāno yathā— ‘abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapā- dasaralajanāśleṣakrūrastuṣārasamīraṇaḥ | galitavibhavasyājñevādya‘āhevātha’ ga dyutirmasṛṇā rave- rvirahivanitāvaktraklaibyaṃ bibharti niśākaraḥ || 482 ||’ atra svādukrūramasṛṇaklaibya‘vaktraklaivya’ kamityanyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, abhinavavadhūroṣādīnāṃ caturṇāmapyarthānāṃ svādvādīnāṃ ca lakṣaṇādilakṣitānāṃ prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapāt iti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṇāmupakrameṇa nirvahaṇaṃ‘nibarhaṇam’ kha rītiḥ, pādacatuṣṭaye caturṇāmarthānāṃ vibhaktyasamatvena niveśaḥ saṃbhitatvamiti catvāro guṇāḥ, catvāraśca ratyamarṣaviṣādajugupsātmāno rasāḥ kālāvasthānivedanaparatvena pratīyanta ityubhayāpradhānaḥ || guṇādhiko yathā— ‘ajananirastu bibhūterapūraṇirbhavatu sarvakāmānām | mā yāciṣi mā seviṣi mā sahiṣi parābhavaṃ dhaninaḥ || 483 ||’ atra suptiṅvyutpattiḥ‘vyutpattisauśabdyam’ kha sauśabdyam, vākyānāṃ paripūrṇatvamarthavyaktiḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, vibhūteranutpattau kāmā na pūryante, aparipūrṇakāmo yācate, yācamānastadanāpnuvan dhaninaḥ sevate, sevamānastu taiḥ paribhūyata ityutpattyādikriyākramo rītiriti guṇāścatvāraḥ, rasastu nirveda evaika iti guṇādhikaḥ || ssādhiko yathā— ‘kamalamanambhasi kamale kuvalayametāni kanakalatikāyām | sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyam || 484 ||’ atra kamalamanambhaṃsi kamale kuvalayametāni kanakalatikāyām ityanyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyamityaślīlāmaṅgalārthau doṣaguṇāvapi, ślādhyaviśeṣaguṇayoga udātta-tvam, vikaṭabandhatvamudāratā, upakramābhedo rītiḥ, ‘arthasya prākaṭyaṃ’ kaarthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, aniṣṭhuratā saukumāryam, ‘ābhīṣṭatamatā’ kaabhīṣṭatamatā preyaḥ, dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiriti guṇā daśa, rasāstu ratyutkarṣaharṣadhṛtyutkaṇṭhāvegavismaya‘mati’ kha nāstimativitarkacintācapalatāhāsotsāhastambhagadgadonmāda‘vrīḍāvahitthābhayaśaṅkāḥ’ kavrīḍāvahitthabhayaśaṅkāḥ viṃśatirvāgārambhānubhāve śrṛṅgāriṇaḥ priyācāṭukārasya kasyacitpratīyanta iti rasādhikaḥ || rasālaṃkārasaṃkaro 'pyetena vyākhyātaḥ | rasavanti hi vastūni sālaṃkārāṇi kānicit | ekenaiva prayatnena ‘nivartyante’ ka kha ganirvartyante mahākaveḥ || 173 || rasākṣiptatayā yasya bandhaḥ śakyakriyo bhavet | apṛthagyatnanirvartyaḥ ‘so 'laṃkāro dhvanau mataḥ’ iti dhvanyālokeso 'laṃkāraḥ prakṛṣyate || 174 || rasābhāvādiviṣayavivakṣāvirahe sati | alaṃkāranibandho yaḥ sa kavibhyo na rocate || 175 || tatra rasālaṃkārasaṃkaro dvidhā—rasapradhāno 'laṃkārapradhānaśca | ‘tayorye’ ka tayoryonubhavitraiva varṇyate sa rasapradhānaḥ | tatra hyalaṃkāravato vākyasya vāgārambhānubhāvatvaṃ bhavati || tatra ratāvupamāyāḥ saṃkaro yathā— ‘tīe daṃsaṇasuhae ‘paṇaaevalaṇa’ ka, ‘paṇaakavalaṇa’ khapaṇaakkhalaṇajaṇio muhammi maṇahare | roso vi haraï hiaaṃ ‘maaaṃpaṃkova’ ka, ‘maaaṃkovva’ khamaapaṃko vva mialaṃchaṇammi‘maatadbalaṇṇi nisaṇṇe’ ka ṇisaṇṇo 485’ [tasyā darśanasubhage praṇayaskhalanajanito mukhe manohare | roṣo 'pi harati hṛdayaṃ madapaṅka iva mṛgalāñchane niṣaṇṇaḥ ||] atropamātiraskāreṇa rasavato harervacasi vāgārambharūpe rukmiṇīpradattapārijātamañjarīvilokanaprabhavaṃ satyabhāmāyā ‘eva’ kharoṣarāmaṇīyakaṃ prādhānyataḥ pratīyate || ratāveva viparītopamā yathā— ‘yattvannetrasamānakānti salile magnaṃ tadindīvaraṃ meghairantaritaḥ priye tava ‘mukhacchāyānukāraḥ’ ka khamukhacchāyānukārī śaśī | ‘yo’ khaye 'pi ‘tvadgamanānusārigatayaḥ’ ghatvadgamanānukārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatā- stvatsādṛśyavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate || 486 ||’ atra virahiṇo rāmasya priyāvayavasādṛśyadarśanenātmānaṃ vinodayata ‘upāyabhraṃśāratiprabha’ kaupāyabhraṃśādaratipramavaviṣādavāgārambhe svarūpābhidhāne prakṣīṇaśaktiraprāghānyenopamā pratīyate || ratāveva ‘viparyayo’ kaparyāyasya yathā— ‘kiṃ gurujahaṇaṃ ‘aha thaṇa’ ka khaaha thaṇabharo tti ‘bhāvaakaraa’ kabhāakaraalaggatuliāe‘tūliāe’ kha | vihiṇo ‘khattaṃguli’ kakhuttaṃgulimaggavibbhamaṃ‘yagā vimbhama’ ka, ‘thaṇacibbhamaṃ’ kha vahaï se‘sa’ ka tivalī || 487 ||’ [kiṃ gurujadhanamatha stanabhara iti bhāgakaratalāgratulitāyāḥ | vidheḥ khātāṅgulimārgavibhramaṃ vahatyasyāstrivalī ||] atra yadyapi ratiprabhavebhyo vismayādibhyaḥ saṃśayahetūtprekṣopamā‘upamābhyaḥ’ kadibhyaśca paryāyālaṃkāraḥ prādhānyena pratīyate tathāpyasau vāgārambhānubhāva iti ‘ratāvapyaprādhānyam’ ka kharatāvaprādhānyamevānubhavati || ratāveva samādhiryathā | ‘kṛcchreṇoruyugaṃ vyatītya suciraṃ bhrāntvā nitambasthale madhye 'syāstrivalītaraṅgaviṣame ‘niṣpandatām’ ka khanisyandatāmāgatā | maddṛṣṭistṛṣiteva saṃprati śanairāruhya tuṅgau stanau sākāṅkṣaṃ muhurīkṣate ‘jalabharaprasyandinī’ ka khajalalavaprasyandinī locaneṃ || 488 ||’ atra vatsarājena svadṛṣṭau prāṇidharmāḥ samādhīyamānāḥ sāgarikā‘darśanārthe’ ka khadarśanottha‘rati—’ ka kharativāgārambhe nyagbhavanti || ratāvevārthaśleṣasya yathā— ‘kapole pattrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto ‘niśvāsaiḥ’ ka kha ga niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ | muhurlagnaḥ kaṇṭhe taralayati ‘bāṣpastanataṭī’ ka, ‘vāṣpastanataṭīṃ’ gabāṣpaḥ stanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam || 489 ||’ atra yadyapyākṣepeṇa vākyopasaṃhārastathāpi priya ityādibhiḥ prādhānyenābhidhīyamānaḥ śleṣa eva śrṛṅgāriṇo vāgārambhānubhāvā‘anubhāvāṅgatvaṃ’ kaṅgatāmaṅgīkaroti || ratāveva paryāyokteryathā— ‘muktāḥ kandharayā ‘kṛtāḥ’ ka, ‘dhṛtāḥ’ kha dhṛtā stanataṭenottuṅgutā kumbhayorūrubhyāṃ pariṇāhitā kramavatī hastasya pabhdyāṃ gatiḥ | etadvaḥ karighātinastu kaṭhinaṃ carmaiva ko 'yaṃ haṭhaścaṇḍīti tripurārikelivacanairā‘āryānvitaṃ’ karyāsmitaṃ pātu vaḥ || 490 ||’ atra bhagavataścāṭūktivāgārambhe devyāḥ paryāyavarṇanā ‘śleṣabhāvaṃ’ ka khaśeṣabhāvaṃ labhate-ya‘yatra’ ka kha udāsīnena varṇyate so 'laṃkārapradhānaḥ sa hi rasabhāvādeḥ saṃkaraprakāramabhidhitsuḥ svabhāboktiṃ vakroktiṃ vāvalambate || tatra svabhāvoktipakṣe jātiḥ || sā vidhimukhena yathā— ‘‘thoousarata’ kathoosaraṃtarosaṃ ‘thoaparivaṭṭamāna’ ka khathoatthoaparivaḍḍhamāṇapaharisam | hoi a dūrapaāsaṃ ‘uaha’ ka khauhaarasāaṃtavibbhamaṃ‘bibbhaṃtīa’ kha tīa mukham || 491 ||’ [stokāpasaradroṣaṃ stokastokaparivardhamānapraharṣam | bhavati ca dūraprakāśamubhayarasāyattavibhramaṃ tasyā mukham ||] atra satyabhāmāyā roṣasyāpasarpataḥ‘apasajjataḥ’ ka praharṣasya ca prasarpato ye 'nubhāvā jihnāvalokanamukhaprasādādayasta iha saṃkīryamāṇāḥ kavinobhayarasāyattavibhramamityanena‘ubhayarasāyattamityanena’ kha yathāvadavasthitā bhavantīti vidhimukhenābhidhīyante || jātireva niṣedhamukhena yathā— ‘dhīreṇa māṇabhaṃgo ‘māṇakavalaṇeṇa sahāyaṃ garuadhīrārambho’ kha māṇaksvalaṇeṇa garua dhīrārambho | ‘ulalaï tulite’ khaullalaï tulijjaṃte ekammi vi se thiraṃ ṇa laggaï hiaaṃ 492’ [dhairyeṇa mānabhaṅgo mānaskhalanena gurukadhairyārambhaḥ | ullalati tolyamāne ekasminnapyasyāḥ sthiraṃ na lagati hṛdayam ||] atra yadyapi hetūpanyāso vartate tathāpi tasya ‘bhāvākhyānaparikaratvena’ khasvabhāvākhyānaparikaratvenāprādhānyena hṛdayakriyāsvarūpameveha‘svarūpameva hi’ ka niṣedhamukhenābhidhīyata itīyaṃ jātireva bhavati || saiva vidhiniṣedhābhyāṃ yathā— ‘helodastamahīdharasya tanutāmālokya doṣṇo hare- rhastenāṃsataṭe 'valambya‘hastenāsa ta eva’ ka, ‘hastenāṃsata eva’ kha caraṇāvāropya tatpādayoḥ | śailoddhārasahāyatāṃ jigamiṣoraspṛṣṭagovardhanā rādhāyāḥ suciraṃ jayanti gagane vandhyāḥ karabhrāntayaḥ 493’ atra rādhāyāḥ preyasi harau ‘yathāvadavasthitā adbhuta—’ khayathāvadastitodbhūtavṛttisnehaśaṅkotsāhā mithaḥ saṃkīryamāṇā bhayāvegasmṛtimativitarkādibhirvyabhicāribhāvairālambanacaraṇākramaṇasahakṛtāyāṃ karabhrāntau śarīrārambhānubhāve pratīyamānā aspṛṣṭagovardhanā vandhyā iti niṣedhamukhena jayantīti vidhimukhena cābhidhīyante || vakroktipakṣa upamādayaḥ | teṣūpamā yathā— ‘‘corā bhaasatahaṇaṃ puṇo pesavati divvīo | ahirasthianihikalase thayokkahalapūikhaṇutsaṅge’ kacorā sabhaasataṇhaṃ puṇo puṇo pesaaṃti diṭṭhīo | ahirakkhiaṇihikalase vva ‘poḍhavaïāthaṇucchaṅge’ gāthāsapta॰., ‘prauḍhapatikāstanotsaṅge’ iti cchāyā capoḍhamahilāthaṇucchaṃge || 494 ||’ [corāḥ sabhayasatṛṣṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ preṣayanti dṛṣṭīḥ | abhirakṣitanidhikalaśa iva prauḍhamahilāstanotsaṅge ||] atra ‘coragata—’ ga gha﻿cauragatabhayānurāgayoḥ saṃkarasvabhāvoktimatibhūyottarārdhāgatamaupamyaṃ prādhānyena pratīyate || upamaiva rasābhāsasaṃkaraviṣayā yathā— ‘ekenārkaṃ pravitataruṣā pāṭalenāsta‘saṃsthāṃ’ kasaṃsthaṃ ‘paśyetyuktvā’ kapaśyatyakṣṇā sajalataralenāpareṇātmakāntam | ahnaśchede dayitavirahāśaṅkinī cakravākī tau saṃkīrṇau racayati rasau nartakīva pragalbhā || 495 ||’ atra nigadenaiva ‘vyākhyāyate’ kavyākhyāte spaṣṭatayaivopamāyāḥ ‘prādhānyena’ ghapradhānatvena pratītiḥ || rasapraśamayorupamāsahoktiryathā— ‘dṛṣṭe locanavanmanāṅmukulitaṃ pārśvasthite cakravannyagbhūtaṃ bahirāsitaṃ pulakavatsparśaṃ samātanvati‘tatsparśamātanvati’ kha | nīvībandhavadāgataṃ śithilatāmābhāṣamāṇe tato mānenāpasṛtaṃ hriyeva sudṛśaḥ pādaspṛśi preyasi || 496 ||’ atra kasyāścitsakhīvikhyātamānasaṃvidhānakopānmānavatyāḥ priyasaṃdarśanādālambanavibhāvādutpannaprakṛṣṭaratiprabhave‘ratiprabhavaharṣasthāyibhāve’ ka, ‘ratiprabhave’ praharṣasyāpi bhāve’ kha praharṣasthāyibhāve ‘tatpārśve 'pi samarpaṇādibhiḥ’ katatpārśvopasarpaṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne‘uddīpyamāneṣu’ ka samutpadyamāneṣu‘samutpadyamāneṣu’ ka nāsti ‘pulakādiṣu samutpadyamāneṣu vyabhicāriṣu’ ka khapulakādiṣu mukhātmakeṣu vyabhicāriṣu nayananimīlanādhomukhyanīvīvisraṃsa‘viśraṃsanādibhiḥ’ khanādibhiranubhāvaiḥ prakarṣaṇāropaṇādānandarasa‘ānandarasānām’ khatāmāpādyamāne sthāyini prabalavirodhibhāvāntarodayādetebhya eva kāraṇebhyaḥ pratikṣaṇamapacīyamānayorlajjāroṣayoḥ praśamasaṃkarābhibhūya prādhānyenopamāsahoktiḥ ‘saṃkīryate’ ka khaprakāśate || śleṣādyalaṃkārasāmarthyāttu kvacidavāstavamapi rasābhāsasaṃkaraṃ kavayaḥ prakalpayanti‘varṇayanti’ ka, ‘kalpayanti’ kha || sa rūpakaśleṣeṇa yathā— ‘rāmamanmathaśareṇa tāḍitā duḥsahena hṛdaye niśācarī | gandhavadrudhiracandanokṣitā jīviteśavasatiṃ jagāma sā || 497 ||’ atra bībhatso rasaḥ śleṣarūpakasāmarthyādavidyamānenāpi śrṛṅgārarasena saṃkīrṇa iva pratīyate || śleṣānuviddhārthāntaranyāsena yathā— ‘‘asyārthastatra vīrarase tāvat—ho ityāścaryasaṃbodhane | daṣṭauṣṭhaasilatāghātaḥ khaṅgaprahārastavāpi mukulayati locanabhruvau dve api | atha ca suṣṭhu pānti ye yodhāstān rāṃtyādatte tādṛśāneva mahāvīrānsvīkaroti īdṛśī yā kuvalayaprāptā sakalamedinīmaṇḍalaprāptā lakṣmīḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ na na janayati | lagrā vakṣasi kākvā janayatyevetyarthaḥ | api ca vipralambhaśrṛṅgāre he daṣṭauṣṭha pītādharāmṛta bhogaśīlaka, ghātaḥ arthāttava
